name: Skyy’s Lounge / Cozy
description:
The space
Skyy’s Lounge ....Everything warm, from linen to dresser and lounge chair. Splashed with a touch of navy blue you will find peace & tranquility in the soothing tapestry of Skyy's flair. The picture speaks for itself; it is sheer elegance. Further indulge yourself in 288 square feet of spacious comfort; made complete with a 40" flat screen TV, DVD player, cable and internet access. There is no need to leave this room unless you choose to take a leisurely stroll to Dunkin' Donuts. We are walking distance to Journal Square Train & Bus Depot-the access point to NYC and other hot spots throughout the state of NJ. The Holland Tunnel is a 3 minute ride from the house; making downtown NYC conveniently one mile away. Newark Airport is approximately a 15 minute drive. Taxi service to and from your destination is literally a whistle away. Great night life and fabulous restaurants adorn the downtown Jersey City and Hoboken area. description:
The space
MINIMUM STAY OF 5 MONTHS REQUIRED.

A 1,000 square foot, 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom furnished apartment with an open kitchen and tons of closet space. The apartment is on the fifth floor with lots of windows and natural light, new hardwood floors, and high ceilings. The master bedroom features a private bathroom with a whirlpool bath and wide, open city views, as well as special, sound-proof windows.

Heat and hot water are INCLUDED in the rent. Electricity and private Internet must be paid for by the tenant although there is usually unsecured wi-fi in the building that can be used for free.

The apartment is cable ready for broadband internet access and cable TV.

name: Minutes to Manhattan & Jersey Shore
description:
Walking to distance to Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island with New York City Skyline.

The space
Located in the up and coming Lafayette neighborhood, you are invited to enjoy the first floor of a hundred plus year old brownstone that has been completely renovated and wraps you in old world charm.

This is NOT a shared space. You will have complete privacy in your own private apartment.
The rooms are large, spacious, and airy. The kitchen is modern and is fully supplied with dishes and cookware, with a gas range, stainless steel refrigerator, granite counter top, and large dinning table. The bathroom is tastefully designed; complete with full sized bathtub and quality shower heads. Fresh linens and towels are included. Rest peacefully on a queen sized foam mattress bed. There is one very large closet and a one smaller one that is sure to accommodate your storage needs.

In the evenings, you can relax on a patio and enjoy a cigar,

The space
Lovely newly renovated, 4 room apartment with separate entrance in private Victorian home in Jersey City Heights - close to New York City.

Quiet tree lined street with view of Empire State Building and a green backyard in the spring and summer. Two bedrooms - one with full size bed for a couple, and the other with a single bed. Sheets and towels are of course provided. The living room also has a futon which can accommodate another two people. (The price for additional guests is $10. per person for children and $20. for adults) Great kitchen with all new appliances and everything you need to cook. Approx 200 sqft (18m2) (small but you will have the convenience of privacy with a whole studio for yourself). New furniture. Includes wifi and Air Condicioner. Fridge & micro-oven available (No kitchen, stove or oven available). Long built-in closet and south orientation & two large windows. Storage available off-unit.

neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood is safe and trendy. It’s a great neighborhood for New York City commuters and travelers as well as for those that want to enjoy a bit more calmness than Manhattan while being minutes away from it.

Aside from the proximity to the underground transportation with Manhattan and other parts of New Jersey, you will have in less than 5 minutes walk a large diversity of exciting cafes, restaurants, bars, shops, yoga studios, gyms and a great supermarket (Keyfood).

In less than 15 minutes walk you will reach a large shopping mall, a multiplex movie theater, several parks, and the riverside with some of the best views in the New York Metropolitan Area. If you want more shopping, next to the Newport Mall, you can find Shoprite, BJ’S Wholesale, Bed Bath & Beyond, The Home Depot and Target.

Enjoy this studio, that accommodates 2 people. It also includes wifi.

For Long Term Rental only ( minimum 28 days ). Cozy and bright Studio loft apartment on the ground floor with direct access to the garden ( perfect for smokers ). Best for 2 people but could accommodate up to 4 with the loft bed. Very convenient location in Jersey City, only a 5-minutes walk to Journal Square Path Train subway station and 15 to 20 minutes train ride to NYC. Laundry available in the building.

The space
Cozy and bright loft apartment on the ground floor of a 2 story house in Jersey City with direct access to a garden ( great for smokers ). Completely private.
It is located in Jersey City, only a 7 minute walk to Journal Square Path train subway station which is very convenient location to reach Manhattan in 10 / 15 min subway ride.

The loft is one open space where there is the kitchen, one full bathroom, one loft bed and a futon bed that can accommodate 2 more people and a sofa. Max number of people I can host is 4.

Th
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood is seconds from "Little India", which offers low-budget to formal Indian dining, in addition to Filipino, Latin American, and Egyptian cuisine, reflecting the city's wide ethnic population. Downtown Jersey City is also minutes away and offers a big variety of Bars and Restaurants.

Jersey City is just across the Hudson river, and it's closer and better connected to the heart of Manhattan than some boroughs and locations in New York City. It is literally 10 minutes away from Downtown Manhattan by subway (path train) and 15mn away from Greenwich Village and midtown. The Path Train runs all day and all night on a schedule.

name: Calming room, Comfy bed, Caring host
description:
My safe, clean apartment is nestled in the charming town of Hoboken, an inexpensive place to stay while exploring NYC. From vintage/antique shops to nightclubs to French cafes, Hoboken has a variety of things to do.
Many guests have been impressed with how quiet it is. A bonus- you can see the Empire State Building from the attached balcony!

The space
The large bedroom has an ample closet for guests' use, balcony with table and two chairs (upon request) and 32" TV with Netflix and blu-ray player. All linens are provided as well as welcome snacks and filtered water. The common spaces feature hardwood floors, stainless steel kitchen appliances and bathtub.

Guest access
Guests are free hang out with us in the living room and dine at the bar height table. The kitchen is available for cooking and limited food storage- please feel free to live here as if it is your own. I live in the home and take pride in it- there are no locks on the bedro
neighborhood_overview: Hoboken is a walking town, and if you're up early in the morning you can wave to the firemen across the street and join the hundreds of commuters making their way to the PATH train. Stroll up and down Washington St, enjoying the many small shops and restaurants as well as the waterfront with the best views of the NYC skyline and well-kept parks along the water. In the summer, one of the piers becomes a sunning area where you can sip a cold beer while lounging in one of the beach chairs!
host_location: Hoboken, New Jersey, United States
host_about:
I have lived in Hoboken for 7 years now and I love this charming little town. It's full of life and new things happening all the time.  
I like seeing new people all the time and travel myself as well. If I'm at home which is not too often, I'm happy to share a meal or just chit chat.

name: Nice Apt -10 minutes to Manhattan
description:
Large apartment in Downtown Jersey City, steps from the Grove street Path station, less than 10 minutes away from Downtown Manhattan (World Trade Center.)

The space
Situated on the ground floor of a 19th century townhouse, this open-space apartment is spacious, quiet and fun. It features hardwood floors, a small kitchen with direct access to the garden. There is a queen-sized bed as well as a comfortable futon, so four persons can easily stay in the apartment. There's also a nice-sized closet space and an empty chest of drawers.

The living room has a seating area with DirectTV and free Wifi. The kitchen has a gas range, a fridge, a microwave as well as basic utensils and a washing machine for the laundry. The bathroom has a bathtub/shower.

The apartment is located in Historic Downtown Jersey City, just across the Hudson river from Manhattan (only 2 blocks from the Grove street PATH subway which offer direct and 24/7 access to Manhattan.). T
neighborhood_overview:
Mercer Street is in the heart of Historic Downtown/Van Vorst areas of Jersey City anchored by the Grove Street PATH station. When not exploring Manhattan, there is much to do in Jersey City. These include:
* walking along the Hudson River Waterfront for great views of Manhattan or venturing over to Hoboken for the great bar scene
* checking out the great restaurants in the area
* visiting massive Liberty State Park which has ferry service to Ellis Island and the Statue of Liberty
* taking the kids to the Liberty Science Center
* attending the Farmers' Market or the live music performances at Grove Square: http://www.jcdowntown.org/
* shopping at the Newport Center Mall or the local boutiques scattered on Grove Street or finding a bargain at the flea market on Saturday's at Van Vorst Park
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about: We love to travel and meet new people. Bob is originally from Connecticut and Francois from France, we've been living in NY/NJ for twenty years. We also like art, music and movies. host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
We have been providing vacation rental apartments for over 10 years across the East Coast. We are known for our distinctively furnished apartments in popular locations, and for our attentive service. You’ll find that our rates are quite reasonable. If you're looking for a safe, comfortable place with fabulous amenities and Wi-Fi (we know you need the Wi-Fi!) in the Boston MA area, Washington DC, Miami FL or very close to NYC in Jersey City or Hoboken, we'd love to host you. Many of the buildings where our apartments are located feature amenities such as beautiful lobbies, 24 hour front desk staff, fitness centers, business centers, recreation rooms, indoor or outdoor pools and whirlpools. If you are traveling with children, some buildings offer playgrounds (many buildings are near public playgrounds as well) or indoor playrooms. Depending on the location, you can stay for just a few days, a week, a month or more. 

We offer an assortment of short-term apartments in sizes ranging from a studio to three bedrooms that are fully furnished with all the comforts of home. Our local staff meticulously prepares your apartment before your arrival, and we offer 24 hour assistance for any emergencies after business hours. When you arrive at your apartment, the beds will be made, towels and bath amenities will be stocked in the bathrooms, and the coffee maker will be set up in the kitchen with some sample coffees, sweetener and creamer (teabags too if that is your preference) to start your morning off properly. I am a college student and spend most of my time at my school library however I am a

host_location: New Jersey, United States
host_about:
I am highly energetic and eager to get to know new everything.  Love restaurants with good food and great  wine ists that does not attempt to break my bank. 

I believe in making new friends and keeping old ones.
Food should be a conversation point, enjoyable and certainly not to be used to exclude others.  If it does, its not food but a social ladder, it gives me vertigo.
If you put me in a box, I will round it up into an expanding circle because a person does not  express themselves in one way only and everybody has a complex side

I love Nature, Dogs and Coffee, not necessarily in that order
I respect all people, all races and all types of natures, after all that is why we are here to explore and enjoy this beautiful earth that is at our disposal.

I avoid disrespectful people, I believe somewhere in life they lost their ability to hear others and learnt to hear only themselves.  will give them an option to an even exchange after which I do not believe community beneficial for both of us.

I love to laugh at myself, it stops me from taking myself too seriously and believing that I am better than everybody.  There is always better or lesser than me.  Thats just different nothing to crow about or en depressed about.

I love a starry nice - need I say ore?

name: 2 BR APT. Jersey City, Heights close to NYC!
description:
Welcome to Jersey City! Located 2 min from the Holland Tunnel, which glides you into Manhattan NY you have this beautiful, cozy 2 bedroom 1st floor apartment. Location with this unit is key. Right in front of the house, Bus #119 runs every 20-30 min going to New York City. The Journal Square train station is a simple 12-15 min walk and it provides you with direct train service to World Trade Center and Manhattan. Area is very safe & clean & I provide 1 guaranteed parking spot for all my guests!

The space
This apartment is not a shared unit. It is a separate apartment part of a 3 floor home. It is located in the bottom (GROUND) floor (not basement apartment) of the house with separate, private gated entrance and electronic door key code. There are a total 4 beds in the space. 2 sofa beds in the living room and 1 bed in each of the bedrooms. As you can see in the pictures, this unit does not include a dining room table, but there is a counter with 4 fold-able chair
neighborhood_overview:
Busy and active during the day with sounds of public transportation and people either going to work or children going to school.

Keep in mind, Jersey City is a big city and any city for that matter close to NY, will be active and noisy at times during the day.

However, at night, the neighborhood is super quiet and very peaceful.
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about: Hello, My name is Jose. I I have been an AIRBNB host for about 4 years now and I absolutely love it. I love giving good people a great place to relax and unwind to as long as they are on vacation. I am very humble, responsive, and approachable. As long as you are my guests, you and your family will be safe and well taken care of under my roof. This unit is a 3 family unit, which is only occupied by 3 people. The apartment is separate, isolated, and very peaceful for your leisure. Book me now!! I'll be more then glad to have ya!

name: DWTN Jersey City Art Studio Apt, long term stays
description:
Art studio apt. in downtown Jersey City. Completely renovated with custom Murphy bed, radiant floor heating and A/C, gas cooktop, bathroom w/walk-in shower, and private street entrance. It is a 12-min. walk to PATH station; then two stops to World Trade Center (NYC) or 6 stops to mid-town NYC.

The space
This ground floor, studio apartment is in downtown Jersey City, where I live part of the year. You have one full-time neighbor upstairs. The building was originally built in 1885 but fully renovated in 2015. The apartment is a studio and has a water heater and water pump in the unit that run occasionally. You will occasionally hear the appliances as well as the upstairs guest footfall ... Ear plugs for sleeping are the simple solution if complete silence is needed.

Guest access
You will have access to the entire studio apartment and small backyard.

Other things to note
Parking is limited in Jersey City so I don't re
neighborhood_overview:
Jersey City is exploding with new restaurants, high rises, and notoriety ... it is the new hot spot to live in the NYC metro area. You will find one of the best restaurants (Madame Claude's) one block from my place, but there are lots of great bars and restaurants nearby.

RESTAURANTS/BARS:
Madame Claude's - amazing French food, killer brunch, fantastic Parisian music Thursday nights ... get a reservation. (1 min. walk)
Porta - great pizza (10 min.)
Talde - pricey, but memorable (10 min.)
Mathews - haven't been, but heard it's great. (12 min.)
White Star - local dive bar w/solid food (3 min.)
Third and Vine - wine and cheese bar (3 min.)
Ibby's Falafel - great falafel sandwich (14 min.)
Pet Shop - used to be local pet shop, now it's a bar (8 min.)
Dullboy - cocktail lounge w/NYC vibe (12 min.)
BeClaws - if you want seafood (7 min.)
Taqueria - great fish, pork tacos (13 min.)
White Horse - fine dining,

I am an innovation scout for the construction industry.  I love what I do ... and travel quite a bit.  I live part of the year in Jersey City, part of the year in AZ, and part of the year in NC. 

Cheerio

name: Dr Norton House@Lincoln Park JC,NJ
description:
Private, large apt in Victorian House in Historic Lincoln Park section of Jersey City. 1 mile to JSQ PATH train to NYC/Hoboken. Bus on corner to NYC! Hardwd flrs, 12 foot ceilings, new kitchen, 1.5 baths, 2 BR + pull out sofa, TV, WiFi, laundry.

The space
1st flr apt of beautiful Victorian House in Historic Lincoln Park section of Jersey City. We just installed brand new central A/C and heat system! Stunning hardwood floors have just been redone, 12 foot ceilings, new kitchen, 1.5 baths, 2 BR (1 queen, 1 full) + pull out sofa, TV, WiFi, laundry. 1 mi from JSQ PATH train to NYC/Hoboken. Bus on corner to NYC!

This is a beautiful, comfortable space with all the amenities you may need. You can walk 50 yards to catch the #10 bus that brings you 1 mile to Journal Square where you can catch the PATH train to NYC, Hoboken or Newark, which connects you to NJ Transit trains to everywhere! You can also catch the #119 bus right on the corner to Port Authority i
neighborhood_overview:
It is one mile from the Journal Square transportation center (JSQ on the PATH line). From JSQ, you can take the PATH to Newark and catch the NJ Transit trains. You can also go to Hoboken, World Trade Center or take the 33rd Street line to Greenwich Village or uptown. It takes less than one hour to get to 33rd St via PATH. There is a bus stop right on the corner about 100 feet away. From there, you can get the bus to JSQ or directly into Port Authority in NYC, which puts you right near Times Square and the theater district. The bus to Port Authority usually takes 45-60 minutes. We are one block from Lincoln Park, which offers great walks and opportunities to work out, including jogging paths and a track.
We are 5 blocks from St. Peter's University, 1.5 miles to NJCU and a mile from Hudson County Community College.
We are also very close to Liberty State Park, which is one of the most visited state parks in the country! You can get a ferry to the Statue of Liberty or Ellis Is
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about: I am a lifelong resident of Jersey City, NJ. I work in Hoboken, NJ. I also have spent much of my life at the Jersey Shore. I travel a fair amount and spend a lot of time in New England, specifically Maine and Martha's Vineyard. I am a hairdresser and musician. Piano is my main instrument. I am also a licensed social worker in NJ!  If you are coming to the NJ/NY area, I hope you consider staying here at the beautiful apartment in the Dr. Norton House! I can help you find all sorts of great things to do and places to eat and visit. Contact me for any further questions or info!

name: Historic Brownstone in Jersey City
description:
Private floor in a Victorian brownstone with 2 berms, bath and a kitchenette. Easy street parking or parking 1 block offsite at $10/day. In historic neighborhood; quick assess to Manhattan, NJ turnpike, EWR, Path train, MetLife Stadium.

The space
The accommodation consists of a very large and spacious double bedroom with a private bathroom and kitchenette for your sole use on the second floor of our newly restored brownstone in the historic West Side district of Jersey City.

The room has a queen size bed in an alcove, with a living area for working or relaxing. There is also a second bedroom on the same floor that is available for larger groups or families. Both rooms have original marble mantles with wood floors. The two rooms are joined together by a small, but fully equipped, kitchenette with gas hob, microwave and fridge. We never have more than one booking at any one time, so it will always be just your travelling party staying with us.

description:
Luxury 2 bedroom/2 bathroom in Hoboken.

host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States

We also love to travel, and our favorite places to visit so far are the west coast of Ireland, Prague, San Francisco and the Yucatan peninsula. The space
The apartment is a studio in a newly renovated brownstone in downtown Jersey City. What's not to love about newly furnished and updated accomodations that has separate access and is completely independent from the rest of the house.

The apartment has a queen size murphy bed and a full size sleeper couch that can sleep an additional one or two guests. There is a dining room table and chairs for those eat-in meals. The kitchen is amply equiped to allow for preparation of meals.

neighborhood_overview:
The best thing about the neighborhood is the access to New York City. You can get into NYC quicker from downtown Jersey City than you can from some of the outer boroughs, and at $2.50 a ride, it's the best deal in town. NYC hotels come with a hefty price-tag - the smart money is on staying outside Manhattan while enjoying the comforts of home!!
The apartment is on a quiet tree lined residential street, just 3 short blocks to Hamilton park a beautiful park I might add, with lots of activities and festivities for kids and adults that are hosted there, 3 short blocks to the local supermarket, 10 min walking distance to Newport Mall and it's in the heart of the downtown area affording you quick access to a variety of restaurants example Sa`tis which has been featured in the,The New York Times,Inside Jersey, North TSL,The Star-Ledger etc Ibby's falafel voted the best in New Jersey and a host of others offering the best of Jersey City.

name: Cozy Loft Space In Funky Jersey City Record Store!
description:
A cozy studio apartment in the back of an actual functioning record store. Located in a beautiful 1920s pharmacy, it's just an 8 minute walk to the subway, then 10 min into NYC. Simple, functional kitchen & bathroom (separate from sleeping area), cable TV, internet, tempurpedic bed, COMFY AND CHARMING!

The space
Your Jersey City home will be a studio apartment of a 1920s antique pharmacy storefront, complete with beautiful dark wood, phone booths and sliding wooden ladders. This store was the actual pharmacy for the Italian/Irish immigrants in the neighborhood, hence the medicine bottles and other antiques in the showcases. To get to the living space, you walk through the front door of the store to the back staircase and then left up to the living space. The upstairs apartment hovers above the store and your bedroom looks down onto the record store itself (see photo). The kitchen table upstairs looks out onto a courtyard and the bathroom adjoins the eating area.
neighborhood_overview: We are located in the old "Italian Village" section of Jersey City, now simply known as "The Village." There's Madame Claude's bistro two blocks away (French) and a bunch of great restaurants on the way to the PATH train on Newark Avenue. Safe and quiet, our neighborhood is lovely. Rent from us and we will include our "Email Guide To Jersey City & NYC," which includes our special, inside look at the area, including restaurant recommendations and the best way to approach New York City. This guide will be on the kitchen table when you arrive.
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about: A self-styled entrepreneur, fluent in the world of baseball and music. I call the New York area home, but am equally comfortable in Quebec City or Europe. I love sharing my apartments with people from all over the world and learning from each experience. It's important to stop and enjoy life, to read books, to hang out with friends. Money matters, but money is not everything. It seems to me that massive perspective can make someone very wise, that we are not on this earth for a long time, that we should plant trees that we will not sit under. My apartments are filled with books, music and film that echo these notions. So enjoy! And I look forward to meeting you.

name: Safe, Clean, Minutes from NYC train
description:
If you're tired of just another IKEA-fied, soul-less apartment and need a little life and love during your stay, come be with us.
Whether your destination is the beautiful and charming town of Hoboken, or you simply need a less expensive place from which to commute to NYC, this is a perfect place to call your own. Enjoy peace and quiet- a 15 min walk to the PATH train to NYC.

The space
Your room now features Ecoden cervical pillows just to complete the comfy bed package! This classy, simple bedroom with queen bed, clothing racks and work desk is the perfect quiet getaway from the electric energy of the city. Come home at the end of the day to relax in a clean environment with comfy couches in the living room to make you feel right at home. The room is best enjoyed by two people- more than that is uncomfortable and a bit much for the shared bathroom.

Guest access
Guests are free to use the bathroom and kitchen facilities, providing the
neighborhood_overview: Hoboken is a very walkable, charming town full of young professionals who love to go out on the town, the center of which is about 8 blocks from my apartment. You get the best of both worlds- close to activity, but far enough away to wind down and relax.
host_location: Hoboken, New Jersey, United States
host_about:
I have lived in Hoboken for 7 years now and I love this charming little town. It's full of life and new things happening all the time.  
I like seeing new people all the time and travel myself as well. If I'm at home which is not too often, I'm happy to share a meal or just chit chat.

name: 1st Floor Brownstone in Jersey City
description:
The rooms being offered are located on the 1st floor of this late 19th century brownstone.

The space
The rooms being offered are located on the 1st floor of this late 19th century brownstone. There is a bedroom with a queen sized mattress and a pullout sofa. There is also a kitchen with a refrigerator, stove and dining area. The last room, which faces the front of the street, is the living room. It features a large space and all of the rooms have very high 12 foot ceilings. From the outside, this apartment doesn't look that big from the outside. However, once you get into the building, you realize that there is a lot of space. The 19th century architecture creates a cozy feel that will make you glad you stayed here.

Guest access
You will have access to a dining room, full kitchen with a refrigerator and stove. The bathroom has an additional closet, shower and toilet. It is not shared.

name: CLEAN AND SAFE!  Downtown loft - steps to NYC!
description:
CLEAN AND SAFE!  We take cleaning seriously so you can feel comfortable throughout your stay.  Your health and safety are our top priorities.  We follow cleaning and sanitization protocols from the CDC, Airbnb and the NJ Department of Health to ensure a safe, healthy and comfortable stay for our guests.

The space
Cleaning, Disinfection and Sterilization Procedures
•  Housekeepers perform a deep cleaning and sanitization between each stay to clean and sanitize your apartment thoroughly.
•  Bedroom linens, towels, kitchen towels and bath mats are washed and fully sanitized, all mattresses and pillows are covered with mattress and pillow covers for an extra layer of protection.
•  Amenities such as shampoo, conditioner, and body wash bottles are sanitized and disinfected. Frequently touched surfaces (light switches, doorknobs, faucets, remote controls, etc.) are thoroughly disinfected and given an extra level of priority.

Soaring 13' beamed

Tree-lined streets and beautiful brownstones. Restaurants, bars and shopping close by.

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about: I grew up in a bed and breakfast, with twenty strangers-turned-friends at the breakfast table every morning, so sharing my home with fellow travelers seems natural to me.  I've called New York home since 2000 and have also lived in France, Ecuador, Chile, and Australia.  I love planning my next trip and would be happy to help you plan yours.  If you need any advice on navigating New York, let me know!

name: Lux 1 Bedroom w/wifi at Newport Jersey City
description:
Overlooking the breathtaking Manhattan skyline & harbor this luxury 40 story high-rise offers great amenities including a community center equipped with billiards, a gaming area and flat screen televisions, as well as a newly renovated fitness center.

The space
Your new home is beautifully designed with luxury features including granite kitchen counter tops, hardwood floors & carpeting, walk-in closets, in unit washer/dryer, individual heat/air conditioning and alarm system.

Your fully appointed apartment is furnished with all the necessities of home, including linens and towels.

Property amenities include:

• Controlled access
• Resident lounge
• Meeting room
• Clubhouse
• Large newly remodeled fitness center with new equipment
• Sun Deck
• Community room with billiards, gaming area, flat screen TVs, fireplace & computers
• Children's play area with flat screen TV
•On-site restaurant
neighborhood_overview:
This apartment building is located directly across the Hudson River from New York City, within a large commerce hub in Jersey City, New Jersey. Guests can enjoy local entertainment and delicious eatery from the local shops and restaurants located within walking distance.
This location is known as one of the most diverse cities on the East Coast and a perfect destination; not only for business but also leisure travelers. Jersey City is a hub of industry with its oil refineries, warehouses, and plants. Although known for its industrial prowess, Jersey City’s gem is Liberty State Park, which offers impeccable views of Manhattan, the Statue of Liberty, and Ellis Island.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
We have been providing vacation rental apartments for over 10 years across the East Coast. We are known for our distinctively furnished apartments in popular locations, and for our attentive service. You’ll find that our rates are quite reasonable. If you're looking for a safe, comfortable place with fabulous amenities and Wi-Fi (we know you need the Wi-Fi!) in the Boston MA area, Washington DC, Miami FL or very close to NYC in Jersey City or Hoboken, we'd love to host you. Many of the buildings where our apartments are located feature amenities such as beautiful lobbies, 24 hour front desk staff, fitness centers, business centers, recreation rooms, indoor or outdoor pools and whirlpools. If you are traveling with children, some buildings offer playgrounds (many buildings are near public playgrounds as well) or indoor playrooms. Depending on the location, you can stay for just a few days, a week, a month or more. 

We offer an assortment of short-term apartments in sizes ranging from a studio to three bedrooms that are fully furnished with all the comforts of home. Our local staff meticulously prepares your apartment before your arrival, and we offer 24 hour assistance for any emergencies after business hours. When you arrive at your apartment, the beds will be made, towels and bath amenities will be stocked in the bathrooms, and the coffee maker will be set up in the kitchen with some sample coffees, sweetener and creamer (teabags too if that is your preference) to start your morning off properly. If you’d like to cook a meal, the kitchen is stocked with dishes, cutlery, glassware and pots and pans. The living room is set up with a TV and cable channels, and the Wi-Fi router password and instructions will be prominently displayed so you can get connected quickly. You can also make local and toll-free phone calls at no charge. 

Please contact us to confirm the exact availability of the apartment you are interested in. We’d love to host you (and your family) for your vacation or business trip.
neighbourhood: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States

name: Modern 3 Bdr with great Reviews
description:
My renovated apt in a 1922 building is quiet clean, and family freindly. This oasis is a very convenient bus ride to Times Square, NYC and walking to Hoboken. Also a block away from Washington Park and the famous Coach House Diner.

The space
This oasis is on the border of Jersey City Heights, North Bergen, Hoboken, Secaucus and Jersey City. At first glance the neighborhood isn't pretty but very safe and convenient so when you are back home you will feel relaxed and taken care of. The neighborhood is mostly Latin and has the flavor of Cuba, Equador and the Dominican Republic.
My 3 bedroom apartment is spacious and designed so that it flows easily for 4-5 people. Family and business travelers friendly. Although it has one bathroom it's like a spa tucked away yet the shower's window opens and can feel like an outdoor shower experience.

You will have access to the whole apartment which includes washer dryer, full kitchen, Sonos wireless stereo, free
neighborhood_overview: This oasis is on the border of Jersey City Heights, North Bergen, Hoboken, Secaucus and Jersey City. At first glance the neighborhood isn't pretty but very safe and convenient so when you are back home you will feel relaxed and taken care of. The neighborhood is mostly Latin and has the flavor of Cuba, Equador and the Dominican Republic. I love the Cuban and Latin restaurants within walking of the apartment. Of course I also love the famous Coach House Diner which is open 24 hours. You don't really need a car here because everything is so convenient including easy and inexpensive access to Manhattan.
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about: Hi - I am an easy going entrepreneur who has traveled a lot in my previous years. I lived in Japan and have moved around with my family when I was young.  I am always curious and like to learn.  I like my home to be neat and not cluttered.  When I rent in other destinations I look for neatness and no clutter too! You will feel comfortable in my home.

name: Studio at heart of Downtown JC.
description:
Studio at a recently renovated building. Approx 230 sqft (23m2) (small but you will have the convenience of total privacy and a whole studio for yourself). Long built-in closets with sliding doors South orientation & two large windows. Fridge available (No kitchen, stove or oven available). High-speed Internet. 5-Minutes walk to Path at Grove Station. 20 min to Manhattan. 5-minute walk to facilities like supermarkets, laundries. No Pets. Storage available off-unit.

The space
LIVING & BEDROOM: The apartment includes a QUEEN-SIZE bed and a large closet. We provide sets of linens and towels for your use. The bedroom also included a table and two chairs to fit, comfortably a group of 2 people.

KITCHEN: There is no kitchen where you can cook in the studio but there is a sink in case you want to order or prepare something simple at the counter. there is a small fridge.

BATHROOM: enjoy the rain shower in the bathroom.

STORAGE: For the
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood is safe and trendy. It’s a great neighborhood for New York City commuters and travelers as well as for those that want to enjoy a bit more calmness than Manhattan while being minutes away from it.

Aside from the proximity to the underground transportation with Manhattan and other parts of New Jersey, you will have in less than 5 minutes walk a large diversity of exciting cafes, restaurants, bars, shops, yoga studios, gyms and a great supermarket (Keyfood).

In less than 15 minutes walk you will reach a large shopping mall, a multiplex movie theater, several parks, and the riverside with some of the best views in the New York Metropolitan Area. If you want more shopping, next to the Newport Mall, you can find Shoprite, BJ’S Wholesale, Bed Bath & Beyond, The Home Depot and Target.

Enjoy this studio, that accommodates 2 people. It also includes wifi and TV.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about: Spanish architect with offices in Madrid, Chennai and New York. Passionate about traveling and understanding other ways of living and thinking. I had the fortune to live and work on five continents. I use Airbnb to both host and travel as a guest.

name: Historic Downtown Jersey City
description:
Less than 15 minutes from Manhattan by PATH- Vibrant downtown Jersey City offers diverse restaurants, authentic French and Italian bakeries, quaint parks, farmer's markets and a night time Hudson River view of the sparkling New York City skyline.

The space
We appreciate it’s a scary time to travel. We have your clean and germ free landing place taken care of - and a goldfish to keep you company! Bright and quiet one bedroom apartment located is Historic Downtown. Five blocks from the Grove Street PATH Station.
One queen sized bed, and a full sized futon in the living room. Perfect for a couple or a family of four. The apartment is not ideal for four adults but works well for families of 4 or less when 2 are children.
We also have pack-n-play for small children or babies.
And plenty of closet space in the entry hall.
Washer and dryer and a grocery store a block away.

Guest access
Guests have access to their own washer
neighborhood_overview: Ideal location for a New York visit.  Plenty of hip spots here in Jersey City - but let's face it - New York is right next door!
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about: Jennifer and Roland fell in love in Washington DC, and now live in their dream home in downtown Jersey City.  Jennifer works in Midtown Manhattan and Roland works in his home-office.  They have three teenagers - real New Yorkers, smart, sassy and worldly.  And they travel often to see their family in California, Israel, France and Germany.  Come and stay with us!

This ultra-modern Jersey City apartment community is the symbol of comfort and sophistication. Synonymous with luxury, this enclave of elegant apartment homes will welcome you with the finest features, fixtures, and finishes. Services include 24-hour concierge, wifi in common areas, and bike stor
neighborhood_overview: The property is conveniently located about 25 minutes from Newark Liberty International Airport. Public transportation is also easily accessible – shuttle service to PATH/Ferry & just a short walk to the NY Waterway Ferry, Hudson-Bergen light rail, and the PATH.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
We have been providing vacation rental apartments for over 10 years across the East Coast. We are known for our distinctively furnished apartments in popular locations, and for our attentive service. You’ll find that our rates are quite reasonable. If you're looking for a safe, comfortable place with fabulous amenities and Wi-Fi (we know you need the Wi-Fi!) in the Boston MA area, Washington DC, Miami FL or very close to NYC in Jersey City or Hoboken, we'd love to host you. Many of the buildings where our apartments are located feature amenities such as beautiful lobbies, 24 hour front desk staff, fitness centers, business centers, recreation rooms, indoor or outdoor pools and whirlpools. If you are traveling with children, some buildings offer playgrounds (many buildings are near public playgrounds as well) or indoor playrooms. Depending on the location, you can stay for just a few days, a week, a month or more. 

We offer an assortment of short-term apartments in sizes ranging from a studio to three bedrooms that are fully furnished with all the comforts of home. Our local staff meticulously prepares your apartment before your arrival, and we offer 24 hour assistance for any emergencies after business hours. When you arrive at your apartment, the beds will be made, towels and bath amenities will be stocked in the bathrooms, and the coffee maker will be set up in the kitchen with some sample coffees, sweetener and creamer (teabags too if that is your preference) to start your morning off properly. If you’d like to cook a meal, the kitchen is stocked with dishes, cutlery, glassware and pots and pans. The living room is set up with a TV and cable channels, and the Wi-Fi router password and instructions will be prominently displayed so you can get connected quickly. You can also make local and toll-free phone calls at no charge. 

Please contact us to confirm the exact availability of the apartment you are interested in. We’d love to host you (and your family) for your vacation or business trip.

name: Private Room in Historical Downtown Jersey City.
description:
Excellent for the solo traveler on business or on an adventure.

The space
Come and stay in a heritage, sunny 2 bedroom apartment. Located in the Italian quater, in the Historical Downtown Jersey City Area. Minutes from the heart of Manhattan, with a stunning view of the World Trade Center. The bedroom is elegantly furnished with the comfort and feel of being at home. Walk South to the water and be impressed with great views of The Statue of Liberty and Manhattan. Walk North, to Newport and dine on the Hudson, featuring the Manhattan Skyline. Quiet, yet so close to The Big Apple. Safe and pleasant neighborhood and very easy to get around on foot or by transport. Females only.

Guest access
Bathroom.

Other things to note
This is a shoes off house please leave shoes at the door before entering apartment. There is No Kitchen use.
neighborhood_overview: What I love about my neighborhood is, that it is quaint, with touches of history and artists. Some of the heritage buildings are a must see. Very close to Manhattan, with the New York City Skyline visible from some vantage spots.

name: 20 MINUTES FROM TIMES SQUARE!!
description:
This is a 2 bedroom house with kitchen, deck and backyard; and conveniently located only 20 minutes away from Time Square via bus; or just 30 minute away from downtown NY via Light Rail and Path trains.

Excellent location for visiting NYC without paying NYC rates.

The space
The bedrooms are well furnished. Both have full-sized bed, dresser and decent size closet; also includes 32" TV, Wi-fi; landlord pays utilities - excellent move in condition.

Guest access
The deck is shared with the house owners leaving next door.

Other things to note
$200.00 Cash Security deposit is required upon check in, which will be returned on check out.
neighborhood_overview: Safe, clean neighborhood with plenty of eateries, supermarkets, CVS, grocery stores, and laundry around the corner. As far as nightlife is concerned, this listing location supersedes all your expectations. A seven-minute drive will get you into Hoboken, NJ, which owns the record for most bars and restaurants along a one-square mile radius in the country! Then, of course you have new york city right next door. We are located 2 miles (15-20 minute Bus ride) from TIMES SQUARE/EMPIRE STATE BUILDING/BROADWAY THEATERS AND ALL OF NYC MIDTOWN GLORY. A block away from 24 hour transportation to NYC, Hoboken, and Jersey City. 10 minutes away from met life stadium, 20 minutes from EWR and 40 mins from JFK/LGA airports.

name: Sunny 2 flr Home, Mins from NYC
description:
This sunny 3 bedroom home has a warm and inviting feel, is 20-35 minutes from midtown New York City via bus that stops outside the home. The house has it's own entrance and there is no sharing.

We love this house and think you will too!

The space
We bought this home to live in and had to move due to schooling issues. But we still consider it our home. The feel of the home is bright and inviting with lovely details. Access to the deck and yard make it a great place to wonder. There are NYC skyline views from two of the 2nd floor bedrooms.

There is a spacious 3rd bedroom facing the street. Our block is busy and the traffic can be heard from this room. Most people haven't had issues but warning to light sleepers. The back two rooms are very quiet.

Guest access
This is a full home with its own entrance. You have access to a deck and a cute backyard (shared with a downstairs renter).

Other things to note<
neighborhood_overview:
Charming and unassuming neighborhood. We rented an apartment at the adjoining street (Ogden) and fell in love with the neighborhood. The park down the street has stunning views of the New York Skyline. And of course access to New York City is super fast, as it is to downtown JC and Hoboken. Below is an overview of some of our favorites in the neighborhood.

Laundry
We don’t have laundry in the building, but there’s a laundromat caddy corner from the apartment (as far as I can tell, its only name is “Laundromat.” You can either do your own or drop off for service, there prices are reasonable.


Supermarkets
Supremo Food Market, which is 5 blocks down Palisade ave. Take a left coming out of the apartment and it’s on your right. Decent supermarket with products geared to local Latino residents. Good prices. Nice bakery. There is a small parking lot across the street from the store.

StopNShop: Central Ave and Manhattan ave.

Sh
host_location: Princeton, New Jersey, United States
host_about:
I'm a father of three so my main functions involve transportation to athletic events. I work as an Editorial Director for a healthcare company and write plays. 

We used to live in the home we now rent out in Jersey City. We love it and miss it (moved for the schools). We generally don't get to meet our guests as we live about an hour away, but our caretaker is just around the corner and can handle anything.

Jersey City is a hub of industry with its oil refineries, warehouses, and plants. Although known for its industrial prowess, Jersey City’s gem is Liberty State Park, which offers impeccable views of Manhattan, the Statue of Liberty, and Ellis Island.

Your fully appointed apartment is furnished with all the necessities of home, including linens and towels.

Property amenities include:

neighborhood_overview:
This apartment building is located directly across the Hudson River from New York City, within a large commerce hub in Jersey City, New Jersey. Guests can enjoy local entertainment and delicious eatery from the local shops and restaurants located within walking distance.
This location is known as one of the most diverse cities on the East Coast and a perfect destination; not only for business but also leisure travelers. Jersey City is a hub of industry with its oil refineries, warehouses, and plants. Although known for its industrial prowess, Jersey City’s gem is Liberty State Park, which offers impeccable views of Manhattan, the Statue of Liberty, and Ellis Island.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
We have been providing vacation rental apartments for over 10 years across the East Coast. We are known for our distinctively furnished apartments in popular locations, and for our attentive service. You’ll find that our rates are quite reasonable. If you're looking for a safe, comfortable place with fabulous amenities and Wi-Fi (we know you need the Wi-Fi!) in the Boston MA area, Washington DC, Miami FL or very close to NYC in Jersey City or Hoboken, we'd love to host you. Many of the buildings where our apartments are located feature amenities such as beautiful lobbies, 24 hour front desk staff, fitness centers, business centers, recreation rooms, indoor or outdoor pools and whirlpools. If you are traveling with children, some buildings offer playgrounds (many buildings are near public playgrounds as well) or indoor playrooms. Depending on the location, you can stay for just a few days, a week, a month or more. 

We offer an assortment of short-term apartments in sizes ranging from a studio to three bedrooms that are fully furnished with all the comforts of home. Our local staff meticulously prepares your apartment before your arrival, and we offer 24 hour assistance for any emergencies after business hours. When you arrive at your apartment, the beds will be made, towels and bath amenities will be stocked in the bathrooms, and the coffee maker will be set up in the kitchen with some sample coffees, sweetener and creamer (teabags too if that is your preference) to start your morning off properly. If you’d like to cook a meal, the kitchen is stocked with dishes, cutlery, glassware and pots and pans. The living room is set up with a TV and cable channels, and the Wi-Fi router password and instructions will be prominently displayed so you can get connected quickly. You can also make local and toll-free phone calls at no charge. 

Please contact us to confirm the exact availability of the apartment you are interested in. We’d love to host you (and your family) for your vacation or business trip.

name: Small Bedroom for a Solo Traveler
description:
A single bedroom with 1.5 shared bathrooms (with 1 person only) in a 3 Bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms townhouse duplex apartment located in the heart of downtown Jersey City. Close to all the cafes, restaurants, bars and above all, Grove St. PATH to NYC.

The space
This is a 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath, 2 storey duplex apartment. I am offering my small bedroom for a single traveler. 1 full and 1 half bathrooms will be shared between you and just one other person. Out of the 2 other bedrooms, one is occupied by myself and the 2nd one is on airbnb as well. My work is in Philadelphia so I am hardly here during the weekdays. The apartment is huge, bright and airy. It is super close to PATH, great restaurants, bars and all the cool hangouts in the area. Waterfront with breathtaking views of NYC skyline is merely 5 minutes relaxing walk from the apartment. A very ideal place for anyone who wants to stay as close to New York City as possible without paying the astronomical city prices.
neighborhood_overview:
It is a very family friendly yet energetic neighborhood with lots of young couples, kids and single professionals. Plenty of local entertainment. You'll find a variety of restaurants and coffee shops, as well as easily accessible super markets, and even a movie theater, walking distance away. Spring, summer and fall times are particularly great, as you can experience weekly farmers markets, street performances and many other attractions hosted in the local parks and squares.

The New Jersey PATH train is located less than 4 short blocks away, which is about a 4 minutes walk. This is an underground train, which gets you to Manhattan in as little as 2 stops.

host_about: An entrepreneur by profession and a traveler and foodie by passion. Being able to offer my place to all the fellow airbnb-ers visiting New York City is just my way of reciprocating/spreading or passing on the airbnb love!

Not located in downtown Jersey City and very limited availability of stores/restaurants in the neighborhood.

The space

neighborhood_overview:
- Not a greatest neighborhood in Jersey City. We are one Light Rail stop off from the most developed/expensive part of JC (and the contrast is quite clear). You will notice graffiti as well as bars covering the windows (but the crime rate is not at all high compared to surrounding area including downtown JC based on public statistics). Some of our guests were not comfortable being in the neighborhood and it took for our family to get used to it.
- The neighborhood could be noisy due to freight railway that passes nearby and a neighbor who plays loud music outside every few Saturday.
- Limited supermarkets and restaurants availability (a few small convenient stores in the neighborhood but, for a decent supermaket, you will have to take light rail to Hudson Greene Market near Exchange Place station.)

description:
Manhattan is only 20- 30 minutes away, by bus or subway. Buses to Times Square/Port Authority are a 3 minute walk from the house. The Journal Square Path subway station is a 15 minute walk, or quick shuttle bus ride.

Relax and unwind in our comfortable, eclectic six room space after a day of sightseeing. This large apartment occupies the entire 1st floor of a 1910s era home in Jersey City's 'The Heights' neighborhood. The residential area is quiet and safe.

STR20-00054 7/22/2020

The space
★APARTMENT: Guests have the 1000+ square foot apartment--two bedrooms, living/dining rooms, eat-in kitchen and bathroom. Although we live in the same house as the Airbnb, we work to ensure our guests' privacy.

★PARKING/TRANSPORTATION: Please refer to the 'getting around' section for full for details on all parking rules. A visitor parking permit is required Monday-Friday at a cost of $5 per day for guests who are driving.

★
neighborhood_overview:
"The Heights" in Jersey City overlooks Hoboken, Manhattan and the Meadowlands and is home to Jersey City's oldest home, built in 1742. There are two small parks within walking distance, Pershing Field and Gordon Park. There are also local grocery, limited restaurants/deli and liquor stores within walking distance.

Please note "the Heights" is not the waterfront/downtown section of Jersey City. It is a residential, rather than commercial, neighborhood.

*We recommend, if possible that guests fly into Newark Airport, in Newark, NJ as this is a much shorter trip to the house than either JFK or LaGuardia airports.

name: Entire Private Apartment
description:
Close to all public transportation & Manhattan. Bright, airy, beautiful and peaceful, furnished w/ elegant antiques, complete privacy with full bath, 1 bedroom + 2nd private bedroom (all real beds) convert from a beautiful living room + sunny kitchen.

You have your private entrance and the entire floor. It is perfect for social distancing.

Parking is free street parking, which requires following parking rules and patience.

Prices are not negotiable unless there is a very special reason.

The space
The apartment is beautiful and peaceful. Relatively high ceilings and two skylights make the apartment airy, bright and comfortable. Because you have your apartment and entire floor, plus your own entrance (we use the backyard entrance), you can have as much privacy as you like.
We live downstairs and have a early rise and early to bed schedule. We need quiet time after 10 pm (i.e. softer voices and footsteps after 10 pm).
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood is safe. I have lived here for 7 years and have not had any problems. It is urban and has people of all colors. There are many great restaurants, stores that are very affordable, much cheaper than the waterfront or New York City. It is very practical and convenient for visiting NYC or other New Jersey places because it is near the Journal Square PATH station, buses and the ferry. Because of its convenience, there may be some traffic noise in the room facing the street. The rooms not facing the street are much quieter.
Jersey City Medical Center (a big hospital) is nearby. So you may hear ambulance siren occasionally. Please do not be alarmed because it is just the ambulance :)
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about:
I am a teacher working in New York City.  I love my profession working with children and travels.  
I live here because it is very convenient for
commuting to Manhattan everyday. 
The backyard garden has a pair of holly berry trees, a grape tree, ivies and other lovely flowers. The new World Trade tower can be seen from one end of the block.  At the other end of the block you can see Statue of Liberty by walking down just a couple of minutes.  The PATH train to New York City or other places is  10 - 20 minutes by walking.   There is also a bus stop at the corner for going to the Newport Mall and another bus for going to PATH train in case you do not want to walk. 
We surround ourselves with peace, love, laughter, learning and, at the end of the day, quietness.

host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about:
I have an eclectic background - and enjoy eclectic people. I work in the non-profit sector - but have also worked in consumer publishing and as a VISTA volunteer. I love music and dancing (jazz, latin jazz. timba, salsa, rumba) and would happy to take you along - or recommend some of the best NYC hot spots that tourists might not know about. name: Historic District - New Renovation
description:
Lovely one bedroom apartment, just renovated, on tree-lined street in historic district of Jersey City. Easy access to NYC. This flat is quiet, sunny, and has a private entrance. Has luxurious bathroom and fully equipped kitchen.

The space
The apartment is attached to a victorian house in the historic 'Doctors Row' section of Jersey City. It is a half block from Lincoln Park, and two blocks from a Citi Bikes station. It has a private entrance on the side of the house, and sits back from the street. Although attached to the house, it is a separate unit and was originally built as a doctor's office as was typical in the neighborhood at the time. A total gut renovation was done in 2016 and the apartment is being maintained in impeccable condition.

Other things to note
There is a washer/dryer in the unit.
neighborhood_overview:
Beautiful Lincoln Park is only a half block away and is part of the newly designated historic district. The park boasts river-front views, a 9-hole golf course, tennis courts, bird sanctuary, and a grand fountain recently restored to its original glory (designed by Pierre J. Cheron, it is the world's largest concrete monument!).
There are many great restaurants in Jersey City, along with farmers' markets and easy access to grocery and other shopping. Restaurant recommendations will be provided on your arrival, along with local transportation info and other helpful tips.

name: BRIGHT AND COZY APARTMENT MINUTES TO NEW YORK CITY
description:
A beautiful private apartment close to NYC in less than 30 minutes, Buses around the corner, located in a quiet and safe neighborhood, near all stores and Restaurants, Kitchen, bathroom tub/shower, Queen-size bed/memory foam mattress, recliner chair and comfortable sofa bed.

The space
It's cozy and quiet - you will feel at home upon arrival - Private home with three apartments. This listing is for our third floor apt which is a walk up.

Guest access
You have full access to the entire apartment during your stay. The entire Apartment is only for the use of our guests not share with anyone else.

Other things to note
There is only Street parking available and needs a visitor parking permit that cost $5 daily weekends are free
We have USB plugs available
neighborhood_overview:
This cozy and warm Apt located in a safe neighborhood, on a street full of families and great people. If you are looking for a friendly place to stay while you enjoy the area, we are it! and is close and walking distance to Restaurants and Supermarkets.
It’s two blocks from the bus stop to NYC public transportation takes you to Port Authority 42nd street Times Square buses runs very often every 5 to 8 minutes which We recommend.
"UBER" is in Jersey YAY!!! ;D download the app and travel around for cheap !
host_location: New Jersey, United States
host_about:
Kenia and I are parents of three beautiful children.  Our house is a family home that we cherish dearly. 

We love to host and are happy to join the Airbnb community to share our beautiful home with you. 

We enjoy going to museums - having family gatherings, music and of course good food.  

Look forward to having the opportunity to host you. 

Rod & Kenia 

"Live every moment of your life fully"

description:
15 minutes drive to Newark International Airport. Sunny, hardwood floor, big kitchen, 2 shared full bathrooms, microwave and coffee machine; 20 minutes to WTC, and 45 minutes to Midtown Manhattan. 3 minutes walk to light rail and bus public transportation.
Please note: Light rail and Path Train are NJ transit, separate with NYC Subway.

The space
Twin size bed

Other things to note
This is a private room in a 3-bedrooms apartment. Shared 2 full bathrooms and kitchen.

name: Cozy red studio 15 min walk to JSQ path station
description:
15 min walk to Journal Sq Path. Then it's 15 min to WTC, 25 min to 34th St. Use Citibike or Uber to Path. Uber pool is $3-4 per person to Journal Sq Path.
Located in a historic brownstone building, the studio has a high ceiling, hardwood floors. Living area has a futon; sleeping area has a bed. The neighborhood is safe but not fancy. You can see garbage on the street like NYC. I can't change my location and the cleanliness of the neighborhood. But my cleanliness is five star. So is my value.

The space
A cozy, quiet and spacious nest that you could hide in after a long day in busy Manhattan. Comfortable space, all in one, under a high ceiling. Lots of light if wanted. Antique shutters, faux fireplace. Fridge, small kitchen, microwave oven, gas range stove, dining area, bathroom with a corner shower unit, living quarter with a futon and a big TV. Sleeping quarter is divided from the rest by a bookcase. Kitchen has pots and pans, plates, cups, a coffee make
neighborhood_overview:
This is a cosmopolitan neighborhood. The Journal Square Path Station (Jersey City-Hoboken's subway system that connects us to Manhattan) is only 15 min walking distance away. We are very close to downtown Jersey City where you can find fancy restaurants and bars. Hoboken is also close by. Uber and the Citibike are affordable options to go to the Path Station and downtown, even to Hoboken. This studio is close to Manhattan and offers great value for those venturing into the city. If you are from the suburbs or small cities of the US with no traffic, no crowds, be prepared for big city life. It’s a safe neighborhood. My family and I have lived in this neighborhood for almost two decades. None of my tenants, guests or neighbors have had an issue about safety.
If you want a good value for your money, this is the right place for you!
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about: I am an avid traveler and love to stay at Airbnb places wherever I go. I’ve been a superhost three months after I started hosting. I pay attention to detail and answer questions right away. My guests’s satisfaction is my priority. Other than hosting, I co-own a travel company. I’m the mother a teen and two cats.

name: Museum Bed & Breakfast: Apt 2R Garden View
description:
A NYC landmark townhouse in historic Sugar Hill. 4 Sunlit windows face Morris-Jumel Mansion (George Washington's HQ) on a 18th century Belgian block paved street. A private apartment in a townhouse. Large 18 x 13 ft living room, enclosed sleeping alcove with double bed (aka full size) Dining table, sofa, desk, 4 chairs, coffee table, chest, Local TV networks. Access to garden.
Complete private bath, kitchen with cookware and utensils. 2 closets, hairdryer, iron and ironing board available.

The space
Very charming, romantic view of park and 18th century Belgian block street faces 18th century Georgian / Palladian style Morris-Jumel Mansion (General George Washington's HQ during the Battle of Harlem Heights

Guest access
They rent a self contained private apartment. Access to garden.

Other things to note
Medium to large sized dogs allowed. Sorry, no toy or miniature or lap dogs allowed. No cats, avians, reptiles, e
neighborhood_overview: Historic Sugar Hill, home of Duke Ellington, Lena Horne, Count Basie, Paul Robeson continues the cultural heritage with the New harlem Renaissance of Jam sessions and art galleries. Hispanic Society (home to goya's Duchess of Alba and several El Grecos and other Spanish masters; Malcom X Center, Yankee Stadium, ethnic restaurants and coffee shops all within 5 to 20 minute walks. Metro is 20 minutes from Times Square. Fifth Avenue bus and other buses all only one to two blocks away. A quiet designated Historic Landmark street.

description:
Experience New York, at a fraction of the cost. This unit offers the perfect solution for travelers coming to New York on a budget. Be at World Trade Center in 15 Minutes, Christopher Street in 15minutes, the Empire State Building in 35 minutes.

The space
This Jersey City brand new apartment.
Only 5 min from the Grove path station by apt free shuttle bus this apartment is convenient to commute every day to Manhattan.
Be at World Trade Center in 15 Minutes, Christopher Street in 15 minutes, in the Empire State Building in 30 minutes.
Jersey City is quickly becoming a destination for Young New York who come looking for peace and space.
This unit consists of studio, 1 bathroom, and kitchen. The unit is fully furnished, including high thread count sheets, duvets, all kitchenware, art, and more.
Mattresses are luxury plush for a truly wonderful nights sleep, covered in high thread count sheets and duvet with hypoallergenic down comforter.

name: Jersey City: Hamilton Park
description:
This is a 550 Sq. Ft - bottom level portion of a two floor apartment. One full bedroom, full Bath / Shower, Kitchen, Dining area and Living Room. Access to Private Dual Level Backyard. Patio with chairs, table and a grill, and an upper level with grass, trees, plants and flowers.

Other things to note
There is only one kitchen and it's located in lower level. Since I do live here, I will need to access it from time to time. But I will not let that interfere with your stay. I will grab and go and or use it when and if you are not there.
neighborhood_overview:
Hamilton Park is a vibrant neighborhood which includes a beautiful historic district with rows of Victorian brownstones from the post-Civil War era. The neighborhood has 2 parks: Hamilton Park & Enos Jones Park. Hamilton Park is a 5.4-acre "residential square" park which includes a basketball court, tennis courts, children's playground, dog run and gazebo around which many events occur during the year including a Farmer's Market in the summer months. Enos Jones has baseball fields, a basketball court, skateboard park, and a children's playground.
In addition the neighborhood offers great restaurants, shops, and services.

The space

Working in NYC-Wall Street-World Trade Center? Only 37 minutes door-to-door (Light Rail to PATH or NY Waterway ferry. neighborhood_overview: This apartment building is located directly across the Hudson River from New York City, within a large commerce hub in Jersey City, New Jersey. This location is known as one of the most diverse cities on the East Coast and a perfect destination; not only for business but also leisure travelers. Jersey City is a hub of industry with its oil refineries, warehouses, and plants. Although known for its industrial prowess, Jersey City’s gem is Liberty State Park, which offers impeccable views of Manhattan, the Statue of Liberty, and Ellis Island.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
We have been providing vacation rental apartments for over 10 years across the East Coast. We are known for our distinctively furnished apartments in popular locations, and for our attentive service. You’ll find that our rates are quite reasonable. If you're looking for a safe, comfortable place with fabulous amenities and Wi-Fi (we know you need the Wi-Fi!) in the Boston MA area, Washington DC, Miami FL or very close to NYC in Jersey City or Hoboken, we'd love to host you. Many of the buildings where our apartments are located feature amenities such as beautiful lobbies, 24 hour front desk staff, fitness centers, business centers, recreation rooms, indoor or outdoor pools and whirlpools. If you are traveling with children, some buildings offer playgrounds (many buildings are near public playgrounds as well) or indoor playrooms. Depending on the location, you can stay for just a few days, a week, a month or more. 

We offer an assortment of short-term apartments in sizes ranging from a studio to three bedrooms that are fully furnished with all the comforts of home. Our local staff meticulously prepares your apartment before your arrival, and we offer 24 hour assistance for any emergencies after business hours. When you arrive at your apartment, the beds will be made, towels and bath amenities will be stocked in the bathrooms, and the coffee maker will be set up in the kitchen with some sample coffees, sweetener and creamer (teabags too if that is your preference) to start your morning off properly. If you’d like to cook a meal, the kitchen is stocked with dishes, cutlery, glassware and pots and pans. The living room is set up with a TV and cable channels, and the Wi-Fi router password and instructions will be prominently displayed so you can get connected quickly. You can also make local and toll-free phone calls at no charge. 

Please contact us to confirm the exact availability of the apartment you are interested in. We’d love to host you (and your family) for your vacation or business trip.

name: Clean Spacious 2 Bedroom Apartment in Jersey City
description:
Standing 50 stories high and overlooking Manhattan's skyline, this luxury building is a one of a kind; offering the latest in amenities and services like an outdoor heated pool and spa, a fitness center, a theatre room, a playroom, and a sophisticated clubroom, you will find well-appointed apartments with nine foot ceilings, fully-equipped designer kitchens, and hardwood floors. As if it wasn't enough, all transport connections to NYC are only a few feet away.

The space
Experience luxury like you never have before in these fantastic Hudson riverfront apartments. Do you fancy a heated outdoor pool and spa with Manhattan views? A modern fitness center, a state-of-the-art theatre room, a clubroom with billiards, and a playroom and playground for the kids? You got it in this tower located a few steps away from the Newport Path station and the best restaurants in the area offering fantastic skyline views. These apartments feature the best upscale finishes like 9 foot
neighborhood_overview: This apartment building is located directly across the Hudson River from New York City, within a large commerce hub in Jersey City, New Jersey. This location is known as one of the most diverse cities on the East Coast and a perfect destination; not only for business but also leisure travelers. Jersey City is a hub of industry with its oil refineries, warehouses, and plants. Although known for its industrial prowess, Jersey City’s gem is Liberty State Park, which offers impeccable views of Manhattan, the Statue of Liberty, and Ellis Island.

name: Modern 1BR | WiFi+Business Center | Near Path |GLS
description:
Soaring 50 stories above the Hudson River, this glamorous tower has everything a traveler would need (and more!) for a trip to the NYC metro. Enjoy all the bells and whistles, including:
-Upscale furnishings, tall ceilings, and gourmet kitchens in every unit
-Resort-style building amenities such as an outdoor pool, theater room, gym, and 24/7 concierge
-Light rail steps from the front door and easy access to PATH
-Walkable neighborhood a block from Newport Centre

The space
At Global Luxury Suites, your wellbeing is our top priority, therefore, we are following the CDC guidelines to ensure your safety. All apartments are thoroughly cleaned after each resident has checked out and before another guest checks in. All linens are changed and surfaces are sanitized (handles, windows, appliances, countertops, furniture, etc.). In addition, our teams will be fully sanitizing common areas such as business centers and recreation rooms for guests’ safety.

name: 1 Bedroom near to Grove street PATH
description:
This is a large one bedroom right by Grove Street Path Station. These downtown Jersey City apartments are a 10-minute train ride to New York City. It features a fitness center and tennis courts. Modern guest rooms offer free Wi-Fi and fully equipped kitchens.
A flat-screen TV and in-unit laundry facilities are equipped in each apartment at Columbus Suites. The spacious apartments feature dark wood furniture and include a seating area with a work desk.

Other things to note
Gym/Pool accessible for a month stay.

name: Charming room 3 blocks to PATH train $42
description:
One block around the corner from Van Vorst park, several blocks from Liberty State Park & the Statue of Liberty, 8 blocks from the Hudson River and a great view of NYC.

This cozy private room is on the 3rd floor of a large brownstone. Twin-sized bed. Small desk, cute yellow stool, bookcase, small victorian chest. Large closet.

Shared bath & kitchen.

A 3-block walk to the PATH.

The space
This is a large brownstone row house. The bedroom is located on the third floor and the shared bathroom is located on the second floor.

The entire house has a wonderful vibe with an eclectic array of furnishing.

Guest access
While the room private, the Bath and Kitchen are SHARED, there is a Washer/Dryer area.

Both the bathroom and kitchen are located on the floor below the room.

House cat on the premises

Other things to note
This is a quiet space. No parties. No no
neighborhood_overview:
Downtown Jersey City is a vibrant and diverse community of neighborhoods. Lots of restaurants and drinking establishments and food shops. Citi Bike stands are only a few blocks away in any direction from the house.

With the PATH train only a few blocks away, access into NYC is on a 24/7 basis. Both uptown to 33rd St and downtown to WTC.

name: Spacious & Private 2BR | Downtown Jersey City
description:
Soaring 50 stories above the Hudson River, this glamorous tower has everything a traveler would need (and more!) for a trip to the NYC metro. Enjoy all the bells and whistles, including:
●Upscale furnishings, tall ceilings, and gourmet kitchens in every unit
●Resort-style building amenities such as an outdoor pool, theater room, gym, and 24/7 concierge
●Light rail steps from the front door and easy access to PATH
●Walkable neighborhood a block from Newport Centre

The space
At Global Luxury Suites, your wellbeing is our top priority, therefore, we are following the CDC guidelines to ensure your safety. All apartments are thoroughly cleaned after each resident has checked out and before another guest checks in. All linens are changed and surfaces are sanitized (handles, windows, appliances, countertops, furniture, etc.). In addition, our teams will be fully sanitizing common areas such as business centers and recreation rooms for guests’ safety.
neighborhood_overview:
Heading into NYC or exploring the NY metro area? This high-rise is conveniently located down the street from the NY Waterway Ferry, the Hudson-Bergen Light Rail, and the PATH train. Getting into the Big Apple has never been easier!

name: Spacious Apt 10 Min from Manhattan
description:
Great 2 bedroom apartment in a townhouse in Historic Downtown Jersey City, just across the Hudson river from Manhattan (only 2 blocks from the Grove street PATH subway which offer direct and 24/7 access to Manhattan.)

The space
The apartment is located in Historic Downtown Jersey City, just across the Hudson river from Manhattan (only 2 blocks from the Grove street PATH subway which offer direct and 24/7 access to Manhattan.)
The neighborhood is safe and diverse with many charming restaurants and cafes as well as several delis convenient for grocery shopping.
Situated on the second floor of a 19th century townhouse, this two bedroom apartment is quiet, bright and cheerful. It features hardwood floors, large kitchen and a small sunny deck.
The main bedroom is large and bright and features a queen sized bed, a large walk-in closet and empty chest of drawers.
The smaller bedroom is located next to the larger bedroom and is accessible by the bed
neighborhood_overview: Downtown Jersey City is an historic neighborhood with many townhouses and brownstones, and lots of cafes and (great) restaurants! It is very diverse and lively, as well as a quiet respite from hectic New York life! It's very easy and fast to access Manhattan thanks to the Path train (see below).
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about: We love to travel and meet new people. Bob is originally from Connecticut and Francois from France, we've been living in NY/NJ for twenty years. We also like art, music and movies. And we both speak French and English! Due to our busy schedule, one of us will be your host in the listing of your choosing. Welcome to Jersey City and New York!

name: Private room, bright, airy & close to NYC (20Min)
description:
Our house is a family house. the room plus the private bathroom we are offering for rent is located on the first floor, and it`s newly renovated, with a private bathroom.
Our place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers.... etc, where breakfast can be served upon request,for a small upgrade fee.

The space
Ours is a two-family house. We live on the first floor, and the second floor is essentially a separate apartment. It is newly renovated, with two bedrooms, a large bathroom, and a generous living space where breakfast can be served upon request. The living area can also be used as another private room for a small upgrade fee.

Guest access
Guest have access to the main entrance and lobby, the upstairs living room, the upstairs bathroom and there guest room of course.

Other things to note
Food
Just a short walk from our house will take you to delis, supermarkets, take-out places, pubs,
neighborhood_overview: The house is located just a few steps away from a large, beautiful county park (Lincoln Park) in a neighborhood that is undergoing constant improvements (new restaurants, supermarkets, etc.) while remaining close to its roots.  The area, like most of Jersey City, is home to a polyglot population.  Long-time residents and recent immigrants mix peacefully in an area of great cultural interaction.   Each year there are parades, feasts, and celebrations to celebrate the contributions of many ethnic groups to the cultural fabric of the city.And it`s all hapening here at Lincoln Park.
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about:
Here is a brief introduction of who we are :
I am  German Russian and my husband is American Moroccan, we reside here in Jersey City with our 6 years old daughter. and a 4 months old baby boy. Yes, we are truly international family and love travelling and meeting new people:)
 As you can see our house is multilingual.we speak English,Russian,German, French and Arabic.( No English No problem, we`ll find a way to communicate ).

We have been fortunate enough to meet fantastic people from around the world. It has been a wonderful and very exciting experience.
We love New York and we will be very happy to share any  information ( that we have acquired during our almost 20 years of living here.) about this great city and the so called   6th borough of new york which is Jersey city.
You will definitely be pleased with our services and we will do our best to make your stay more (Website hidden by Airbnb) please do not hesitate to ask us for more details when booking or while staying with us.
