name: Elegant 1 bed in the heart of Downtown Jersey City
description:
Located in a luxury building in the vibrant Grove Street neighborhood of Jersey City. Conveniently located near to the Liberty Science center, Newport Centre Mall and beautiful parks. Residents have easy access to NYC via the on-site PATH station.

The space
This stylish one-bedroom apartment features a fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances and granite floors/countertops, an in-unit washer and dryer, and hardwood floors.

Guest access
- Fitness center located on 7th floor
- 24-hour doorman
- Lounge on 7th floor with billiards, game room, private screening room, and kitchen.
- Outdoor pool (seasonal) and patio on 7th floor

Other things to note
Pricing includes 6% city hotel tax.
neighborhood_overview: Jersey City is the second-most populous city in the state of New Jersey, located right across the Hudson River from Lower Manhattan. The architecture ranges from Industrial Age homes to classic brownstones to modern high rises. Downtown Jersey City, a major historical district, overlooks the Manhattan skyline.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
I work for Furnished Quarters, the largest provider of furnished apartments in the Northeast. My family started this business over 20 years ago and we welcome the opportunity to host you in our apartments. 

Guests can expect a comfortable, fully furnished and equipped private apartment, plenty of helpful neighborhood information and 24-hour access to our team. We consider ourselves first and foremost a hospitality company and we are here to provide a worry-free stay that enables you to enjoy the city and feel like a local from the moment you arrive.

You can buy your parking permit at the parking authority which is two blocks away (open 8:30-5:00pm M-F) you will need a copy of the reservation, car registration and the application form which i left copies in the apartment.

name: NYC TRI STATE Area | Entire Apartment
description:
Tranquility, peace of mind. Coziness of home. Let us be your home away from home. Non-sharing apartment with it's own pvt entrance, pvt bathroom. Cable TV also free Verizon Fios WiFi and keyless entry 24/7. Small kitchenette for morning coffees, w/ snacks breakfast cereal, & water all at your disposal. Additionally we are just 12 min. away from EWR/Newark airport. 25 min drive* from NYC and close to NJCU and liberty state park / statue of liberty.

The space
This studio apartment with private bath apartment on the ground floor is perfect for a couple on a budget who'd like to visit NYC.

There is a private entrance from the street beside the stairs. As you enter the apartment you'll see the kitchen/ living room with kitchen table & sofa.

The space is conveniently close to everything. Most of my guests never had a problem going in and out the city because the ease of transportation and next to major highways. New York tri-state depends on ma
neighborhood_overview:
Our neighbors are mostly young families, in a typical urban New York/ New Jersey style. It may be a little closer quarters than you're used to if you're not familiar with the tri state area, but everyone here is friendly and looks out for each other.
There is a Walgreen and Subway and Jollibee around the corner where you can get sandwiches, and something to eat. Theres also a popular Pizza and Bagel shop that locals go to and ACME super market a quarter of a mile away.

Bus #80 gong to Path train Journal Square 
Fee per person $1.60 and then take Path to Ground zero which is only 12 minutes and then going to Uptown take 33 rd only 20 minutes you will be in Macy’s. , walk to Times Square , etc . To see the beautiful New York 

Uber & Lyft
If you have a car my suggestion just leave your car .Uber or Lyft only $10 to Journal Square or Downtown JC  . You can take Uber from my place to Liberty State Park to see Statue of Liberty which is only 10 minutes and you can hop in ferry going to Manhattan

name: Luxury Studio Apartment in Jersey City near PATH
description:
Located at the Jersey City waterfront with breathtaking views of the Manhattan skyline, these sleek apartments feature spacious, sun-filled floor plans, fully-equipped, gourmet kitchens, and much more. This full lifestyle building offers amenities including a 7th floor terrace with resort-style pool, spa, lounge areas, BBQ grills, double-sided fireplace, and outdoor billiards, a state-of-the-art fitness center with yoga studio, and a children’s indoor playroom.

The space
Your new home is beautifully designed with luxury features including granite kitchen counter tops, hardwood floors & carpeting, walk-in closets, in unit washer/dryer, individual heat/air conditioning and alarm system.

Your fully appointed apartment is furnished with all the necessities of home, including linens and towels.

Property amenities include:

• Controlled access
• Meeting room
• Clubhouse
• Large fitness center with new equipment
• Su
neighborhood_overview:
This apartment building is located adjacent to Harsimus Cove Light Rail Station, one block from Newport Centre Mall, and steps from the Newport Path. Guests can enjoy local entertainment and delicious eatery from the local shops and restaurants located within walking distance.
This location is one of the most walkable neighborhoods in Jersey City; not only for business but also leisure travelers. Jersey City is a hub of industry with its oil refineries, warehouses, and plants. Although known for its industrial prowess, Jersey City’s gem is Liberty State Park, which offers impeccable views of Manhattan, the Statue of Liberty, and Ellis Island.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
We have been providing vacation rental apartments for over 10 years across the East Coast. We are known for our distinctively furnished apartments in popular locations, and for our attentive service. You’ll find that our rates are quite reasonable. If you're looking for a safe, comfortable place with fabulous amenities and Wi-Fi (we know you need the Wi-Fi!) in the Boston MA area, Washington DC, Miami FL or very close to NYC in Jersey City or Hoboken, we'd love to host you. Many of the buildings where our apartments are located feature amenities such as beautiful lobbies, 24 hour front desk staff, fitness centers, business centers, recreation rooms, indoor or outdoor pools and whirlpools. If you are traveling with children, some buildings offer playgrounds (many buildings are near public playgrounds as well) or indoor playrooms. Depending on the location, you can stay for just a few days, a week, a month or more. 

We offer an assortment of short-term apartments in sizes ranging from a studio to three bedrooms that are fully furnished with all the comforts of home. Our local staff meticulously prepares your apartment before your arrival, and we offer 24 hour assistance for any emergencies after business hours. When you arrive at your apartment, the beds will be made, towels and bath amenities will be stocked in the bathrooms, and the coffee maker will be set up in the kitchen with some sample coffees, sweetener and creamer (teabags too if that is your preference) to start your morning off properly. If you’d like to cook a meal, the kitchen is stocked with dishes, cutlery, glassware and pots and pans. The living room is set up with a TV and cable channels, and the Wi-Fi router password and instructions will be prominently displayed so you can get connected quickly. You can also make local and toll-free phone calls at no charge. 

Please contact us to confirm the exact availability of the apartment you are interested in. We’d love to host you (and your family) for your vacation or business trip.
neighbourhood: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States

neighborhood_overview: This apartment building is located directly across the Hudson River from New York City, within a large commerce hub in Jersey City, New Jersey. This location is known as one of the most diverse cities on the East Coast and a perfect destination; not only for business but also leisure travelers. Jersey City is a hub of industry with its oil refineries, warehouses, and plants. Although known for its industrial prowess, Jersey City’s gem is Liberty State Park, which offers impeccable views of Manhattan, the Statue of Liberty, and Ellis Island.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
We have been providing vacation rental apartments for over 10 years across the East Coast. We are known for our distinctively furnished apartments in popular locations, and for our attentive service. You’ll find that our rates are quite reasonable. If you're looking for a safe, comfortable place with fabulous amenities and Wi-Fi (we know you need the Wi-Fi!) in the Boston MA area, Washington DC, Miami FL or very close to NYC in Jersey City or Hoboken, we'd love to host you. Many of the buildings where our apartments are located feature amenities such as beautiful lobbies, 24 hour front desk staff, fitness centers, business centers, recreation rooms, indoor or outdoor pools and whirlpools. If you are traveling with children, some buildings offer playgrounds (many buildings are near public playgrounds as well) or indoor playrooms. Depending on the location, you can stay for just a few days, a week, a month or more. 

We offer an assortment of short-term apartments in sizes ranging from a studio to three bedrooms that are fully furnished with all the comforts of home. Our local staff meticulously prepares your apartment before your arrival, and we offer 24 hour assistance for any emergencies after business hours. When you arrive at your apartment, the beds will be made, towels and bath amenities will be stocked in the bathrooms, and the coffee maker will be set up in the kitchen with some sample coffees, sweetener and creamer (teabags too if that is your preference) to start your morning off properly. If you’d like to cook a meal, the kitchen is stocked with dishes, cutlery, glassware and pots and pans. The living room is set up with a TV and cable channels, and the Wi-Fi router password and instructions will be prominently displayed so you can get connected quickly. You can also make local and toll-free phone calls at no charge. 

Please contact us to confirm the exact availability of the apartment you are interested in. We’d love to host you (and your family) for your vacation or business trip.

A good vibe & sense of friendliness in the neighborhood & on the street. Downtown has many restaurants, bars, parks & music events. The space is just the right place for a solo adventurer and/or a business traveler. Location is just 3 blocks from PATH at Grove St with 24/7 access to NYC & a short walk to the Hudson River & Liberty State Park.

The space
This is a large brownstone with steps and levels. The room is located on the third floor and the bathroom is located on the second floor. There is a house cat on premises.

Guest access
Private room on the third floor

name: Furnished One Bedroom Apartment JC Newport
description:
Located at the Jersey City waterfront with breathtaking views of the Manhattan skyline, these sleek apartments feature spacious, sun-filled floor plans, fully-equipped, gourmet kitchens, and much more. This full lifestyle building offers amenities including a 7th floor terrace with resort-style pool, spa, lounge areas, BBQ grills, double-sided fireplace, and outdoor billiards, a state-of-the-art fitness center with yoga studio, and a children’s indoor playroom.

The space
Your new home is beautifully designed with luxury features including granite kitchen counter tops, hardwood floors & carpeting, walk-in closets, in unit washer/dryer, individual heat/air conditioning and alarm system.

Your fully appointed apartment is furnished with all the necessities of home, including linens and towels.

Property amenities include:

• Controlled access
• Meeting room
• Clubhouse
• Large fitness center with new equipment
• Su
neighborhood_overview:
This apartment building is located adjacent to Harsimus Cove Light Rail Station, one block from Newport Centre Mall, and steps from the Newport Path. Guests can enjoy local entertainment and delicious eatery from the local shops and restaurants located within walking distance.
This location is one of the most walkable neighborhoods in Jersey City; not only for business but also leisure travelers. Jersey City is a hub of industry with its oil refineries, warehouses, and plants. Although known for its industrial prowess, Jersey City’s gem is Liberty State Park, which offers impeccable views of Manhattan, the Statue of Liberty, and Ellis Island.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
We have been providing vacation rental apartments for over 10 years across the East Coast. We are known for our distinctively furnished apartments in popular locations, and for our attentive service. You’ll find that our rates are quite reasonable. If you're looking for a safe, comfortable place with fabulous amenities and Wi-Fi (we know you need the Wi-Fi!) in the Boston MA area, Washington DC, Miami FL or very close to NYC in Jersey City or Hoboken, we'd love to host you. Many of the buildings where our apartments are located feature amenities such as beautiful lobbies, 24 hour front desk staff, fitness centers, business centers, recreation rooms, indoor or outdoor pools and whirlpools. If you are traveling with children, some buildings offer playgrounds (many buildings are near public playgrounds as well) or indoor playrooms. Depending on the location, you can stay for just a few days, a week, a month or more. 

We offer an assortment of short-term apartments in sizes ranging from a studio to three bedrooms that are fully furnished with all the comforts of home. Our local staff meticulously prepares your apartment before your arrival, and we offer 24 hour assistance for any emergencies after business hours. When you arrive at your apartment, the beds will be made, towels and bath amenities will be stocked in the bathrooms, and the coffee maker will be set up in the kitchen with some sample coffees, sweetener and creamer (teabags too if that is your preference) to start your morning off properly. If you’d like to cook a meal, the kitchen is stocked with dishes, cutlery, glassware and pots and pans. The living room is set up with a TV and cable channels, and the Wi-Fi router password and instructions will be prominently displayed so you can get connected quickly. You can also make local and toll-free phone calls at no charge. 

Please contact us to confirm the exact availability of the apartment you are interested in. We’d love to host you (and your family) for your vacation or business trip.

host_location: New York, New York, United States

Our motto in life is to do good to others, and pass it forward!

We are close to the Journal Square Path Train and short, easy commute to NYC.

The studio is 'hotel-style' - has a mini fridge, hot/cold spring water dispenser, coffee maker, kettle, microwave, toaster oven but no oven/stove.

Get in touch!

The space
The space is our garden apartment, on the ground/basement level. Its totally separate from our house, has its on private entrance and bathroom and offers complete privacy. Note that while it has microwave, fridge, toaster oven, coffee maker it does not have a stove/oven.

Guest access
Guests can access the garden apartment, laundry and backyard (shared).

description:
Located in a luxury building in the vibrant Grove Street neighborhood of Jersey City. Conveniently located near to the Liberty Science center, Newport Centre Mall and beautiful parks. Residents have easy access to NYC via the on-site PATH station.

The space
This stylish studio apartment features a fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances and granite floors/countertops, an in-unit washer and dryer, and hardwood floors.
neighborhood_overview: Jersey City is the second-most populous city in the state of New Jersey, located right across the Hudson River from Lower Manhattan. The architecture ranges from Industrial Age homes to classic brownstones to modern high rises. Downtown Jersey City, a major historical district, overlooks the Manhattan skyline.

description:
Avail for Jan; open longer-term for JCMC & quiet folks. Just shoot a message for discussion.

Minutes to the Grove PATH. Convenient 10 min walk to JCMC as well which is great for the med-professionals. Plenty of eateries, shops etc by foot. Lots of community activities in the Grove Sq to partake in.

Great location which is great for NYC access, solo adventurers and business travelers. Full-size bed, dresser. Right in the hipster/hotspot and historic downtown; Van Vorst Park.

The space
Like some reviews say, we are pretty friendly and quiet. Wood floors are old, (not necessarily dirty) but original, which for aficionados is a rare plus. However, pics/description are pretty straight forward so there shouldn't be any surprises on expectations; Bang for buck is beyond comps in area.

Decent kitchen space and friendly fellow tenants. Restroom shared but the person is rarely around. Sometimes it will feel as if the entire hous
neighborhood_overview:
Definitely the hot-spot for unique bars/restaurants. With only a quick jaunt to NYC, it is now the new Brooklyn. Super close to JC Med -Center; we love the med-professionals/rotation students. Inquire with priority ))

5 blocks to the PATH train-service which gets you to WTC in 10 min or the historic West Village in 15 min. Obviously also great for those business trips to the Fin-District Exchange Place.

name: Jersey City Two Bedroom Apartment Across From NYC
description:
Located at the Jersey City waterfront with breathtaking views of the Manhattan skyline, these sleek apartments feature spacious, sun-filled floor plans, fully-equipped, gourmet kitchens, and much more. This full lifestyle building offers amenities including a 7th floor terrace with resort-style pool, spa, lounge areas, BBQ grills, double-sided fireplace, and outdoor billiards, a state-of-the-art fitness center with yoga studio, and a children’s indoor playroom.

The space
Your new home is beautifully designed with luxury features including granite kitchen counter tops, hardwood floors & carpeting, walk-in closets, in unit washer/dryer, individual heat/air conditioning and alarm system.

Your fully appointed apartment is furnished with all the necessities of home, including linens and towels.

Property amenities include:

• Controlled access
• Meeting room
• Clubhouse
• Large fitness center with new equipment
• Su
neighborhood_overview:
This apartment building is located adjacent to Harsimus Cove Light Rail Station, one block from Newport Centre Mall, and steps from the Newport Path. Guests can enjoy local entertainment and delicious eatery from the local shops and restaurants located within walking distance.
This location is one of the most walkable neighborhoods in Jersey City; not only for business but also leisure travelers. Jersey City is a hub of industry with its oil refineries, warehouses, and plants. Although known for its industrial prowess, Jersey City’s gem is Liberty State Park, which offers impeccable views of Manhattan, the Statue of Liberty, and Ellis Island.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
We have been providing vacation rental apartments for over 10 years across the East Coast. We are known for our distinctively furnished apartments in popular locations, and for our attentive service. You’ll find that our rates are quite reasonable. If you're looking for a safe, comfortable place with fabulous amenities and Wi-Fi (we know you need the Wi-Fi!) in the Boston MA area, Washington DC, Miami FL or very close to NYC in Jersey City or Hoboken, we'd love to host you. Many of the buildings where our apartments are located feature amenities such as beautiful lobbies, 24 hour front desk staff, fitness centers, business centers, recreation rooms, indoor or outdoor pools and whirlpools. If you are traveling with children, some buildings offer playgrounds (many buildings are near public playgrounds as well) or indoor playrooms. Depending on the location, you can stay for just a few days, a week, a month or more. 

We offer an assortment of short-term apartments in sizes ranging from a studio to three bedrooms that are fully furnished with all the comforts of home. Our local staff meticulously prepares your apartment before your arrival, and we offer 24 hour assistance for any emergencies after business hours. When you arrive at your apartment, the beds will be made, towels and bath amenities will be stocked in the bathrooms, and the coffee maker will be set up in the kitchen with some sample coffees, sweetener and creamer (teabags too if that is your preference) to start your morning off properly. If you’d like to cook a meal, the kitchen is stocked with dishes, cutlery, glassware and pots and pans. The living room is set up with a TV and cable channels, and the Wi-Fi router password and instructions will be prominently displayed so you can get connected quickly. You can also make local and toll-free phone calls at no charge. 

Please contact us to confirm the exact availability of the apartment you are interested in. We’d love to host you (and your family) for your vacation or business trip.

name: 5 MINUTES to NYC! Family-friendly 6 BEDROOMS!
description:
This brand new spectacular 6-bedroom apartment is located literally 5 minutes from the heart of Manhattan! Enjoy family-friendly, quiet (yet fun!) Jersey City with the BEST of NYC minutes from your doorstep. Check the guidebook for all the local attractions within walking distance! **PLEASE NOTE this is a *LEGAL* Airbnb listing. Jersey City has legalized the use of Airbnb. Almost all Airbnbs in NYC are ILLEGAL.

The space
A new construction, 2-level, SIX bedroom apartment with updated bathrooms and kitchen ― stainless steel appliances and Chef's table!

***Please note: flooring has been changed to brand-new, cozy carpeting!***

1st FL:

-Kid's Room (2 twins)
-Recreation Room/Office (Queen sofa bed)
-Queen-sized Bedroom
-TWO full bathrooms
-Living room/dining room
-WASHER/DRYER!

2nd Floor:

-Bedroom w/ full-sized mattress

There are lots to do, eat, and see within walking distance! SEE THE GUIDEBOOK FOR ALL OUR SUGGESTIONS! :)

neighborhood_overview:
Our house is located on the edge of Beautiful Lincoln Park. A very large place where you can enjoy a variety of leisure actives, from a morning jog or scenic walk to tennis, golf, cycling, basketball, baseball, football, soccer, picnicking, sunbathing, fishing (in the Hackensack River), bird watching, kayaking or even Pokemon Go!

The West Side neighborhood, north of Lincoln Park, is a quiet residential district with small to medium shops on West Side Avenue, Duncan Avenue and Communipaw. These avenues contain delis (bodegas), supermarkets, convenience stores, laundromats, pizzerias, Asian fast food, Mcdonald's churches, pharmacies, bars, liquor stores, nail salon, and beauty parlors.

Directly south of Lincoln Park, immediately west of Route 440 is Hudson Mall, which hosts large outlets like Old Navy, Staples, Chuck e Cheese, Marshall's, ToysRus, Gamestop, Big Lots, Lowes, Foot Locker, Pep Boys, Applebee's, Pizza Hunt, Popeyes, Taco bell, Hibachi Grill Buffet and

name: Grand Garden Apt - Close to NYC
description:
This charming garden apartment is located in a two family nineteen century brownstone across from a park.

The space
Enter this quaint apartment through a ground floor entrance leading into long hallway. To the left behind a french door you have a specious leaving room decorated with original artworks. There you can watch tv or or use modern large desk as a workstation. The hallway leads to a old charm large kitchen. For your convenience you'll find there a dishwasher, washing machine and a dryer. Behind the kitchen there is the bedroom offering a king size bed for your comfortable rest. On nice days enjoy the backyard accessible from the bedroom through a large glass door.

Guest access
The entire ground level of the apartment is exclusively for your enjoyment. There is a staircase leading to the floor above but the door on the top of the staicase is locked. The owner occasionally stays there.

description:
Monthly renters welcome. Stay in this charming, sun drenched apartment located in the booming Journal Square neighborhood of Jersey City, just minutes away from New York City. Parking in private driveway. The apartment features a queen sized bed, a foldout futon (for parties of 4), a full kitchen featuring brand new appliances, laundry, high speed WiFi, and a 42” LED TV with Netflix. Bus to NYC around the corner, and PATH train to Manhattan is a 15 minute walk away.

The space
Around the corner, a bus running every 10 minutes takes you to Midtown Manhattan in 20 minutes - stopping within walking distance of beautiful Times Square. If downtown Manhattan is your destination, the Journal Square PATH train station is located 15 minutes from the apartment and provides direct train service to World Trade Center.

Uber taxi service is also very popular in Jersey City and in NYC and provides a convenient and - for larger parties of 3 or more - a cost effe

name: Lux 2 Bedroom w/wifi at Newport Jersey City
description:
Overlooking the breathtaking Manhattan skyline & harbor this luxury 40 story high-rise offers great amenities including a community center equipped with billiards, a gaming area and flat screen televisions, as well as a newly renovated fitness center.

The space
Your new home is beautifully designed with luxury features including granite kitchen counter tops, hardwood floors & carpeting, walk-in closets, in unit washer/dryer, individual heat/air conditioning and alarm system.

Your fully appointed apartment is furnished with all the necessities of home, including linens and towels.

Property amenities include:

• Controlled access
• Resident lounge
• Meeting room
• Clubhouse
• Large newly remodeled fitness center with new equipment
• Sun Deck
• Community room with billiards, gaming area, flat screen TVs, fireplace & computers
• Children's play area with flat screen TV
• On-site restaurant
neighborhood_overview:
This apartment building is located directly across the Hudson River from New York City, within a large commerce hub in Jersey City, New Jersey. Guests can enjoy local entertainment and delicious eatery from the local shops and restaurants located within walking distance.
This location is known as one of the most diverse cities on the East Coast and a perfect destination; not only for business but also leisure travelers. Jersey City is a hub of industry with its oil refineries, warehouses, and plants. Although known for its industrial prowess, Jersey City’s gem is Liberty State Park, which offers impeccable views of Manhattan, the Statue of Liberty, and Ellis Island.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
We have been providing vacation rental apartments for over 10 years across the East Coast. We are known for our distinctively furnished apartments in popular locations, and for our attentive service. You’ll find that our rates are quite reasonable. If you're looking for a safe, comfortable place with fabulous amenities and Wi-Fi (we know you need the Wi-Fi!) in the Boston MA area, Washington DC, Miami FL or very close to NYC in Jersey City or Hoboken, we'd love to host you. Many of the buildings where our apartments are located feature amenities such as beautiful lobbies, 24 hour front desk staff, fitness centers, business centers, recreation rooms, indoor or outdoor pools and whirlpools. If you are traveling with children, some buildings offer playgrounds (many buildings are near public playgrounds as well) or indoor playrooms. Depending on the location, you can stay for just a few days, a week, a month or more. 

We offer an assortment of short-term apartments in sizes ranging from a studio to three bedrooms that are fully furnished with all the comforts of home. Our local staff meticulously prepares your apartment before your arrival, and we offer 24 hour assistance for any emergencies after business hours. When you arrive at your apartment, the beds will be made, towels and bath amenities will be stocked in the bathrooms, and the coffee maker will be set up in the kitchen with some sample coffees, sweetener and creamer (teabags too if that is your preference) to start your morning off properly. If you’d like to cook a meal, the kitchen is stocked with dishes, cutlery, glassware and pots and pans. The living room is set up with a TV and cable channels, and the Wi-Fi router password and instructions will be prominently displayed so you can get connected quickly. You can also make local and toll-free phone calls at no charge. 

Please contact us to confirm the exact availability of the apartment you are interested in. We’d love to host you (and your family) for your vacation or business trip.

name: Beautiful, clean, pvt bedroom 35 min to TIMES SQ!
description:
This lovely, quiet and well designed space is a 1 min walk from frequently running buses that will have you in times square in about 35 min. There is a liquor/convenience store around the corner. There is a park featuring tennis courts, year round indoor pool, seasonal ice skating rink and Manhattan skyline views, two blocks away. There are a variety of small restaurants in walking distance. The neighborhood is very quiet comfortable and safe at all hours.

The space
The room features 42 inch tv, leather clubman chair w/ottoman, full size bed, standing closet with iron and blowdryer. Attractive details through out. The livingroom is Paresian influenced minimalist decor. There is a country style eat in kitchen with a corner knook. All very clean, comfy and cozy.

Guest access
Eat in kitchen, living room, private bedroom, shared bathroom.

Other things to note
We provide towels, wash clothes, body wash, shampoo and tooth p

name: CLEAN & SAFE!  Sunny, spacious apt - steps to NYC!
description:
CLEAN AND SAFE! We take cleaning seriously so you can feel comfortable throughout your stay. Your health and safety are our top priorities. We follow cleaning and sanitization protocols from the CDC, Airbnb and the NJ Department of Health to ensure a safe, healthy and comfortable stay for our guests.

The space
Cleaning, Disinfection and Sterilization Procedures  
•  Housekeepers perform a deep cleaning and sanitization between each stay to clean and sanitize your apartment thoroughly.
•  Bedroom linens, towels, kitchen towels and bath mats are washed and fully sanitized, all mattresses and pillows are covered with mattress and pillow covers for an extra layer of protection.
•  Amenities such as shampoo, conditioner, and body wash bottles are sanitized and disinfected. Frequently touched surfaces (light switches, doorknobs, faucets, remote controls, etc.) are thoroughly disinfected and given an extra level of priority.

Minutes to Manha

neighborhood_overview:
Historic Downtown Jersey City is brimming with activity! With its close proximity to NYC, the area has seen a rapid development in the past 7 years and is now home to a diverse mix of locals, restaurants, bars and businesses. Just take a look on Yelp and you will find over 50 places to eat and drink at that are rated 4 STARS and above, all within a 10 minute walk from the apartment! In addition, there is Newport Mall nearby, which has a lot of shopping options (H&M, Zara, Coach, G-Star, Macys, Footlocker to name a few) a cinema and a diverse food court.

In our opinion, there are only 3 areas in New Jersey that are worth staying in if you are visiting NYC for a vacation or for business. Downtown Jersey City, Historic Jersey City and Hoboken due to their transport links to Manhattan, great local bars and restaurants, and for being known as incredibly safe areas.

Journal Square is still developing and very rough around the edges, with few bars and restaurants to

我们中文英文都可以说

The space
Our concept for this place is quite simple: Cozy and quiet. While spending most of the day outside touring around/working, our guests, we hope, would feel a piece of peace when come back to our apartment. This place is not a party house and would really appreciate limited noise whenever possible.

We hire professional clean lady to keep our place as clean as possible.

I like to walk to the waterfront to see the water and Manhattan skyline during Sunset time in a good day. (Do not miss it, it is worthy millions! :)  . Our area is very quiet, yet, Walking 10 mins, you will get to the busy fun night life in Grove street area. Many new restaurants opened nearby. (we have 3 restaurant in 1 block!)

Our area is very quiet, yet, Walking 10 mins, you will get to the busy fun night life in Grove street area. Many new restaurants opened nearby. (we have 3 restaurant in 1 block!)

name: Modern House in Hoboken - 15 mins from Midtown.
description:
Exquisite 2000 sq ft. Carriage House - 3 Bed/3 Full Bath - A unique and private oasis. 10' ceilings, 8' NY style doors, hardwood floors, skylights, designer kitchen w 54" cabinetry and polished stone countertops, gas stove, custom bathrooms, Bosch appliances, custom tile work, window treatments & floor to ceiling windows. 2 floors w deck & private backyard! Urban sophistication tucked away w privacy & convenience.
**Please send us a quick note inquiring about avail before booking :)

NO PARTIES.

The space
.
ABSOLUTELY NO PARTIES.

Beautiful open modern design... This home features smart house technology, custom built-ins, and custom LED accent lighting. The layout affords a civilized upstairs/ downstairs living space. Suitable for entertaining both upscale & casual, there is a smoker outside for those that love a good BBQ. Even a ping pong table for work off the dinner! And did we mention lots & lots of GREAT LIGHT! Windows surround
neighborhood_overview: Hoboken is extremely safe, and continues to grow in popularity. Several parks, bars, restaurants (great food anywhere you go), cafes, clothing and grocery stores (like Trader Joe's) are all nearby. Take a stroll to the Hudson river a few blocks away and watch the sunrise over the NYC skyline. Even have a movie theatre within walking distance!
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
Hiya,
We are a professional couple that lives in NYC/ Woodstock most of the time.  We are in the film business, so we travel quite a lot, and love our homes that we are offering here ~

About us?  We enjoy anything outdoors.  Running, hiking, skiing, biking, etc.  And whether you want to be near the city or in the country, both of our homes are completely suited for comfort and peacefulness ~

The Hoboken House is perfect for families or larger groups that want to visit the city, but want a chill place to retreat in the evenings.  It offers an 'upstairs/ downstairs' living option.  Downstairs / the private outdoor lawn / patio provide for refined entertaining or a casual BBQ.

The Streamside Cottage in famous Woodstock offers a 'writers retreat' or 'ski chalet' experience in the Catskill Mountains. The land is a real vortex of good energy and amazing wildlife.  We've been featured in "Better Homes & Gardens", too.

Hope you can come and stay,
Alex & Kara

name: Welcome to our historic house, minutes to NYC.
description:
Welcome to our 1870's newly renovated historic house filled with charm and comfort. Walking distance to subway... get to NYC in minutes.
Neighborhood has many restaurants offering a wide variety of international cuisine that highlights our beautifully diverse community.
Shop at the Newport Centre Mall a few blocks from the house... Macy's, plus 130 specialty shops, 11 movie theaters and more eateries to choose from.
Stunning open views of Manhattan from our Hudson River promenade.

The space
First floor has dining room, kitchen and living room.
Second floor has 2 bedrooms and a full bathroom.
Third floor had 2 bedrooms and a full bathroom.
Basement has washer and dryer.

Guest access
Entire house.

Other things to note
No unauthorized parking on the street.
neighborhood_overview: Safe, quiet and pedestrian friendly.
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about: We have been living in this charming neighborhood for 30 years. I am a psychologist from Rio de Janeiro and my husband James is an illustrator from New York. We have 2 grown kids and we are excited about this new phase in our lives. We have been renovating this 1870's historic landmarked house for the past 5 years, discovering the beauty of old Jersey City architecture. Now that we are done, we would like for you to come and enjoy.

A private bedroom for 1~3 people (couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers) in a ground / basement floor apartment of a 3 family house, at a quite street in Jersey Heights area of Jersey city. NJ Transit bus stop is right at the corner. 17~25 minutes express bus ride takes you to Time Square. 4 blocks from light rail train station. Free washer & Dryer. $15/day off street parking space upon reservation. $5/day visitor permit street parking. Supermarket, Grocery, restaurants are nearby.

The space
One bedroom, with basic furniture in an apartment on the ground / basement floor of a 3 family house. It is conveniently located in Jersey City Heights, New Jersey / the other side of Lincoln Tunnel .

The Bus Stop is right at the corner of our street. You can take NJ Transit Bus 119, 123 or Local Jitney Buses. It only takes you $4.50 and 17 - 25 minutes to be directly in Times Square by a bus in most time except weekday rush hours. The bus 85 will take
neighborhood_overview:

description:
This is an excellent one-bedroom apartment located in Hamilton Park which is the most desirable neighborhood in Jersey City! It is calm and clean, and Grove Street Station (PATH) is only a few blocks away (7 min walk). If you like shopping, Newport Centre is just a few minutes walk. There are lots of great restaurants/bars/cafes nearby, and the building has laundry machines in the basement.

The space
It is a 3rd-floor apartment (walk up) with everything you need! The bedroom has a queen sized bed, closet and drawers, and the windows are facing south. Lots of natural light comes in through the windows.

The living room has a sleeper sofa, a TV (cable) and a dining table that can host six people. The kitchen is fully equipped with cooking tools and appliances. The kitchen windows overlook the nice backyards of the building.

It has a central heating and cooling system that is quiet.

We provide basic necessities such as linens, towel

description: A safe and charming apartment located in Jersey City offering an easy access to restaurants, shopping, and Hoboken and NYC transportation.
neighborhood_overview:
Overlooking Hoboken and the Manhattan skyline, Jersey City Heights is becoming a go-to spot for new residents and tourists alike. It was previously an independent municipality that formally became part of Jersey City in 1870. Offering luscious green parks, the Riverview Arts District and bustling thoroughfares dotted with shops and restaurants, it’s clear the Heights is making its name as a premier destination. The house is located on a quiet and safe tree-lined street with direct access to Citi Bike and shopping and restaurants located on Central Avenue.
Jersey City Heights is very diverse neighborhood – Spanish, Italian, Indian, Asian, and many other ethnicities and a variety of food choices. The area has become a destination for young professionals, working in Manhattan and living in Jersey City, NJ. There is a large mix of many ethnicities and many people are choosing to live in Jersey City because of it and the low cost compared to Manhattan. You get the best of both worlds w

name: Spacious Studio/Downtown Jersey City/10min to NYC
description:
Studio apartment, 1 bath. 1 queen bed, 1 air mattress, small equipped kitchen, walk to subway (Grove PATH) & 7 min ride to NYC. Rates Vary. Charming and cozy!

The space
Private Entry. The unit is below grade yet has good lighting. The building is a 200 year old brick brownstone style dwelling. The air conditioner is a window unit. This is an urban NYC style apartment and not a fancy hotel or a new construction type of environment. If you are looking for a palace experience, please continue looking for a better fit. The apartment is a cozy, clean, and safe home away from home in mixed community. It is a stone's throw from NYC in a vibrant neighborhood with terrific restaurants. This apartment is a good solution for a couple or a family of 3 looking for peace and quiet after being out all day. Sound travels very easily in older houses. My family and I live in the apartment above the studio so you may hear my son's little feet. We do are best to keep the noise level

We do recommend the "DULCE DE LECHE" bakery at 376 central ave for breakfast and lunch.
For anyone who want fast access to Manhattan and reasonable dwelling price, this is idea place to stay.

name: Amazing Room with convenient transportation to NYC
description: The listing is for one private bedroom in a shared apartment fully furnished with brand new furniture, equipped with Air Conditioner and high-speed Wi-Fi. The place is located on a safe and quiet residential block, equipped with surveillance cameras and automatic locks for your safety.
neighborhood_overview:
Overlooking Hoboken and the Manhattan skyline, Jersey City Heights is becoming a go-to spot for new residents and tourists alike. It was previously an independent municipality that formally became part of Jersey City in 1870. Offering luscious green parks, the Riverview Arts District and bustling thoroughfares dotted with shops and restaurants, it’s clear the Heights is making its name as a premier destination.

Jersey City Heights is very diverse neighborhood – Spanish, Italian, Indian, Asian, and many other ethnicities and a variety of food choices. The area has become a destination for young professionals, working in Manhattan and living in Jersey City, NJ. There is a large mix of many ethnicities and many people are choosing to live in Jersey City because of it and the low cost compared to Manhattan. You get the best of both worlds when you visit Jersey City.

The key to Jersey City is convenience. check out https://youtu.be/14nd

One bedroom furnished basement apartment available. There is a private entrance at the back of the house. It has a washer/dryer, kitchen, microwave, fridge, and internet included. We also have a coffee-maker, coffee, tea, and water available as part of your stay.

name: The Victorian; Luxury 3bed, Easy to NY free park
description:
A serene modern Victorian getaway. This gorgeous house was built in 1909 a truly historic gem that was restored to its original glory. A spacious retreat outfitted for even the most discerning group of travelers. Whether you are visiting friends, traveling for work, or ready to live like a local. The Victorian is where you will want to relax after a day of enjoying the city.

The space
Designed with guests in mind. Comfort was a main goal , this was expressed in the queen memory foam mattress in each room as well as the gel infused pillows for a restful night after all the touring of the city sights. Simple amenities provided so you dont have to travel with extra weight .. fresh towels and linens as well as shampoo, body wash, soap and hair dryers.

Guest access
Guests have access to the backyard area. Laundry washer and dryer area. They also have access to one parking spot in the driveway (must be reserved)

Other things to not
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is great ! its the melting pot just like NYC with many cultures all around . Down the street you have access to everything from Pizza to Vietnamese and Filipino restaurants. It is a pretty quite street after a long day in the busy city.

name: Chic Large Family home! Quick train or bus to NYC!
description:
Our hip urban home is a great base for your family gatherings or City adventures! Gorgeous chef's kitchen, two 55" TVs with speedy WiFi (Netflix, Hulu, etc). Ideal for groups of 6 to 10 (but sleeps up to 17!). Vibrant family-friendly neighborhood, a short 20 min. walk to Journal Square PATH station which has buses & trains to NYC, Hoboken and Newark Airport, all within a 10-25 min subway ride. Our family lives in the downstairs attached home. Ask about on-site childcare & renting parking spaces.

The space
We are a local family, not absentee landlords. We live in the attached home below, but your home will have its own private, locked entry and entirely private spaces.

Built over a century ago, our fully-renovated 3 bedroom/2 bath home includes a well-lit Victorian double salon with high ceilings and a spacious attic bonus room (a great hideaway for kids and teenagers— or couples who want a big bed for each to sleep on) where there are two queen beds,
neighborhood_overview:
Jersey City is a gem with the best view of the Manhattan skyline and a 7 min drive to the Statue of Liberty! Hoboken, home of Carlo's Bakery, is our next door neighbor. Our neighborhood is especially family friendly and walkable. Enjoy tennis, picnicking, bike trails and multiple playgrounds, all within a 3-minute walk from your home away from home. Just around the corner is a Catholic church, an array of ethnic eateries, a Dairy Queen, convenience stores, fruitstands, hair salons, etc.

We are also close to Liberty State Park, where you can catch a ferry to the Statue of Liberty, Ellis Island, or to NYC!
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about:
We are the parents of three, and licensed for foster parenting; Mike is a professor and Kennan teaches at a cancer hospital in NYC. We consider ourselves to be committed to our community. 
We speak Spanish (though we are rusty).  Kennan can sign (though she is rusty too). But we would love to get some practice.

name: 3BR: 15-25 minute bus to Times Square/15 to Newark
description:
Stay in the closest legal vacation rental area to Times Square New York City and enjoy a 15-25 minute bus ride to Times Square with skyline views of Manhattan. Live in a well-equipped, turn-of-the century townhouse in a safe, quiet neighborhood with a bustling local dining and shopping scene. Every sleeping quarter features 50-inch Roku Streaming LED TV and the most comfortable beds. Bathrooms have shampoo, conditioner, shower gel, and hand soap. City-wide WiFi available.

The space
This charming turn-of-the-century townhouse has ceiling fans in every bedroom and in the kitchen, and hardwood floors and ceramic tiles throughout. Each bedroom and the living room features 50-inch Roku Streaming LED TVs and the some of the most comfortable and highest rated beds in the industry. Enjoy a shower underneath the highest rated rain shower head or take a bath in the tub. Living room contains 2 futon sofas furnished with some of the most comfortable futon mattresses availab
neighborhood_overview: Considered the 6th borough of New York City, this place is the closest you can be to Times Square in a neighborhood that legally allows vacation rentals and home-sharing. It is right across the Hudson River from Manhattan with frequent bus service (every 5-10 minutes) to and from Times Square. It has a bustling local food scene with cuisines from around the world. The neighborhood is safe and friendly. Skyscrapers dot the coastline that overlook the New York City skyline right across the Hudson River.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
I love to travel, explore, discover new things, and meet new people.  I'm energetic and optimistic.  I love all types of food from Mexican to French, and everything in between.  I enjoy a nice bottle of wine, preferably full-bodied red.  More than anything, aside from family and friends, I love water.  I've been to the beaches of Cabo, Cancun, Puerto Rico, Hawaii, and Thailand (and California, Florida, and New York, of course), but I can't get enough of white, powder sand beneath my feet, warm ocean breezes blowing gently across my face, and perfectly warm ocean water embracing me.

I am clean, well-mannered, and respectful of others' property and belongings as a guest, treating their home like my own, and expect my guests to treat my place the same.

description:
Beautiful private room in the Hamilton Park district of Jersey City just minutes to Manhattan! This is the largest room in the house, quiet and cozy. The space is shared, but large enough for privacy and you will not be disturbed. We offer free hi speed WiFi, a kitchenette for your use upstairs. You’re also located right near the Grove Street entertainment plaza. The house is a gem in a great area/location and you will love it!

Guest access
Entire home

Other things to note
This room is a shared bathroom with me, BUT since I work in travel and am gone 3-4 days a week, you’ll have the bathroom to yourself most of the time. Also there are 2 full bathrooms, so if no one else is there by all means feel free to use either, we’re super laid back here and want you to make yourself feel right at home :) and since I travel a lot I don’t keep much in the bathroom so you can store all your items in there no problem at all
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is fantastic! There’s a shopping center and mall within a 5 minute walk, also the popular Grove Street Plaza is just a short 5 minute walk also, but don’t worry the neighborhood itself is very quiet, so no loud noise at all and you will be able to rest and relax comfortably.

name: 15-25 minute bus to Times Square/20 min to Newark
description:
Stay in the closest legal vacation rental area to Times Square New York City and enjoy a 15-25 minute bus ride to Times Square with skyline views of Manhattan. Live in a renovated, well-equipped, turn-of-the century townhouse in a safe, quiet neighborhood with a bustling dining and shopping scene. Your private suite with door lock features a 50-inch LED TV and very comfortable beds. Bathrooms have shampoo, conditioner, shower gel, and hand soap. City-wide WiFi available.

The space
This charming turn-of-the-century townhouse was renovated with new ceiling fan in the bedroom and in the kitchen, and hardwood floors and ceramic tiles throughout. It has been lovingly updated to contemporary standards while accentuating old world charm. Your bedroom and the living room feature 50-inch Roku Streaming LED TVs. The gel memory foam mattresses are among the highest rated and most comfortable in the industry. Bathrooms feature shampoo, conditioner, shower gel, and hand soap.
neighborhood_overview: Considered the 6th borough of New York City, this neighborhood is the closest you can legally be to Times Square and New York City in a vacation rental or shared home. It is right across the Hudson River from Manhattan with frequent bus service (every 5-10 minutes) to and from Times Square. It has a bustling local food scene with cuisines from around the world. The neighborhood is safe and friendly. Skyscrapers dot the coastline that overlook the New York City skyline right across the Hudson River.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
I love to travel, explore, discover new things, and meet new people.  I'm energetic and optimistic.  I love all types of food from Mexican to French, and everything in between.  I enjoy a nice bottle of wine, preferably full-bodied red.  More than anything, aside from family and friends, I love water.  I've been to the beaches of Cabo, Cancun, Puerto Rico, Hawaii, and Thailand (and California, Florida, and New York, of course), but I can't get enough of white, powder sand beneath my feet, warm ocean breezes blowing gently across my face, and perfectly warm ocean water embracing me.

I am clean, well-mannered, and respectful of others' property and belongings as a guest, treating their home like my own, and expect my guests to treat my place the same.

name: Stylish Apt 40 mins from NYC - TV, Parking, W/D
description:
Monthly renters welcome.

Rent this tastefully decorated, sun drenched one bedroom urban apartment 40 minutes away from Manhattan. Located 2 blocks from the light rail train in the bustling Bergen-Lafayette section of Jersey City, this unit features a driveway for parking, plush queen bed, an extra air mattress, 49" LED TV, Netflix and WiFi, fully equipped kitchen, walk-in shower, and in-unit laundry. You will be steps away from parks and trendy restaurants.

The space
This apartment has been updated to feature a mix of modern design and old-world brick townhouse charm. Everything you need is provided - fresh towels, tissue paper, soaps/shampoo/bodywash, cooking utensils and new appliances. Ground coffee and coffee maker in the kitchen will power your mornings and prepare you for a full day of NYC sightseeing.

Guest access
You may park your vehicle in the gated driveway in front of the house and enjoy a small backyard area in
neighborhood_overview:
Bergen-Lafayette is an urban neighborhood offering a diverse mix of residents, sights, and activities. This is a decent neighborhood and is generally safe. Please remember you are in Jersey City, not all of its streets are lined with charming brownstones and upscale restaurants. Some blocks, like ours, will give you extra entertainment in the form of the occasional loud boombox or kids playing lively games of hide and seek on the street.

Uber is very popular in Jersey City, and a ride between the apartment and the PATH station at Exchange Place in Downtown won't cost more than $10. They will take a group of 4 people, which means your cost per-person will be lower than the $2.5 light rail ticket. If you haven't used Uber before, let me know and I will send you an invite which comes with a small discount.

name: Luxury Modern 3 BR 2Bath Apartment Close to NYC
description:
Our recent renovated 3 bedroom 2 bath luxury modern apartment is located in Jersey City, NJ (the only city legalized airbnb in NYC area). Easy Commute to NYC Times Square, WTC & Met Life Stadium. Luxury bedding, modern kitchen, spacious rooms . Sleep up to 14 people. Express Bus 119 to NYC Time Square is 1 blocks away. Walk or Bus / Uber ride to Journal Square PATH Train Station, then take PATH train to WTC or Manhattan 34 st. 2 blocks to Reservoir and beautiful Pershing Field Park.

The space
Located 1 blocks away from a bus stop of NJ Transit Express bus 119 for easy access to NYC's Times Square, WTC etc. This modern luxury 3 Bedroom 2 bath apartment feature 450 + thread luxury bedding, wifi, kitchenware, everything else you need to enjoy your home away from home. It's the perfect place to relax after a day of sightseeing and shopping.

* 50” Flat screen Smart UHDTV with Netflix local channels etc.
* Modern Kitchen with Stainless Steel Appliance
neighborhood_overview:
Jersey City Heights, "The Heights" is a family friendly and safe area. Our apartment is located on a quiet street. There are a lot of restaurants, groceries, bakeries and supermarket on near by commercial street Central ave. Pershing Field and the Reservoir, originally constructed in 1871 are 2 blocks away.

Jersey City is one of the most multicultural diversity city in USA. All types of unique food and services can be find here.

For anyone who want fast access to Manhattan and reasonable dwelling price, this is idea place to stay.
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about:
Our family lives in north NJ. We love travel and enjoy taking care of our short term rental properties. We have been renting our vacation house in Kissimmee, FL since 2005, and renting our NYC apartments since 2011. Now we start to offer our rental properties in Jersey City, NJ to airbnb guests. We will welcome you to enjoy our places. 

Our Orlando House is only few miles away from Disney World. This 1970 sqft vacation house with pool and spa is located in a luxury vacation resort and managed by a local management company.  We handle all the rentals ourselves.

Our Jersey City luxury apartments are managed by ourselves.

name: Spacious Apt - Home Away From Home. Mins from NYC!
description:
Find your "home away from home" in this spacious, 2 bedroom apt in a trending neighborhood of Jersey City! Just ½ a block from a Light Rail station, you're just 20 short mins from NYC! It's well maintained, comfortable w/ capacity to sleep 6 guests. Take advantage of the large eat in kitchen w/ cookware, 2 sitting areas, hardwood floors throughout, access to a beautifully manicured lawn w/ fire pit. Amenities also include 55 in Smart TV, USB charging ports and washer & dryer. Welcome home!

The space
1000+ square feet of living space. High ceilings. Lots of natural light if desired. When away from home, guest sometimes want to "veg out". That's why we provide 190 channels on the 55 inch smart tv, as well as super fast wifi speed for the TV, your phone, laptop or other devices you bring .

Guest access
Guest will have access to the entire 1st floor apartment and, laundry room in finished basement, and landscaped backyard with fire pit
neighborhood_overview: LIGHT RAIL STATION is just 1/2 block away.  LIGHT RAIL CAFE is a great neighborhood bar just 1 block away.  Serves great food and drinks.  Definitely give a feel for the diversity of the diversity of people and styles in the area.  CARTERET GROCERY & DELI is right across the street from apartment which is a life saver for all your last minute grabs - Aleve, Pepto, Snacks, Soft Drinks, or a can of pasta sauce!  BERRY LANE PARK just 2 blocks away.  Berry Lane Park is the largest municipal park in Jersey City. Just opened 19 months ago it features include two basketball courts, two tennis courts, baseball field, soccer field, a playground, walk/run course, work out stations, large kid's water splash pad and 600 new trees.

name: Beautiful room close to Manhattan
description:
Private room in Beautiful decorated apartment with a great location, minutes away from Manhattan and a withing steps from restaurants , cafes , parks , mall and easy transportation to and from main airports in the NYC area

The space
It's a private room in an original brownstone apartment located in the middle of the historic jersey city downtown full of parks ; nightlife ; restaurants and shops. Minutes from Manhattan by train or ferry and beautiful decorated to make your stay even better

Guest access
Guests have access to use the kitchen for basic preparations of meals and of course the bathroom, shared also by my roomate

Other things to note
I have a roomate who’s sleeps in the living room of the apartment so the room is completely private for your comfort and leisure
neighborhood_overview: Jersey City Downtown have so much to offer .. from tons of restaurants; cafes and bars to parks and shopping centers; breathtaking views from Manhattan and lots of history

name: Cute and Modern Room in Jersey City
description:
Modern style home in Jersey City located near Liberty State Park and the Statue of Liberty. Walking distance to public Light Rail transportation. Close to downtown Jersey City with lots of restaurants and shops and only about 45 minutes to downtown NYC. This is a great and close way to visit NYC without paying a lot for a nice room.

The space
Guests will have a private room. There are two shared bathrooms (one shower). Plenty of living and dining room space. Guests can also use my private driveway.

Guest access
Guest will have access to all common areas including the living room, kitchen and both bathrooms. Washer and dryer is also available.
neighborhood_overview: Only 15 minutes away from downtown Jersey City with restaurants, bars and shopping. Also an easy commute to NYC with 24 hour Path train.
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about: Fun-loving, easy-going marketing professional. I like to travel and experience new cultures. Working and Living in the New York / Jersey City area is exciting and I enjoy exploring. There's always something new to see and do.

name: Huge 25 foot loft $50 3 blocks from PATH
description:
A huge spacious loft 20 x 25 ft. King-sized bed, dorm-sized fridge, microwave, WIFI, air-conditioner. Flooded with light from 2 Skylights and three windows. Furnishings are an eclectic mix of period pieces. Work desk area, round oak dining table with four chairs. Small cozy sitting areas, futon sofa. dressers, clothes cabinet. Kitchen and bathroom are shared. The bathroom is located on the second floor and the loft is located on the fourth floor. We are in a National Historic district.

The space
A very spacious, quiet, light-filled space

Other things to note
House cat on premises
neighborhood_overview: House is located within a few blocks of many restaurants and drinking establishment and very close to Liberty State Park and the Hudson river

name: Luxury JC Condo, 3 blks PATH, 2 stps Manhattan WTC
description:
Downtown completely renovated 2nd story Historic Brick Condo 3 blocks from PATH subway access (2 stops World Trade and West Village), guaranteed parking 1 block away, 15 min drive to NYC. Perfect for business travelers or visiting couples w/ convenient NYC access, high speed internet access and 32" monitor, printer. You'll love the Jules Verne themed dining area and lavish amenities.

The space
We purchased and renovated the place, gutting the plaster interior and exposing the original 1852 brick to build our fantasy condo. The condo is on the second floor (1 flight of steps) of an apartment building across from City Hall and 3 blocks from downtown Jersey City with upscale restaurants, entertainment and shopping.

The first thing you see opening the door to the condo is the brick wall illuminated by a dozen halogen spots giving the interior a warm cozy feeling. The dining area we call the “Nautilus corner” was themed from the Jules Verne story and includ
neighborhood_overview: We are in the heart of the downtown Jersey City district.  1/2 block away is Grove Street which has many restaurants and bars.  3 blocks away is Newark Avenue which is a pedestrian street (closed to traffic) where the heart of 20+ eateries of every imaginable cuisine.

name: Spacious 1br close to Journal Sq (3 stops to NYC)
description:
Recently renovated cozy apartment in peaceful neighborhood in 5min to PATH. From Journal Square you can take PATH train to New York downtown (15 min) or to New York midtown (40 min to Empire State Building). Path works 24/7 hours.

The space
It is the old SSA administration building which was renovated in 2015. With 48 apartments and cool amenities it has all you need to cope with COVID or quarantine yourself.

Guest access
Building have two shared areas: rooftop and basement. Rooftop views are facing Manhattan Skyline and Statue of Liberty and basement has Gym, Billiards, ping-pong, kicker(Foosball), washer/dryer. Washer(2$) and Dryer(1.50$) are paid separately. We will leave a Laundry card that you can refill in laundry room.
neighborhood_overview: Pretty calm area around building: courthouse, college buildings and library.
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about: Lead software engineer building his career abroad. Love to travel. I’m collecting flags from countries and regions that me and my wife have visited. Fond of meeting new people.

name: Cove’s Compound /downtown JC. Sleeps 10 6 mins nyc
description:
4 minutes from the Grove Street PATH and sleeps up to 17 people! Whether you have a large group or just like a lot of space, this Compound is for you.
Take over not one but two floors of this 3 story walk up in the ❤️ of Dtown JC! With four bedrooms and 2 working kitchens, Two bathrooms and living rooms also. Perfect for larger groups that need some alone time. Great for multiple families. A large sunny back yard for the kids or a gathering.

The space
This compound is comprised of two separate apartments. The duplex complete with two kitchens, two baths, four bedrooms is four short blocks from Grove street PATH. 6 mins to NYC by train. Awesome restaurants all around. Great bar scene. Family friendly places and activities and museums.

It’s an older walk up building, but has all the basics for a successful stay. If you are looking for new construction this isn’t the place for you. But, if you are budget minded and love a great location at an ama
neighborhood_overview: Terrific restaurants, bars, public parks like Hamilton park, liberty state and van Vorst Park. Museums and NYC are just minutes away by train.
host_location: Jersey City, NJ, Rochester, NY, Cape May, NJ
host_about: Independent business owner since 9/10/2001 along with wife of 15 years and mother of two small wonderful children.  Own a couple buildings in Jersey City and lived full time there for 13 years.  Moved to upstate NY to care for a elderly parent who has recently passed away, so am debating a permanent move back (moving is just so horrible...and takes some time) So, in the meantime have decided to Air BB the apartment that we use when in JC.

name: Modern "hotel suite" type studio apt near Grove st
description:
Beautifully design studio, with state of the art amenities, gives you a hotel suite type feel with a homely atmosphere.

The studio offers comfortable queen size bed and a work desk. Also, the over-sized windows floor to ceiling windows provides sufficient sunlight.
PATH train station is just a 10 min walk. You can take a direct train from here to NYC. Light rail station is across the street, for travel within jersey city.

Studio is set up with a first aid kit, pots & pans, and dinnerware.

The space
Beautifully design studio, with state of the art amenities, gives you a hotel suite type feel with a homely atmosphere, gracious kitchen, spa-like bathrooms and modern appliances. The studio offers comfortable queen size bed and a work desk. Also, the over-sized windows floor to ceiling windows provides sufficient sunlight.

PATH train station is just a 10 min walk. You can take a direct train from here to NYC. Light rail station
neighborhood_overview: Jersey City’s Grove Street is one of the best places to live and merely 7 minutes train ride (PATH) to Manhattan. It has beautiful waterfront,  park, stylish restaurants, cafes, bars, spas and shops. This area has a peaceful appeal with the neighboring Liberty Landing Marina. Also, this area is pretty safe and very livable.

description:
Stylish bedroom with queen size bed. In this bedroom there is also comfortable place with desk to read, work and plan a trip to NYC:) Fully renovated bathroom with bathtub/shower. Also my quests can use big and fully equipped kitchen.

The space
My quests not only can use the bedroom but also there is a beautiful bathroom with big bathtub and shower. Big and fully functional kitchen with microwave, coffee maker and stove. Other things to note
Day before your arrival I would provide you with the directions how to access the house.

name: 3BR-10 min PATH to downtown New York/15 to Newark
description:
Stay in the closest legal vacation rental area to downtown New York City. Enjoy a 10-minute PATH metro ride to World Trade Center plus skyline views of downtown NYC and Jersey City. Live in a renovated, well-equipped townhouse in a safe neighborhood with a bustling local dining and shopping scene. Every sleeping quarter features 50-inch 4K Roku Streaming LED TVs and lavishly comfortable beds. Bathrooms have shampoo, conditioner, shower gel, hand soap, and moisturizer. City-wide WiFi available.

The space
This charming turn-of-the-century brick townhouse has been recently renovated with ceiling fans in every room and hardwood floors throughout. It has been lovingly updated to contemporary standards while accentuating old world charm. Each bedroom and the living room features 50-inch 4K Roku Streaming LED TVs and the some of the most comfortable and highest rated beds in the industry. Bathrooms feature wall-mounted dispensers for shampoo, conditioner, shower gel, h
neighborhood_overview: Considered the 6th borough of New York City, this place is the closest you can be to downtown New York City in a neighborhood that legally allows vacation rentals and home-sharing. It is right across the Hudson River from Manhattan with frequent PATH metro service (every 5-10 minutes) to and from World Trade Center, Financial District, 911 Memorial, and midtown Manhattan. It has a bustling local food scene with cuisines from around the world. The neighborhood is safe and friendly. Skyscrapers dot the coastline that overlook the New York City skyline right across the Hudson River.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
I love to travel, explore, discover new things, and meet new people.  I'm energetic and optimistic.  I love all types of food from Mexican to French, and everything in between.  I enjoy a nice bottle of wine, preferably full-bodied red.  More than anything, aside from family and friends, I love water.  I've been to the beaches of Cabo, Cancun, Puerto Rico, Hawaii, and Thailand (and California, Florida, and New York, of course), but I can't get enough of white, powder sand beneath my feet, warm ocean breezes blowing gently across my face, and perfectly warm ocean water embracing me.

I am clean, well-mannered, and respectful of others' property and belongings as a guest, treating their home like my own, and expect my guests to treat my place the same.

name: Charming Jersey City Apartment, NYC Skyline Views
description:
Charming and cozy apartment in a Victorian home located in the Bergen Hill neighborhood of Jersey City. Beautiful panoramic city views. Close to Journal Square (1 mile) and Downtown JC (1.5 miles). Approximately 20-40 minutes to New York City depending on method of transportation and destination. Large bedroom with queen bed. Smaller 2nd bedroom with day bed that opens to a queen-size bed. The 2nd bedroom is located off the main bedroom. Large living room with queen size air mattress available.

The space
Charming apartment on the 2nd floor of a Victorian home located in the Bergen Hill neighborhood of Jersey City. Beautiful panoramic city views.

Large bedroom with queen size bed.

Smaller 2nd bedroom with day bed that opens to a queen-size bed. The 2nd bedroom is located off the main bedroom. Guests must walk through the main bedroom to enter the 2nd bedroom.

Large living room with queen size air mattress available.
neighborhood_overview:
The home is located on a quiet one-way street. It is a residential neighborhood but still the city. The neighborhood is close to both the Journal Square PATH train station (1 mile away) and Downtown Jersey City (1.5 miles to the Downtown JC Grove St. PATH train).

Although it is still the city, this is a more residential neighborhood and does not feature many cafes and restaurants within close walking distance as opposed to the bustling neighborhood of Downtown Jersey City. We can recommend a few lovely restaurants and cafes within 5-15 minutes walking from the home. Otherwise Downtown Jersey City is just a short 5-7 minute drive or one stop on the PATH train.

The home is located 1 mile from both Lincoln Park and Liberty State Park which features beautiful views of the Stature of Liberty and New York City and ferries to Ellis Island and the Statue.
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about: Hi, we’re Jeff and Vera. We love to travel, exploring new places and visiting friends and family around the world. At home we keep it simple and enjoy listening to music from our vinyl record selection, preferably paired with a nice wine or cocktail.

name: BRIGHT HOMEY AND COZY  MINUTES TO NEW YORK  CITY
description:
A beautiful private apartment close to NYC in less than 30 minutes, Buses around the corner, located in a quiet and safe neighborhood, near all stores and Restaurants, Kitchen, bathroom tub/shower, Two double bed-size, 12 inches bed/memory foam mattress, recliner chair and comfortable couch in living room

The space
It's cozy and quiet - you will feel at home upon arrival - Private home with three apartments. This listing is for our second floor apartment which is a walk up

Guest access
You have full access to the entire apartment during your stay. The entire Apartment is only for the use of our guests not share with anyone else

Other things to note
There is only Street parking available and needs a visitor parking permit that cost $5 daily
We have USB plugs available
neighborhood_overview:
This cozy and warm Apt located in a safe neighborhood, on a street full of families and great people. If you are looking for a friendly place to stay while you enjoy the area, we are it! and is close and walking distance to Restaurants and Supermarkets.
It’s two blocks from the bus stop to NYC public transportation takes you to Port Authority 42nd street Times Square buses runs very often every 5 to 8 minutes which We recommend.
"UBER" is in Jersey YAY!!! ;D download the app and travel around for cheap !
host_location: New Jersey, United States
host_about:
Kenia and I are parents of three beautiful children.  Our house is a family home that we cherish dearly. 

We love to host and are happy to join the Airbnb community to share our beautiful home with you. 

We enjoy going to museums - having family gatherings, music and of course good food.  

Look forward to having the opportunity to host you. 

Rod & Kenia 

"Live every moment of your life fully"

name: Light-Flooded Room with Floor-to-Ceiling Windows
description:
One large bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows, facing West. Apartment has large living room and kitchen area. Convenient location. Bus stop to NYC at door steps, 5 minutes walk to PATH and NJ Transit stations.

The space
One large bedroom in a spacious 2BR apartment to share. The room gets tons of natural light with window facing West.

Spacious living area with plenty of natural light, high ceilings, hardwood floor, large living room, full kitchen, full bath, central air, dishwasher, washer/dryer in the apartment. Easy access to rooftop.

The blue room has a door hanger. Closet and drawers space are limited. The bedroom is facing the quiet side of the street. Neighbors are quiet and friendly, all female tenants. This room is female preferred and will be shared with a female student attending business school.

Guest access
Well-equipped full kitchen and living room that guest is welcome to use.
neighborhood_overview: The building is in downtown Hoboken, three short blocks to the train stations. Building is located close to all the great shops, restaurants, cafes and bars. Beautiful and safe location, close to the waterfront.

name: 4BR: 15-25 minute bus to Times Square/15 to Newark
description:
Stay in the closest legal vacation rental area to Times Square New York City and enjoy a 15-25 minute bus ride to Times Square with skyline views of Manhattan. Live in a well-equipped, turn-of-the century townhouse in a safe, quiet neighborhood with a bustling local dining and shopping scene. Every sleeping quarter features 50-inch Roku Streaming LED TV and the most comfortable beds. Bathrooms have shampoo, conditioner, shower gel, and hand soap. City-wide WiFi available.

The space
This charming turn-of-the-century townhouse has ceiling fans in every bedroom and in the kitchen, and hardwood floors and ceramic tiles throughout. Each bedroom and the living room features 50-inch Roku Streaming LED TVs and the some of the most comfortable and highest rated beds in the industry. Enjoy a shower underneath the highest rated rain shower head or take a bath in the tub. Living room contains 2 futon sofas furnished with some of the most comfortable futon mattresses availab
neighborhood_overview: Considered the 6th borough of New York City, this place is the closest you can be to Times Square in a neighborhood that legally allows vacation rentals and home-sharing. It is right across the Hudson River from Manhattan with frequent bus service (every 5-10 minutes) to and from Times Square. It has a bustling local food scene with cuisines from around the world. The neighborhood is safe and friendly. Skyscrapers dot the coastline that overlook the New York City skyline right across the Hudson River.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
I love to travel, explore, discover new things, and meet new people.  I'm energetic and optimistic.  I love all types of food from Mexican to French, and everything in between.  I enjoy a nice bottle of wine, preferably full-bodied red.  More than anything, aside from family and friends, I love water.  I've been to the beaches of Cabo, Cancun, Puerto Rico, Hawaii, and Thailand (and California, Florida, and New York, of course), but I can't get enough of white, powder sand beneath my feet, warm ocean breezes blowing gently across my face, and perfectly warm ocean water embracing me.

I am clean, well-mannered, and respectful of others' property and belongings as a guest, treating their home like my own, and expect my guests to treat my place the same.
