name: Lux 1 Bedroom w/wifi at Newport Jersey City
description:
Overlooking the breathtaking Manhattan skyline & harbor this luxury 40 story high-rise offers great amenities including a community center equipped with billiards, a gaming area and flat screen televisions, as well as a newly renovated fitness center.

The space
Your new home is beautifully designed with luxury features including granite kitchen counter tops, hardwood floors & carpeting, walk-in closets, in unit washer/dryer, individual heat/air conditioning and alarm system.

Your fully appointed apartment is furnished with all the necessities of home, including linens and towels.

Property amenities include:

• Controlled access
• Resident lounge
• Meeting room
• Clubhouse
• Large newly remodeled fitness center with new equipment
• Sun Deck
• Community room with billiards, gaming area, flat screen TVs, fireplace & computers
• Children's play area with flat screen TV
•On-site restaurant
neighborhood_overview:
This apartment building is located directly across the Hudson River from New York City, within a large commerce hub in Jersey City, New Jersey. Guests can enjoy local entertainment and delicious eatery from the local shops and restaurants located within walking distance.
This location is known as one of the most diverse cities on the East Coast and a perfect destination; not only for business but also leisure travelers. Jersey City is a hub of industry with its oil refineries, warehouses, and plants. Although known for its industrial prowess, Jersey City’s gem is Liberty State Park, which offers impeccable views of Manhattan, the Statue of Liberty, and Ellis Island.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
We have been providing vacation rental apartments for over 10 years across the East Coast. We are known for our distinctively furnished apartments in popular locations, and for our attentive service. You’ll find that our rates are quite reasonable. If you're looking for a safe, comfortable place with fabulous amenities and Wi-Fi (we know you need the Wi-Fi!) in the Boston MA area, Washington DC, Miami FL or very close to NYC in Jersey City or Hoboken, we'd love to host you. Many of the buildings where our apartments are located feature amenities such as beautiful lobbies, 24 hour front desk staff, fitness centers, business centers, recreation rooms, indoor or outdoor pools and whirlpools. If you are traveling with children, some buildings offer playgrounds (many buildings are near public playgrounds as well) or indoor playrooms. Depending on the location, you can stay for just a few days, a week, a month or more. 

We offer an assortment of short-term apartments in sizes ranging from a studio to three bedrooms that are fully furnished with all the comforts of home. Our local staff meticulously prepares your apartment before your arrival, and we offer 24 hour assistance for any emergencies after business hours. When you arrive at your apartment, the beds will be made, towels and bath amenities will be stocked in the bathrooms, and the coffee maker will be set up in the kitchen with some sample coffees, sweetener and creamer (teabags too if that is your preference) to start your morning off properly. If you’d like to cook a meal, the kitchen is stocked with dishes, cutlery, glassware and pots and pans. The living room is set up with a TV and cable channels, and the Wi-Fi router password and instructions will be prominently displayed so you can get connected quickly. You can also make local and toll-free phone calls at no charge. 

Please contact us to confirm the exact availability of the apartment you are interested in. We’d love to host you (and your family) for your vacation or business trip.

It’s a safe neighborhood and the tenants upstairs are very nice young men.

name: ❤️ Tiny House in the Garden | NYC | NJC l NEW
description:
The Garden Tiny House is a designer place, BRAND NEW, and mad COSY! New new new and awesome!

Stay in this charming, Garden Tiny House, a writer’s quaint dream, freshly re-designed and remodeled, while still holding 1900’s character.

Just minutes away from the beautiful Lincoln Park and a walk and a few path train stops away from The West Village and FiDi ( more about that in the Getting Around section )

The space
❤️“We absolutely loved our stay! We booked this for part of our honeymoon & loved it!”
❤️“The place was fantastic for my eleven year old daughter and me. It was exact as the photos shown on the application. It is so nicely decorated, that looks like a fairy tale house.”

Embrace the freedom of minimalistic living in this charming Garden Tiny House. While it has a 250 sq ft surface, it's built in mind with the small footprint principles and feels spacious and sunny. The giant windows offer plenty of natural light and t
neighborhood_overview:
Like the majority of affordable Airbnb listings in Jersey City and Brooklyn, our Tiny House is located in an up and coming neighborhood, further away from the crazy. As it consist of mostly residential houses, it’s quite and friendly. There is a grocery store and a few restaurants a couple of blocks away, and that specific street is in the middle of a gentrification process, but it’s totally safe.
The Lincoln Park around the corner is charming and my personal favorite thing about the neighborhood.
Get away from the busy and noisy Manhattan streets once you’ve enjoyed touristing around and enjoy a walk or morning jog in Lincoln Park! 👟🌳🌸

Street parking is easy to find ( a NYC metro area easy though, please keep that in mind:) )

Getting to NYC is easy peasy!
It takes 25min+ to get to Manhattan, depending on how you decide to get there.

Like driving?
It's about a bit 20 minute drive to get to Manhattan with no traffic.
Like to
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
Art Director&Designer working in advertising. I love all things pretty, colors and nature.

Me and my hubby like to travel all over the world. We come back inspired to create special experiences and spaces that we love sharing with our guests in the NYC outer area.

Mommy of an orange tabby and an adorable dachshund mutt.

Check in and Check out is very Flexible (we will work with
neighborhood_overview:

name: JerseyCityHts - True Airbnb Experience (Co-exist)
description:
Come join me for some cafe, as you explore the City! The available room is spacious, fitting 4 people comfortably, with TV, air-conditioner, Wifi, closet, private entrance to the private room, double/single sized air mattress upon request. Ideal for travelers looking to experience NYC without the expensive cost to stay in NYC. Public transportation into the City is 10/20 mins depending on traffic/route! Public Transportation leaves you right at the heart of NYC, at Times square!

The space
The apartment is a "rail road" style apartment, with two separate entrance to the apartment. We're on the second floor (but the stairs aren't that steep). Guests will be able to go and come as they please using the door closest to your room! This apartment is officially a 2 bedroom apartment however the second bedroom is bigger than usual, which is where you would be staying at!

Guest access
Everyone is welcomed to use the kitchen,living room, restroom. I
neighborhood_overview: Jersey Heights is really a underrated neighborhood. The real value is being able to kind of get away from the City and enjoy the view from the park right around the corner! This location is great for anyone looking to experience the city but also feel like you can get away from it. At Jersey Heights we have bars/coffee spots within walking distant ("fox&crow", "modcup coffee", "the cliff"). You can take a nice short walk to the park and enjoy the view of the city and some coffee. We also have citi bikes that can get you around from Jersey Heights to Hoboken.
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about:
Come hang out with me and my parents! We would love to share a glass of wine and talk about your travels! I personally love having my parents stay with me and enjoy their presence, needless to say I'm very family oriented. I have a passion for digital marketing (my day job) and cook ( my weekend job as a kitchen assistant for Institute of culinary education). I love reading books across multiple genres, I actually started hosting after reaching the airbnb story written by Leigh Gallagher! 

I personally love traveling, the type of travels I tend to do varies based on the crowd that's tagging along. Personally some of my favorite experience came from traveling alone to other parts of the world. Nothing beats having to survive and meet new people like traveling on your own. It's an exhilarating feeling to come into something new and have the opportunity to feel comfortable/immersed into another culture!

name: 15 minute bus to Times Square / 15 min to Newark
description:
Stay in the closest legal vacation rental area to Times Square New York City and enjoy a 15-25 minute bus ride to Times Square with skyline views of Manhattan. Live in a renovated, well-equipped, turn-of-the century townhouse in a safe, quiet neighborhood with a bustling dining and shopping scene. Your private suite with door lock features a 50-inch LED TV and very comfortable beds. Bathrooms have shampoo, conditioner, shower gel, and hand soap. City-wide WiFi available.

The space
This charming turn-of-the-century townhouse was renovated with new ceiling fan in the bedroom and in the kitchen, and hardwood floors and ceramic tiles throughout. It has been lovingly updated to contemporary standards while accentuating old world charm. Your bedroom and the living room feature 50-inch Roku Streaming LED TVs. The gel memory foam mattresses are among the highest rated and most comfortable in the industry. Bathrooms feature shampoo, conditioner, shower gel, and hand soap.
neighborhood_overview: Considered the 6th borough of New York City, this place is the closest you can be to Times Square in a neighborhood that legally allows vacation rentals and home-sharing. It is right across the Hudson River from Manhattan with frequent bus service (every 5-10 minutes) to and from Times Square. It has a bustling local food scene with cuisines from around the world. The neighborhood is safe and friendly. Skyscrapers dot the coastline that overlook the New York City skyline right across the Hudson River.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
I love to travel, explore, discover new things, and meet new people.  I'm energetic and optimistic.  I love all types of food from Mexican to French, and everything in between.  I enjoy a nice bottle of wine, preferably full-bodied red.  More than anything, aside from family and friends, I love water.  I've been to the beaches of Cabo, Cancun, Puerto Rico, Hawaii, and Thailand (and California, Florida, and New York, of course), but I can't get enough of white, powder sand beneath my feet, warm ocean breezes blowing gently across my face, and perfectly warm ocean water embracing me.

I am clean, well-mannered, and respectful of others' property and belongings as a guest, treating their home like my own, and expect my guests to treat my place the same.

I am clean, well-mannered, and respectful of others' property and belongings as a guest, treating their home like my own, and expect my guests to treat my place the same.

description:
Stay in the closest legal vacation rental area to Times Square New York City and enjoy a 15-25 minute bus ride to Times Square with skyline views of Manhattan. Live in a renovated, well-equipped, turn-of-the century townhouse in a safe, quiet neighborhood with a bustling dining and shopping scene. Your private suite with door lock features a 50-inch LED TV and very comfortable beds. Bathrooms have shampoo, conditioner, shower gel, and hand soap. City-wide WiFi available.

The space
This charming turn-of-the-century townhouse was renovated with new ceiling fan in the bedroom and in the kitchen, and hardwood floors and ceramic tiles throughout. It has been lovingly updated to contemporary standards while accentuating old world charm. Your bedroom and the living room feature 50-inch Roku Streaming LED TVs. The gel memory foam mattresses are among the highest rated and most comfortable in the industry. Bathrooms feature shampoo, conditioner, shower gel, and hand soap.

The neighborhood is safe and friendly. Skyscrapers dot the coastline that overlook the New York City skyline right across the Hudson River.

description:
Hi there! my place is pretty close to Manhattan by train or bus through journal square which is only 10 min walking distance, 20 to 30 min to 34th street Penn station and 15 mints to world trade center. 24 hours rite aid & McDonald's are just 10 min walking distance, laundromat is in the next block, schools, groceries , Restaurants etc. NOTE: On weekends Trains runs every 15 to 20 minuets.

The space
My place is close to Pharmacies. Hospitals, Grocery Stores, School, College/University TWO Major Parks Liberty state park, Lincoln park and 24/7 Path trains and Buses (( Buses are not 24/7 )) to NYC.

Guest access
You can access kitchen but cooking is not allowed except microwave & refrigerator.

Other things to note
My place is very quite & relaxing , free street parking for TWO hours certain times ONLY ( 2 hours ZONE ) available. Please DO NOT drink or bring ALCOHOL Beverages. Turn off all ELECTRICITY when you go out. NO

name: Stylish Jersey City Apartment Close to NYC
description:
Cozy apartment steps away from transportation to midtown Manhattan. Close to stores, restaurants and parks in the thriving Jersey City Heights neighborhood. French-speaking hosts.

The space
The apartment has been recently renovated and is very well appointed. It is a garden-level apartment with a lot of light in the front of kitchen/living room.

Guest access
Guests will access the apartment through their own door (at garden level) and will also have access to our Washer and Dryer that are located just outside the unit.

Other things to note
If you are flying into Newark Airport, this is the perfect location as we are about 20 minutes away from the airport with easy and relatively inexpensive transportation options (Taxi and public Transportation). Note that we are a good two hours away from JFK and LaGuardia airports .
neighborhood_overview:
The Jersey City Heights area is comprised mostly of two and three family houses, and remains traditionally middle-class. Perched high atop the palisades on the western banks of the Hudson River, the Heights sits 100 feet above sea level and the City of Hoboken. Along the east are Palisade and Ogden Avenues, both of which offer stunning views of the Manhattan skyline especially when standing in Riverview Fisk Park.

"The Heights" is characterized as a traditional and mixed neighborhood community. The Central Avenue shopping district is home to more than 240 storefront businesses. Bordering the North end of the Heights is County owned Washington Park. Pershing Field park is located in the center of this district offering green space, baseball fields, an Olympic size swimming pool and ice skating rink. Adjacent to Pershing Field Park is Reservoir#3 which constitutes one of the largest patches of green space in the Heights.
(Adapted from http://www.jcheights.com/community-a

name: Newly-Renovated, Modern 1BR Apt in Prime Location
description:
Our newly-renovated, modern one-bedroom/one-bathroom apartment is situated in the garden level of a historic 200-year-old row house. The space features an open concept living room and kitchen, washer/dryer, queen bedroom, and full shower. Located on a tree-lined street in downtown Jersey City, the apartment is close to a beautiful park, trendy restaurants and bars, and shops and grocery stores. Paid parking is available nearby, and the PATH train into Manhattan is just a quick walk away!

The space
Our home is a recently renovated two-family historic wood row house. The home is set back from the street about 50 feet. You have a private entrance to the garden level apartment. The bedroom and living space each have individually remote-controlled heating and A/C units, so you have full control of temperature regulation. There is also a washer/dryer in the apartment. The kitchen has a full-sized refrigerator, range, dishwasher, microwave, drip coffee maker, and basic
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the historic neighborhood of Hamilton Park in Downtown Jersey City. The apartment is two blocks away from the park, which has tennis courts, a basketball court, a large playground, plenty of tree-shaded grassy areas for a picnic, and a farmers market on Wednesdays from May through November. Newark Avenue, a pedestrian-only street with lots of trendy restaurants and bars, is an 8-minute walk away. The Newport Mall, with plenty of shopping options and a large movie theater, is three blocks away. There are a number of other restaurants, as well as some great ice cream shops and several local coffee shops, within walking distance. There are also two grocery stores located within five blocks of the apartment (ShopRite and Key Food). See "Getting around" for transportation specifics.

description:
Comfortable, clean condo in downtown Jersey City - Sleeps 4.

The space
Railroad style 750 sq. foot apartment boasts exposed brick interior and well-kept common areas. Bedroom in back with queen bed, dressers, mirror and two windows overlooking maintained backyard. Apartment is 30 minutes door-to-door to Wall Street and 45 minutes door-to-door to midtown Manhattan.

Very big room with 3 Windows, Lots of light
New queen bed and new Therapeutic mattress. Lots of natural light. Public transportation to NYC within 20-25 min to midtown and Hoboken within 10-15 minutes.
Lots of great restaurants/coffee shops and bakeries steps away on Central Ave

The space
Recently renovated house. The room has a brand new queen bed with new mattress
House has everything you need:
Stay - fully furnished house
Sleep - New Fresh Bed sheets. Comfortable Therapeutic mattress
Cook - Full kitchen with all new Appliances, dishes and tableware
Work - Working space, Desk, fast WiFi
Essentials - Hair dryer, Clothes hangers, Iron, toilet paper, paper towels and hand soap ALL are provided for you Clean Sheets and Towels
Check in and Check out is very Flexible (we will work with your schedule just let us know ahead of time)

Guest access
Private bedroom
Kitchen and bathroom

name: Luxury Private room in Jersey City with Jet Bath
description:
Great private room in 4,100 SqFt condo in Historic Ukrainian Free Press Building.

Situated just two blocks away from Exchange Place PATH station, New Jersey Light Rail, and the ferry to New York City makes for an easy commute and access to Manhattan (Downtown). If you are here for a business in NYC, you do not want to miss this place for an easy access!

The world s best shops, restaurant, parks, Starbucks are just around the corner.


Very safe and fun area. 24 hr easy access to NYC!

The space
- Queen size bed
- Fully equipped kitchen
- Living room
- Dining table
- Wifi

Guest access
- Living room
- Kitchen
- Dining Area

Other things to note
- Check-in is anytime after 11AM
- Cancel up to 7 days before check in and get a 50% refund (minus service fees).
- Cancel within 7 days of your trip and the reservation is non-refundable.
neighborhood_overview: The tiny section of Jersey City called Paulus Hook was originally settled in 1633 by the Dutch West India Company, who later elected Michael Paulusen (i.e. Paulaz), as the leader of the region. Paulusen operated a ferry boat and traded with the Lenepe people in the area, and is responsible for its name {Paulus Hook comes from the anglicization of Paulusen’s last name, with the “hook” designation describing the small island area seen at high tide in the early 1600s}. Through the late 1700s, Paulus Hook continued to thrive off a busy ferry service that spanned the mile journey along the water to New York City, while the Battle of Paulus Hook took place in 1779, and marked an advantageous battle for the United States during the Revolutionary War. During the late 1800s, an influx of immigrants moved to the area, which would later provide the fabric of the cultural diversity still present in JC today.

name: 118 Magnolia Ave 1B
description:
Large private room with private bathroom in a quiet, quaint home away from home. Access to a backyard with seating and a small grill if you choose to use it. Free WiFi available and just a 5 minute walk to the Journal square path train. 10 minute ride to the first stop in NYC.

The space
We are a Century’s old Guest/Rooming House that has been renovated. We offer European style rooms with shared bathrooms and Continental styled rooms with private bathrooms. All rooms have microwave ovens, mini refrigerators, desk and chair, an Iron, blow dryer, heat and air conditioning (in the summer and spring), sheets, comforter, towels, shampoo, conditioner, body wash, plastic utensils, plates, bowls, cups, toilet paper and free Wi-Fi. We also have a laundry room for your use (for a fee) on premises and we will provide you with a refillable laundry card.

The property is clean, safe and secure and is located in a quiet tree-lined residential neighborhood only one blo
neighborhood_overview: Magnolia House is just minuets from NYC!! You can take the PATH train to WTC/Financial District/Tribeca, SOHO, Greenwich/ West Village, Meatpacking District (High Line), Chelsea, Flat Iron District, Madison Park, Fashion District & 33rd Street PENN Station.  You can also take the PATH train to explore Jersey City!! We are only two stops from Newport Mall & Exchange Place and not far from Liberty State Park. We are also walking distance to so much in the area! Union Square Farmers Market Outpost, The ART HOUSE, Little India, McGinley Square Shoppes and Grove Street, which has amazing bars and restaurants. The Magnolia House is located in the perfect area for tourists, travelers, students and professionals.

name: Modern Apt, dwntwn JC 7 min walk to PATH (APT 3)
description:
One of a kind unique 1800’s brownstone with modern amenities located in the heart of downtown jersey city!

Our apt is a 5-8 min walk to the nearest station to get Manhattan. The grocery store is one block away. Restaurants and bars are also a few blocks away. It's a 10 min train ride to lower manhattan and about a 15 minute train ride to midtown.

Don’t hesitate to book with us! We are in compliance with the new JC Airbnb ordinance law. :)

The space
Guests are entitled to use the entire space of the apt.

Guest access
Guests can check in at their convenience. There is a lockbox that guests can obtain the apt keys from.

Other things to note
Parking: We highly recommend not having a car during your stay with us since parking can be difficult in our area but if you must have a vehicle we do have street parking available. For street parking you'll need to watch for the sweeper and if you're staying be
neighborhood_overview: Hamilton park and van Vorst park are both in close proximity and a 5 min walk. Newport mall is also near by with major dept and luxury brand stores. Key Food grocery store is 1 block away. There is also a professional dry cleaners and laundromat.
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about:
We are an energetic couple that loves Nyc! My husband was born and raised in NY and I was born and raised in N.J.  We also have two beautiful children and a dog who is just as cute as our babies :) During our spare time when we’re not tending to our Airbnb guests we like to take walks by the jersey city water front, taking our kids to the park, eating out in the city, watching movies and traveling when we can! 

We also like to consider ourselves as a DIY couple and the multicultural ethnic version of the famous HGTV show Fixer Upper! :)

name: Dharma | Jersey City |  Beautiful 1BR + City Views
description:
POOL AND OTHER AMENITIES ARE CLOSED UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE

These spacious, deluxe one bedroom apartments are a perfect example of unparalleled ambiance offering spectacular views, for example of the Statue of Liberty. All of our one bedroom suites are located on the higher floors of this modern residential high rise.

The space
Dharma Home Suites' one bedroom apartments all provide specially selected Dharma style decor throughout the bedroom, kitchen, living room, and bathroom along with vast room amenities such as dryer and washing machines.

Guest access
The terrace on the 11th floor offers spectacular views of Manhattan. On this floor, you can enjoy various amenities: the fitness center, yoga room, children’s room, lounge and seasonal outdoor swimming pool. The building has onsite parking and a 24-hour doorman for your convenience. Paulus Hook is a high rise building with 49 floors.

Other things to note
The
neighborhood_overview: The grocery store, located on the ground floor, offers a full range of food products for your breakfast, lunch & dinner. Also, to strike your fancy, lots of restaurants and bars are in the vicinity. Across the street is Sky Thai restaurant, a staff favorite.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
Hi. I am Ally and I am the reservation manager of Dharma Home Suites. 
We keep our apartments environment friendly as possible. All cleaning is done with non-toxic, natural cleaning products.

name: Great Location to NYC, Affordable, Safe 1st Floor!
description:
Great Location to NYC, 10 to 15 min walk to Journal Sq Path. Business area with Luxury rentals across the street. Safe area with restaurant and markets open late evening giving you a nice area to walk at night.

The space
TV, Towels, Fresh linen, Quilts, soft soap for washing and shampoo, pots and pans, full refrigerator, full size stove.

Guest access
private apartment with private bathroom. Rear court yard access for kids to play or take a quite cigarette break.

Other things to note
- Quiet time after 9 pm.
- Guest should keep & treat the property clean as if it were your own.
- Please be mindful of other tenants in the building.
- Please turn off all air-conditioning, lights & electronics when you leave the house.
- Stove, oven, and kitchen must be returned clean otherwise guest is subject to an
addition $100 cleaning fee deducted from the security.
neighborhood_overview: Quiet street just off the main restaurant street.  Across the street from luxury apartments. Plenty of places to eat and shop. Quick access to NYC via Path trains.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
My husband and I are travel fanatics ! We have traveled all over Asia, USA, Australia, & Europe. We are absolutely in love with different cultures, and  what they consist each consist of, such as the FOOD ;)  history, architecture, and languages! Our style of AirBnb hosting is similar to our own wants, and expectations when we travel. We like to be in a convenient neighborhood, and have everything accessible. I fully furnish my apartments & I also added everything you need to make your stay practical and effortless. 

Our motto in life is to do good to others, and pass it forward!

name: ★ 2BR ★ Yard ★ Hammock ★ Netflix ★ 12m to PATH ★
description:
We want you, yes...YOU, to stay with us! This super cozy 2 BD, 1 bath home sleeps 6 and is a 12 min walk from the Grove St PATH station! We have a yard and a hammock for your relaxation! It is a perfect spot for business travelers, couples, friends and small families visiting NYC and Jersey City. We are located in cool pedestrian-friendly neighborhood 2 blocks away from Hamilton park and with plenty great shops and restaurants around!

The space
Come stay with CozyStays - you won't regret it! Our goal at CozyStays Suites is to make your experience seamless and unforgettable - and of course cozy!

After coming back to your temporary cozy home away from home, you will find yourself in a comfortable ~600 sq ft railroad style apartment (two bedrooms are separated by wall but linked together by the hallway; please see the floor plan which is the last picture) with 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom. The apartment has it's own yard with outdoor furniture and a hammock
neighborhood_overview: The Grove St area of Jersey City has blossomed with the opening of more than a dozen stylish restaurants, bars and shops, joining longtime establishments that help it retain a tempo slightly slower than that in NYC across the Hudson River. As if to punctuate the neighborhood’s appeal, a large swath of a bordering street, Newark Avenue, the site of several new hot spots, became a pedestrian-only thoroughfare. A nearby neighborhood, The Waterfront, offers prime views of the Lower Manhattan skyline, a truly spectacular view!
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about: My mission is to make your stay comfortable, exciting and unforgettable! I love travelling myself (backpacked in South America for six months a few years ago) and decided to turn my passion for travel into a business. I am originally from Moscow, moved to NYC in 2001 for an MBA program and never left. When not working I enjoy travelling, sailing, skiing and reading (personal development books + I am a big fan of Tony Robbins!).

name: Jersey City NJ | Luxury 1 Bedroom Apt w/ Amenities
description:
Standing 50 stories high and overlooking Manhattan's skyline, this luxury building is a one of a kind; offering the latest in amenities and services like an outdoor heated pool and spa, a fitness center, a theatre room, a playroom, and a sophisticated clubroom, you will find well-appointed apartments with nine foot ceilings, fully-equipped designer kitchens, and hardwood floors. As if it wasn't enough, all transport connections to NYC are only a few feet away.

The space
Experience luxury like you never have before in these fantastic Hudson riverfront apartments. Do you fancy a heated outdoor pool and spa with Manhattan views? A modern fitness center, a state-of-the-art theatre room, a clubroom with billiards, and a playroom and playground for the kids? You got it in this tower located a few steps away from the Newport Path station and the best restaurants in the area offering fantastic skyline views. These apartments feature the best upscale finishes like 9 foot
neighborhood_overview: The property is conveniently located about 25 minutes from Newark Liberty International Airport. Public transportation is also easily accessible – shuttle service to PATH/Ferry & just a short walk to the NY Waterway Ferry, Hudson-Bergen light rail, and the PATH.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
We have been providing vacation rental apartments for over 10 years across the East Coast. We are known for our distinctively furnished apartments in popular locations, and for our attentive service. You’ll find that our rates are quite reasonable. If you're looking for a safe, comfortable place with fabulous amenities and Wi-Fi (we know you need the Wi-Fi!) in the Boston MA area, Washington DC, Miami FL or very close to NYC in Jersey City or Hoboken, we'd love to host you. Many of the buildings where our apartments are located feature amenities such as beautiful lobbies, 24 hour front desk staff, fitness centers, business centers, recreation rooms, indoor or outdoor pools and whirlpools. If you are traveling with children, some buildings offer playgrounds (many buildings are near public playgrounds as well) or indoor playrooms. Depending on the location, you can stay for just a few days, a week, a month or more. 

We offer an assortment of short-term apartments in sizes ranging from a studio to three bedrooms that are fully furnished with all the comforts of home. Our local staff meticulously prepares your apartment before your arrival, and we offer 24 hour assistance for any emergencies after business hours. When you arrive at your apartment, the beds will be made, towels and bath amenities will be stocked in the bathrooms, and the coffee maker will be set up in the kitchen with some sample coffees, sweetener and creamer (teabags too if that is your preference) to start your morning off properly. If you’d like to cook a meal, the kitchen is stocked with dishes, cutlery, glassware and pots and pans. The living room is set up with a TV and cable channels, and the Wi-Fi router password and instructions will be prominently displayed so you can get connected quickly. You can also make local and toll-free phone calls at no charge. 

Please contact us to confirm the exact availability of the apartment you are interested in. We’d love to host you (and your family) for your vacation or business trip.
neighbourhood: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States

description:
The space
The prime location and being adjacent to the Hudson River, Exchange Place makes the one bedroom suites the best option for anyone looking for a room with a view. Providing the comforts of home with plenty of extras, these spacious yet private one bedroom apartments, at the Exchange Place property, continue to serve popular among our guests, both long and short term, business and vacation. Dharma Home Suites' one bedroom apartments all provide specially selected Dharma style decor throughout the bedroom, kitchen, living room, and bathroom along with several room amenities such as dryer and washing machines. Contact us to see which one bedroom apartments have spacious balconies and fantastic views.

Guest access
The stunning 8th-floor terrace allows you to contemplate the Hudson River. The lounge and children’s room are located on the 8th floor as well. The gym is located one floor down, with state-of-the-art equipment and a remarkable Manhatta
neighborhood_overview: Just outside the building is a boardwalk, offering tranquility and a way to contemplate the Hudson River. Midtown Manhattan is a 20 minute ride by on the PATH. Newport Centre Mall is a 15 minute walk from the Exchange Place building.

Hi. I am Ally and I am the reservation manager of Dharma Home Suites.

name: New 4 bed home 30 mins from NYC! Tons of space!
description:
NEW! Custom- Luxury home perfect for a family or friend getaway in NYC/Jersey: 30 mins to NYC. 4 Bedroom, 2.5 Bath. Sleeps 6-14.

Our home features a collection of brand new appliances, furniture & home decor. Filled with high end beauty products, great tea/coffee and snacks! 25 mins from World Trade Center, 35-40 mins from Times Square & 20 mins from Newark Airport.

Extra $25/day 2-car max garage parking available with advance notice.

Jersey City Short Term Rental Permit STR20-00032

The space
Welcome the metro New York City area in the heart of New Jersey!

With a bus stops within three blocks of our home, get to Port Authority (Times Square) in 30-40 minutes OR World Trade Center, Macy's, Union Square, The West Village and more with ease and convenience (mindful of NY traffic of course) - Enjoy the perks of NYC with the comfort of a spacious, brand new home with 3 bathrooms.
* We are always willing to offer di
neighborhood_overview:
Jersey City is close to NYC and has a variety of public transportation options. Neighboring Hoboken and downtown Jersey City are both easy 15 minute walks and have plenty of lovely options for dining and entertainment. 20 minutes from Newark airport.

We are 6 miles from MetLife stadium, home to the Giants and Jets. Appr. 15 minutes via Uber or car.

We provide maps and bus/train instructions for NYC travel. The fastest to Herald Square (Macys's) is (a) 16 min walk to PATH at Journal Square, then 20 min train to 33rd street. Or take 3 minute bus to PATH for faster service. PATH drops at Christopher Street, 9th street, 14th street (Union Square), 23rd street and 33rd street (Macy's). There is also a separate Path Service line directly to the World Trade Center (about 10 minutes on the train).

There are also direct buses that get you to Times Square (Port Authority) in about 35 to 45 minutes that pickup directly outside of our street.
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about: Hello future friends - my husband, Ted, and I love traveling the world. (So much that we have been to Norway, New Orleans, London, Maine, Austin, Nashville, Toronto, Hawaii, Croatia, Venice, Switzerland, South Africa, Alaska, Portland and Napa in recent years.)  I hail from the midwest (Wisconsin) and love ice cream, cheese and the Packers.  Ted is from Brooklyn and knows everything about NYC + he was an MLB baseball player. We live for country music, half marathons and live music.  We hope to see you at our home or yours! Our goal as Airbnb hosts is to give a purely local and delightful home-away-from-home. See you soon!

name: Tiny House - Private Entry - Isolate close to NYC
description:
Welcome to the Tiny House in Jersey City! 150 stylish square feet are ready to be your jump-off point for exploring New York City. You'll have a queen-size bed, full bath, outdoor space, kitchenette with mini-fridge and microwave (NO STOVE) and access to a washer/dryer.

The space
The Tiny House has a great location and offers tremendous bang for your buck. It is in an awesome neighborhood in Jersey City where new restaurants, bars and cafes are opening daily. You're near Hamilton Park and the graceful, tree and brownstone lined streets surrounding it. And to top it all off, you are 30 minutes door-to-door to the World Trade Center and 40 minutes door-to-door to the Empire State Building and Highline.

Guest access
You can access the whole Tiny House (of course), the washer and dryer in the garage and the lower patio outside the house shown in the pictures. The patio is shared with another Airbnb.
neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to the Village, the hottest and best neighborhood in Jersey City. The neighborhood is made up of historic brownstones and rowhouses, with glamorous condo building starting to spring up. Beautiful Hamilton park is a few blocks away.

Just across the street from the Tiny House, a new restaurant row is forming, anchored by Madame Claude's and the recently relocated Prato Cafe (the delicious cantucci cookies are a must). Further down Newark Ave and towards Grove Street, a host of bars and restaurants await (Porta, Razza and Broa are among the best). Although I'm partial to Prato, 9Bar, Dimes and Lackawanna are all good coffee shops in the area.

name: Spacious 2BR apartment, 15 minutes from Manhattan!
description:
Our apartment is located in beautiful historic downtown, Jersey City, and is surrounded by amazing restaurants, coffee shops and bars. Hop on the Path train right around the corner and in just 10 minutes you'll be in Manhattan, NYC!

The space
We live on the second floor, right above a fantastic restaurant, so we hope you don't mind the occasional smell of delicious food :) There is no elevator, so be ready to climb one set of stairs. Our place has a spacious living room where you can browse our library and read, play card games or one of the musical instruments we have around! There's also a dining area where you can hang out by the large windows as well as a fully equipped kitchen with all the essentials including a dishwasher (and a designated tea drawer!). There are 2 bedrooms: the Blue Room has a queen size bed and the Grey Room has a twin bed and TV with Netflix, Hulu etc. We have great Wifi and all rooms have an AC.

Guest access
You'l
neighborhood_overview: We absolutely love our home and neighborhood. Jersey City is like a hidden gem, that in recent years has started to become extremely popular. It feels like a small town, but is right across the river from Manhattan and all the action! Our area also has tons of awesome restaurants, cafes, bars, and more. When you arrive I'm happy to give you a list of all our favorite spots and recommendations!
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about: A little bit about me: I'm a laid back photographer/teacher who enjoys traveling, cooking, and hanging out with great people! My wife is an Icelandic actress, and while we're away we love sharing our home with other world travelers!

name: CLEAN & SAFE!  Historic Downtown 2 bed/2 bath
description:
CLEAN AND SAFE! We take cleaning seriously so you can feel comfortable throughout your stay. Your health and safety are our top priorities. We follow cleaning and sanitization protocols from the CDC, Airbnb and the NJ Department of Health to ensure a safe, healthy and comfortable stay for our guests.

The space
Cleaning, Disinfection and Sterilization Procedures
• Each room is treated with commercial-grade UVC sanitizing germicidal light as well as an ozone treatment, then fully ventilated for a hospital-grade sanitization. This process disinfects hard and soft surfaces, such as couches, furniture and draperies.
• Housekeepers perform a deep cleaning and sanitization between each stay.
• Bedroom linens, towels, kitchen towels and bath mats are washed and fully sanitized, all mattresses and pillows are covered with mattress and pillow covers for an extra layer of protection.
• Amenities such as shampoo, conditioner, and body wash bottl
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about: I grew up in a bed and breakfast, with twenty strangers-turned-friends at the breakfast table every morning, so sharing my home with fellow travelers seems natural to me.  I've called New York home since 2000 and have also lived in France, Ecuador, Chile, and Australia.  I love planning my next trip and would be happy to help you plan yours.  If you need any advice on navigating New York, let me know!

name: Jersey Cty:Tiny Room - Single bed (1A)
description:
TINY private budget-priced room w/ key and shared bathroom in 2nd flr. 1 SINGLE bed; 1 window, hardwood flooring, lamp & 1 chair.

Wifi! Bed linens & towel.
Just a TINY room. If you seek luxury, please go elsewhere.

Last minute & late night check-in is ok.

Getting to NYC:
Walking distance (0.4 miles) to Danforth lightrail station which can connect you to the PATH train. Path train takes you to NYC. Please do an internet search for lightrail schedule and PATH schedule.

The space
This is a TINY no-frills, budget-friendly, barebones private room with one window. Hardwood flooring in room. One folding chair in room & lamp. It has its own lock and key.

THIS ROOM CAN ACCOMMODATE ONLY 1 (ONE) PERSON. There is ONE SINGLE (US TWIN) mattress.

If you are reading this, the room or another room in our home is AVAILABLE! The way Airbnb works is that it shows you only what is available on the dates you en
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about:
Hello, 

Foremost, thanks for taking the time out to review my listings and learn more about me.

My name is Nassly.  I have lived in NJ most of my life.   I love traveling, especially on a budget and understand the importance of having a safe and clean space to lay one's head.

I have been a host and a guest. 

As a host, I am opening my own home to  provide clean, comfortable, and budget friendly rooms in a HUMBLE home-like atmosphere.   Staying with us, is like staying at a distant family member's home.  I take pride and put much effort (elbow grease) in cleaning, maintaining, and SLOWLY upgrading my listings.  I do NOT provide luxury hotel accommodations.  If that is what you are seeking, please book at the Ritz & pay hotel prices to do so.  I do not have professional staff or offer butler service.  My home, like most bodies, has stretch marks, creaks, and minor dents.  It also has wear and tear from hosting and age. 

I am extremely honest in my listing descriptions. Please read them.

As a traveler, I have visited and backpacked through many different countries on a shoestring.  My experiences have been awesome.  

My goal is to enable others to be able to do the same. 

 Please feel free to contact me with any questions or concerns during your stay or prior to.   

*******Please Note******************

For safety of my guests, my home, and myself, I provide full disclosure of myself and expect same from my guests.  

I require an accurate and clear profile picture & completed registration on  Airbnb profile, including uploading your government ID prior to check-in.  If not, your reservation will not be accepted or you will be cancelled.  Thank you for your understanding.

description:

host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about:
Hello, 

Foremost, thanks for taking the time out to review my listings and learn more about me.

My name is Nassly.  I have lived in NJ most of my life.   I love traveling, especially on a budget and understand the importance of having a safe and clean space to lay one's head.

I have been a host and a guest. 

As a host, I am opening my own home to  provide clean, comfortable, and budget friendly rooms in a HUMBLE home-like atmosphere.   Staying with us, is like staying at a distant family member's home.  I take pride and put much effort (elbow grease) in cleaning, maintaining, and SLOWLY upgrading my listings.  I do NOT provide luxury hotel accommodations.  If that is what you are seeking, please book at the Ritz & pay hotel prices to do so.  I do not have professional staff or offer butler service.  My home, like most bodies, has stretch marks, creaks, and minor dents.  It also has wear and tear from hosting and age. 

I am extremely honest in my listing descriptions. Please read them.

As a traveler, I have visited and backpacked through many different countries on a shoestring.  My experiences have been awesome.  

My goal is to enable others to be able to do the same. 

 Please feel free to contact me with any questions or concerns during your stay or prior to.   

*******Please Note******************

For safety of my guests, my home, and myself, I provide full disclosure of myself and expect same from my guests.  

I require an accurate and clear profile picture & completed registration on  Airbnb profile, including uploading your government ID prior to check-in.  If not, your reservation will not be accepted or you will be cancelled.  Thank you for your understanding.

name: BEAUTIFUL ONE BEDROOM APT IN DOWNTOWN BRICK BLDG
description:
Beautiful, spacious ground fl apt in prime location of downtown Jersey City, close to Hamilton Park, cozy cafes, restaurants and bars. The bedroom has a queen size bed. The living room has a large sofa, two single beds, desk/dining table and TV set. The kitchen has many amenities. The bathroom has closet space and a bathtub. Conveniently located at 10 min walking distance from train stations to Manhattan, then a few minutes train to World Trade Center and Greenwich Village.

The space
Very easy access. Street level entrance. Spacious, comfortable, cozy one bedroom apt. You enter a hallway. Living room is on your right hand side with a sectional sofa, arm chair, TV, big coffee table, twin and pull-out beds, desk/dining table and chair. Hallway continues to the kitchen which has a gas stove with oven, microwave oven, toaster, coffee machine, kettle, refrigerator, pots and pans. Bedroom is spacious. Bathroom has a bathtub. Delightful space with soft colors. Access
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is just delightful with lots of historic brick and brownstone four floor homes. The feel is similar to Greenwich Village in Manhattan. We are one block away from Hamilton Park which has a playground and tennis courts. There are cool restaurants, cozy cafes, vibrant bars, laundromats, grocery stores, parking garages and churches around. Newport Mall, with 3.3% sales tax, is at 5 min walk. So is Newport business district. We are a prime spot both for leisure and business travelers.

We love to travel with our three young daughters and love to stay in Airbnbs.  As a host I try to provide anything that I would want to have when traveling. We want to make your stay as comfortable and enjoyable as possible.  From advice on where to go or eat, to breakfast items for our late night arrivals... always something to make you feel welcome!

neighborhood_overview:
Jersey City Heights is a beautiful, growing artist community right above Hoboken. This luxury condo is located right in the formal Riverview Arts District and has numerous coffee places, cafes, restaurants, juice bars, and dessert places opening regularly.

Right at the corner on Palisade Avenue are regular private buses into Port Authority, New York City. These buses take about 15-20 minutes, come every few minutes, and are about $3 per person.

Also right at the corner is NJ Transit Buses Route 123 which goes to Port Authority for $4.50, but you must have exact change.

NJ Transit App can be downloaded for routes and fares as well as CityMapper app.

host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about:
Hello, 

Foremost, thanks for taking the time out to review my listings and learn more about me.

My name is Nassly.  I have lived in NJ most of my life.   I love traveling, especially on a budget and understand the importance of having a safe and clean space to lay one's head.

I have been a host and a guest. 

As a host, I am opening my own home to  provide clean, comfortable, and budget friendly rooms in a HUMBLE home-like atmosphere.   Staying with us, is like staying at a distant family member's home.  I take pride and put much effort (elbow grease) in cleaning, maintaining, and SLOWLY upgrading my listings.  I do NOT provide luxury hotel accommodations.  If that is what you are seeking, please book at the Ritz & pay hotel prices to do so.  I do not have professional staff or offer butler service.  My home, like most bodies, has stretch marks, creaks, and minor dents.  It also has wear and tear from hosting and age. 

I am extremely honest in my listing descriptions. Please read them.

As a traveler, I have visited and backpacked through many different countries on a shoestring.  My experiences have been awesome.  

My goal is to enable others to be able to do the same. 

 Please feel free to contact me with any questions or concerns during your stay or prior to.   

*******Please Note******************

For safety of my guests, my home, and myself, I provide full disclosure of myself and expect same from my guests.  

I require an accurate and clear profile picture & completed registration on  Airbnb profile, including uploading your government ID prior to check-in.  If not, your reservation will not be accepted or you will be cancelled.  Thank you for your understanding.
neighbourhood: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States

There is ONE TWIN/SINGLE mattress.

If you are reading this, the room or another room in our home is AVAILABLE! The way Airbnb works is that it shows you only what is available on the dates you entered. host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about:
Hello, 

Foremost, thanks for taking the time out to review my listings and learn more about me.

My name is Nassly.  I have lived in NJ most of my life.   I love traveling, especially on a budget and understand the importance of having a safe and clean space to lay one's head.

I have been a host and a guest. 

As a host, I am opening my own home to  provide clean, comfortable, and budget friendly rooms in a HUMBLE home-like atmosphere.   Staying with us, is like staying at a distant family member's home.  I take pride and put much effort (elbow grease) in cleaning, maintaining, and SLOWLY upgrading my listings.  I do NOT provide luxury hotel accommodations.  If that is what you are seeking, please book at the Ritz & pay hotel prices to do so.  I do not have professional staff or offer butler service.  My home, like most bodies, has stretch marks, creaks, and minor dents.  It also has wear and tear from hosting and age. 

I am extremely honest in my listing descriptions. Please read them.

As a traveler, I have visited and backpacked through many different countries on a shoestring.  My experiences have been awesome.  

My goal is to enable others to be able to do the same. 

 Please feel free to contact me with any questions or concerns during your stay or prior to.   

*******Please Note******************

For safety of my guests, my home, and myself, I provide full disclosure of myself and expect same from my guests.  

I require an accurate and clear profile picture & completed registration on  Airbnb profile, including uploading your government ID prior to check-in.  If not, your reservation will not be accepted or you will be cancelled.  Thank you for your understanding.

description:
This is a lovely ground floor apartment with a private street entrance and a small backyard. It's located in the up-and-coming neighborhood of Jersey City Heights one block from transit (buses, & light rail) that takes you to Manhattan in just 30 minutes. The apartment has brand new kitchen appliances & a washer, dryer in the unit. The neighborhood offers several great places to eat and grab drinks, parks with city views, not to mention that the lively Hoboken is just a 5 minute Uber ride away.

The space
The building is a 3 floor house with 3 private apartments in it, there are no shared spaces. This apartment is located on the ground floor and has its own street entrance, as well as a private access to a small backyard. The entire house has been recently inspected, updated and deep cleaned.
The apt has heating, air conditioner, full kitchen with coffee machine and kitchenware for cooking. There is a small laundry room area with a washer and dryer in the un
neighborhood_overview: New Jersey City Heights is a quiet and safe neighborhood that offers several trendy hang-out spots like the ones shown in the photos. You can step out for coffee, drinks and live music or some delicious fine dining. There are several parks nearby with nice city views and CitiBike rentals. If you want to be in the thick of action you can take a 5 min Uber to the heart of Hoboken or walk there in 15 min by taking an elevator that is located 3 blocks away. There are plenty of laundry places, corner stores and grocery places in the neighborhood.

neighborhood_overview: The tiny section of Jersey City called Paulus Hook was originally settled in 1633 by the Dutch West India Company, who later elected Michael Paulusen (i.e. Paulaz), as the leader of the region. Paulusen operated a ferry boat and traded with the Lenepe people in the area, and is responsible for its name {Paulus Hook comes from the anglicization of Paulusen’s last name, with the “hook” designation describing the small island area seen at high tide in the early 1600s}. Through the late 1700s, Paulus Hook continued to thrive off a busy ferry service that spanned the mile journey along the water to New York City, while the Battle of Paulus Hook took place in 1779, and marked an advantageous battle for the United States during the Revolutionary War. During the late 1800s, an influx of immigrants moved to the area, which would later provide the fabric of the cultural diversity still present in JC today.

name: Spacious Jersey City Apartment, 30 Min to NYC
description:
Newly renovated private apartment in the up-and-coming neighborhood of Jersey City Heights. This spacious one bedroom is located on the second floor of a three story house and is one block from transit that takes you into NYC in just 30 minutes. The neighborhood is safe and quiet, yet there are a few hip places to eat and have fun. We are three blocks from an elevator that brings you down to Hoboken - a prime neighborhood that also offers plenty of entertainment and gorgeous city views.

The space
The building is a 3 story house with 3 private apartments in it, there are no shared spaces other than the main street entrance. This apt is located on the first floor which requires you to walk up a short set of stairs. The entire house has been recently inspected, updated and deep cleaned.
The apt has hardwood floors, heating, air conditioner, kitchenette with a two-top electric cooktop, microwave and standard kitchenware for cooking. There is no oven. The place
neighborhood_overview: New Jersey City Heights is a quiet and safe neighborhood that offers several trendy hang-out spots like the ones shown in the photos. You can step out for coffee, drinks and live music or some delicious fine dining. There are several parks nearby with nice city views and CitiBike rentals. If you want to be in the thick of action you can take a 5 min Uber to the heart of Hoboken or walk there in 15 min by taking an elevator that is located 3 blocks away. There are plenty of laundry places, corner stores and grocery places in the neighborhood.

It was a joy putting this home together and we hope you will love what we did with the place! We are one block away from the PATH train station which runs to NYC 24/7.

The space

We expect most of our guests to visit NYC everyday. After spending the whole day out, you can't ask for a better crash pad. We have a washer/dryer if you need to keep your suitcase light.

The home is basically over the actual PATH Subway. Don't worry you can't here a peep of any outside disturbances from inside this s

host_about:
I am a young entrepreneur, I manage properties and vehicles by day, I go to school at night. I work hard in everything I do, I think im an extremely helpful individual. I was naturally born to provide hospitality/customer service/sales, at least that's how I feel! 

I am currently pursuing a degree in Hospitality, Management, & Entrepreneurship, graduation 2018. It is my life's pursuit to make the everyone's day a little brighter. I love to travel, meet new people, and just live. My favorite thing to do is, learn about the cultures of others where I visit,  and those who visit me.

My long term goal is to acquire international properties and luxury SUVs to manage & rent them. I actually embarked on hosting a condo in the always beautiful, Dominican Republic. 

I am moving one step at a time, one reservation at a time. I have been on this journey since September 2015 .Each guest that stays with me or rents one of my vehicles helps me get closer to my dreams. 

I sincerely appreciate anyone who decides to reserve one of my homes. 

I hope your stay is a dream come true too!

name: 15 Min NYC ADJST BED! Organic Smart 8!
description:
15 Minutes to NYC and Hoboken

Beautiful lux condo with Premium Adjustable Bed with massage and remote! 2 Beds and 2 Baths, patio+. You will have private access to the entire unit for your stay.

SmartHome upgrades - have fun while relaxing at home and speaking directly to your TVs.

Organic, allergy-free and non-toxic upgrades throughout the home, including all linens, washings, & soaps.

The space
This luxury condominium was once the highest price per square foot in the history of Jersey City Heights.

Pictures are approximate as brand new listing and new pictures are on the way!

Highlights:
- Full 4 Zone Audio System - Even Patio
- Gigabit Ethernet for Super Fast Internet Speeds and Unlimited Streaming
- 3 Big-ScreenTVs 1 50", 2 40", and 4K
- All Voice-Controlled with Amazon FireTV Cube for each TV
- Dozens of pre-installed and authenticated entertainment apps
neighborhood_overview:
Jersey City Heights is a beautiful, growing artist community right above Hoboken. This luxury condo is located right in the formal Riverview Arts District and has numerous coffee places, cafes, restaurants, juice bars, and dessert places opening regularly.

Right at the corner on Palisade Avenue are regular private buses into Port Authority, New York City. These buses take about 15-20 minutes, come every few minutes, and are about $3 per person.

Also right at the corner is NJ Transit Buses Route 123 which goes to Port Authority for $4.50, but you must have exact change.

NJ Transit App can be downloaded for routes and fares as well as CityMapper app.

Spacious private 1 bedroom apartment on 1st floor in Jersey City brownstone.

This apartment has a private entrance, full kitchen, living room and bathroom.

My partner, Hamlet and our dog Precious live in a different apartment in the building and are mostly available throughout your stay.

We work regular hours, so we ask for noise consideration, especially during weeknights.

The space
This 1 bedroom apartment has a private entrance in the front and a back door with access to the backyard. It has a bathroom, kitchen and living room.

The bedroom boasts a plush queen size bed and a roll-out single sleeper, perfect for 3 traveling friends or family members. It has a workstation where guests can work from their laptops and charge their devices.

The roll-out can be situated in the bedroom or living room. The living room has a door and can be converted into a completely private room f
neighborhood_overview: This is Jersey City's Greenville neighborhood. This block is quiet and beautifully lined with brick townhouses. It is residential, close to parks and public transportation to NYC. This neighborhood is not close to shops or restaurants. Please note before booking that this neighborhood is about a 12-15 minute drive/bus ride to Journal Square where the PATH train to NYC can be taken.

Find us on (Hidden by Airbnb) to learn a little bit more about us: @CulturaLovers 
You can also listen to our podcast on your favorite podcast app: Cultura Lovers

name: The Brick Vault--Walk to Path!
description:
Extremely convenient and comfortable! You'll love staying in my newly renovated space that I call the "vault' because it is safe and grounding. This small beautifully renovated oasis is 20min to NYC, 15min to Newark airport. The Path train station (6min) and Times Square bus (3min ) run 24hrs. The house is disinfected with 72 hours between guests.
I've created a living space with a deep soaking tub, large screen TV, washer /dryer and terrific kitchen in a great neighborhood.

The space
This is my personal home, a lovely garden level apt with small windows looking outside at just below ground level. While windows are small, there is great LED lighting throughout the house.
•Due to Covid, the house is fully disinfected. Rest assured all linens are sanitized, and a grace period of 72 hours is enforced between guests.
•I am a professional cook and there is a fabulous and efficient kitchen that you will enjoy.
•Coffee station with pourover ket
neighborhood_overview:
A block away are excellent Indian eateries including dosa huts and a special place featuring in egg curries featured in Eater.com
The Mana Art Center is a few minutes away on foot.
Loew's is an old revival theater that will, on occasion, show 35mm vintage films in their original glory-- a real treat!
Boulevard Drinks has THE best hot dogs!
Bread and Salt is delicious casual Italian and a quick Uber/Lyft on Palisade Ave written on Eater.com and upcoming Bon Appetit issue/website.
Take a look at the local guidebook I've created.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about: I'm Chinese American and have been in Beijing since 2009 and am now back in NJ/NY for part of the time. I've lived in many countries and think being in a comfortable stylish home beats a hotel. I'm a writer and professional cook  so having a meal or two at home from the local market always makes a visit more special. I have scoured  my neighborhoods and will be one of your best bets to find the best restaurants and overall where to go off the tour circuit.

name: Urban Sanctuary - 1 Stop To NYC, 2 BR w Cool Yard
description:
Beautifully decorated, spotlessly clean garden level apartment in the best neighborhood in Jersey City. To concerned guests: Rest assured this airbnb is in a private historic house with a private entrance, private outdoor space without shared facilities.
BOOK WITH CONFIDENCE: We guarantee our guests absolutely clean apartment which includes multi-step CDC/W.H.O. sanitizing of all surfaces and linens between stays. This airbnb is LEGAL w all permits OR your stay is fully refundable.

The space
Apartment is on a garden (ground) level of a historic townhouse with a private entrance that has direct access to your private rear yard from both bedrooms.

Master bedroom (sleeps 2) has a comfortable hybrid (foam + innerspring) mattress queen bed with fresh linens and a nice sized closet.

Second bedroom (sleeps 2) has a bunk bed with sleep inducing 10" memory foam twin size mattresses and an open wardrobe with wide drawers.
neighborhood_overview: We love our neighborhood for the perfect balance of walkability, diversity, and livability.   Smart travelers already know Downtown Jersey City is closer to Manhattan than 95% of Queens and Brooklyn with considerably less crowds.  Plus our mayor is young and progressive and fully legalized airbnb in 2015, unlike NYC where is very much illegal for short term rentals.  Our waterfront has one of the most picturesque views of lower Manhattan, New York Harbor and Statue of Liberty.    The apartment is two short blocks away from Hamilton Park surrounded by gorgeous brownstones and 19th century rowhouses, and it is adorned with impressive 100+ year old trees and lush glass within that often serve as gathering place for locals and visitors alike - the park hosts weekly farmers market, seasonal movie screenings, barbecue festivals, tennis and basketball courts, just to name a few.     Many shopping and restaurants options are all walking distance from the apartment and as Downtown Jersey City h

name: Stylish & Clean Room near NYC!!* Long term Stay!!
description:
Clean, quiet and safe room in the fantastic neighborhood of Jersey City Heights. Quick 30 minute bus ride to Time Square, easily accessible from the apartment. Also cheap Uber ride to Hoboken, with direct PATH train to the city. The brand new apartment is stylishly decorated for your enjoyment. The room features a Smart TV. Bathrooms are very clean, and WIFI is available throughout. The apartment is equipped with central cooling/heating system.
For LONGTERM stays only (over 28 days)!!

The space
Apartment was just built, so everything is brand new and fully functional. Kitchen is fully stocked with cookware, bakeware, utensils, coffee machine, tea kettle. Digital door locks allow each person in your group to come and go as they please without coordinating key exchange. High-Speed WiFi available. We provide early and late luggage drop off in the luggage closet.

Guest access
You'll have full and exclusive access to this 1st floor bedroom
neighborhood_overview: Just across the river from Manhattan, Jersey City is considered the sixth borough of New York City. There are frequent buses to Times Square just a short walk away from the apartment. Buses run every 10 minutes. There are plenty of local restaurants nearby with diverse and delicious cuisine.
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about:
Hi, I'm Miz!

I have lived in the NYC area for 8 years, and have been sharing my space (now spaces!) with guests since 2014. I love hosting!

I grew up in Houston, Texas, went to university in Pennsylvania, and spent time living in Italy, Spain, and Australia before moving to NYC. 

I work freelance in tech, and in my spare time I enjoy walking in the park by my apartment, wandering around NYC, all the self-care (massages, facials, yoga), and eating out (plus a good cocktail) with friends. 

I'm an avid traveler and have stayed with friends all over the world. I love to get a local experience when I travel, so I'm happy to provide that for my guests. My boyfriend Mario and I host together, so you may hear or see him as well! 

Any and all questions welcome! I want to make sure you have a great time in NYC.

name: 6 Bedroom Townhome Minutes from Manhattan
description:
This historic 6 bedroom, 3 bathroom townhouse is the perfect home for large groups looking to explore all that NYC has to offer. The home is on a beautiful tree-lined street a block and a half from the Grove Street PATH station in Jersey City. From there, it is an easy 5-10 minute ride to Downtown Manhattan.

The space
Throughout the space, you’ll discover refurbished original elements, including the entry doors, a massive oriel window in the grand parlor, restored pine hardwood floors, and decorative fireplace mantels that all speak to the character of this home.

The living room has a pullout couch and doors that completely close, so guests can have 7 separate sleeping rooms if they want.

Guest access
Guests can access the entire townhome!
neighborhood_overview: The Grove Street neighborhood has seen a lot of development and the neighborhood is rich with stores and restaurants that cater to the diverse backgrounds of Jersey City's inhabitants. Historic Downtown is home to many cultural attractions including the Jersey City Museum, the Hudson and Manhattan Railroad Powerhouse (planned to become a museum and artist housing) and the Harsimus Stem Embankment along Sixth Street, which a citizens' movement is working to turn into public parkland.

neighborhood_overview:
Jersey City provides a unique experience for those who want to experience the hustle and bustle of New York City, but also may want to get away from it and relax. A quick trip to the Grove St PATH train stop and then a short train ride and you are in downtown NYC in about 20 minutes. There is also a ton of stuff to do here in Jersey City. Great little downtown area with some great bars and restaurants.

There is a shopping center conveniently located a 1-minute walking distance from the apartment where you can find a Supermarket, a McDonalds, Dunkin Donuts, Popeye's, an Asian Fusion restaurant, laundromat, and a nail salon!

name: Your new comfortable home at Jersey City
description:
The studio apartment is a completely independent space on the 1st floor with your private entrance, so do not worry about your privacy being invaded. My family and I live on the floor above, if there are any questions or issues concerning your stay, we can provide you assistance immediately.

The space
There will be a queen size bed and a sofa bed in the studio, everything is pretty much hotel quality, so your stay with us will definitely be comfortable. You will even have access to the backyard, so if you need fresh air, you can just go out as you wish. And the entrance to your room will be completely independent as well, you will go through the hall on the side of the house, so you do not have to worry about any disturbance from us.

name: Apt 3 in downtown Jersey City home near NYC
description:
You'll be staying on the 3rd floor of a 19th-century townhouse in downtown Jersey City. The house is one block from the Newark Avenue pedestrian plaza, with lots of shopping and restaurants nearby. There's an ice cream shop (Torico) across the street. It's a five-minute walk to the Grove Street PATH station, where you can get the train to New York City or Hoboken. Door-to-door time to downtown NYC is about 20 minutes.

Jersey City Short-Term Rental Permit #STR20-00059

The space
The house was built in 1887 and is one of five identical houses at this end of the block. It was converted into a 3-family at some point, probably 1970s or 1980s. This apartment is the third (top) floor. The second floor is a separate Airbnb apartment, look for "Apt 2 in downtown Jersey City home near NYC."

Other things to note
Many would-be guests have sent us inquiries, only to have someone else book the dates they wanted before we could even respond. We
neighborhood_overview: Our house is right in the middle of downtown Jersey City, one block from the Newark Ave pedestrian plaza, a two-block section of the street that closed to traffic. There are many shops and restaurants within a couple of blocks. If you are willing to walk a few more blocks you can reach ShopRite and Newport Mall. Hamilton Park is a 10-minute walk to the north, and to the south is Liberty Park and Liberty Science Center. The neighborhood is safe, and there are usually a lot of people around, so you won’t be alone.

name: Long term avail 💛 | Stylish 2BR Apt Washer&Dryer
description:
An entire 2BR apartment is ALL yours, located only 4.5 miles (20 min) to Manhattan. Hosts comfortably 4 guests
✦ Cozy, Stylish & Clean
✦ Fast FREE WiFi & TV cables, Amazon TV and Alexa
✦ Fully equipped open kitchen, Washer and dryer
✦ Comfy beds & fluffy towels
✦ Located in a safe & walkable neighborhood (93 walk score ☺)
✦ Transportation around the corner - direct bus (2 min walk👣) to Midtown Manhattan (42nd & 8th ave, a block away from Times Square)

The space
Welcome to our renovated 2 BD/ 1 bath Apt which soaks up the sun and start you off with the best vibe in the morning for a day full of adventures in Manhattan. Great for couples, solo travelers, families and business travelers.

☟ Location highlights ☟
✦ Shuttle Bus ($3.25 each way) OR Regular bus #125 ($4.25 each way)
✦ Bus stop around the corner (2 min walk 👣) and takes 20 min to New York.
✦ Supermarket/Organic fresh local food (5 min walk 👣)
neighborhood_overview:
This may surprise you but this part of NJ is closer to Midtown Manhattan, Times square, Theater district, Madison Square Garden, Grand Central, Empire state Building, Saint Patrick's Cathedral and Rockefeller Center than staying in other parts of lower and upper Manhattan itself. We are closer than all parts of Brooklyn and way closer than staying in Queens or Bronx.

North Bergen is a safe neighborhood with a quick access to Manhattan. It is one of the very few walkable neighborhoods in NJ.
host_location: Edgewater, New Jersey, United States
host_about:
Thanks for stopping by to get to know us better.

I am Orit (aka Tutti) a passionate Airbnb host (6 years) who founded "Homely" - a professional hospitality biz to make sure you have a fantastic experience. Ruthy is my cohost and together we manage multiple listings in New Jersey. 

I travel for a living - 45 countries and counting! I stayed in various 5 star hotel rooms and Airbnb apartments, and that's what I aim for without the huge price tag. 

Providing a high standard of service is something we simply love to do! We are here to make sure you are as comfortable as possible - so never hesitate to ask for assistance. We hope to welcome you into our beautiful spaces soon!

For new Airbnb guests, copy-paste the URL for a $40 discount on your first Airbnb.
https://www.airbnb.com/c/tuttiandchrish?currency=USD
All return bookings attract a 10% discount from the nightly rate at any of our listings.

Get connected and see you soon,
Tutti, Ruth and Chris

name: 2.✨ Germ-Free: You're In Good Hands! (Sleeps 12) ✨
description:
Hi all! Come take a look at my beautiful Jersey City apartment. Get all of the convenience of being close to the city, without all of the exorbitant fees that go into staying in Manhattan. You can be to downtown NYC in about 20 minutes. Take a look at the pictures and see the lovely space, comfortably sleeping up to 12 people. The calendar is up to date and I would love to host you - please reach out if you have any questions.

The space
The space in the apartment is great - nice and open with tons of windows that allow a huge amount of natural light in to brighten up the whole apartment. Here are the amenities that you can expect to find in the apartment:

Bedrooms
- Two bedrooms with comfortable queen-sized beds, will plenty of pillows
- Second bedroom also has a twin over twin bunk bed
- Both bedrooms have TVs in them for your viewing needs
- Plenty of extra linens for use on the sofa beds or anywhere else they may be needed
neighborhood_overview: Jersey City provides a unique experience for those who want to experience the hustle and bustle of New York City, but also may want to get away from it an relax.  A quick trip to the Grove St PATH train stop and then a short train ride and you are in downtown NYC in about 20 minutes. There is also a ton of stuff to do here in Jersey City. Great little downtown area with some great bars and restaurants. Check out the House Manual for some local recommendations.
host_location: Wantagh, New York, United States
host_about:
I am a 34 year old young professional. In my spare time, I enjoy playing music, volleyball and exploring the city. I love doing yoga in Central Park. I have an extensive collection of teas, and my favorite album of all time is Pink Floyd's Dark Side Of The Moon. 

I love Hosting on Airbnb and meeting many interesting people!

description:
15 Min Drive to Times Square New York, Bus At Doorstep

The space
A) My House

My exact address will be visible once your booking is confirmed.
If you want a closer approximation of my place, use this close-by address. This is a food market that is one block from my house.
Supremo Food Market
323 Palisade Ave, Jersey City, NJ 07307

You will have the entire apartment to yourself. That includes living room, kitchen, and the two bedrooms as shown on my photos. Please note the bedrooms are rail-road style. You go thru the first bedroom to get to the second bedroom. Each bedroom has a door.

This two bedroom apartment is part of a well-kept, private two-story town house residence in the heart of Jersey City Heights. It’s super safe and convenient. The Bus to New York City Midtown (Port Authority Bus Terminal) is right at my doorsteps in front of the house.

Living room features a queen sofa sleeper with comfy memo

Just four blocks from the New Jersey Light Rail Richard Street Station which runs from the southern tip of Bayonne, through downtown Jersey City and Hoboken, and up through Union City and North Bergen , New Jersey. Brand new queen bed set with memory foam mattress and super fluffy pillows.

The space
Great for travelers, this is a stunning private bedroom in a brand new home. The room is perfect for a quiet, relaxing weekend getaway or full vacation for those looking to explore the beautiful New York City/New Jersey regions. Our beautiful home is located in the up and coming Greenville Neighborhood within Jersey City. We are minutes from the New Jersey Light Rail Richard Street Station, which provides quick, easy access to downtown Jersey City, several PATH Stations and
neighborhood_overview: The beautiful Greenville Neighborhood of Jersey City lies on the southern end of Jersey City. Public walking spaces and tree lined parks can be found throughout the area, along with shopping on Ocean Avenue and Martin Luther King Drive. Our neighborhood is very diverse and home to people of many different ethnicities, making it vibrant and exciting at all times.
