name: Private Urban Oasis w/ Backyard / 15 min to NYC
description:
Welcome to my home!

Just 15 steps away from the apartment and you get the bus that takes around 15 minutes to Time Square!!! Newark Int'l Airport is around a 20 minute drive away. As for local travel, a 5 minute walk away is the Lightrail to get around Jersey City. There is free street parking but you have to be mindful of the street signs.

The apartment has a keyless entry so I am flexible and can make accommodations re. check in, check out, leaving bags, etc. Just ask :)

The space
The private apartment gives you the warm feeling of a home away from home while on vacation. The backyard is great to relax or have a bbq. The apartment is completely private and you have exclusive use of the entire floor and a private part of the backyard. As for added bonuses, I provide a Keurig machine and blackout curtains throughout the apartment. I provide the following to name a few: towels, shower gel, shampoo, conditioner, toiler paper, blow dryer, pap
neighborhood_overview: My area of Jersey City is very vibrant, eclectic and diverse, with nice cafes and restaurants and it is safe. In the apartment is a brochure which provides information for local spots. Some of my favorite local spots are within a couple of blocks of the apartment. Corto restaurant is a favorite and has a farm to table menu, outdoor seating in the backyard and it is BYOB. Fox and Crow is a nice burger spot that has a parlor in the backroom where you can enjoy live music on Friday and Saturday nights. Milk Sugar Love is an organic ice cream shop. Also, Riverview Park, just one block away, provides great views of Manhattan, especially at night.

neighborhood_overview: Known affectionately as the "sixth borough," Jersey City is staking its claim as a destination in its own right within the New York City metropolitan area. Young professionals, artists and families have flocked to the Jersey side of the Hudson in recent years and have created a city that is both an extension of Manhattan and a place where you can see and feel an authentic Jersey vibe. Visitors to New York City will find that Jersey City not only offers more reasonably-priced accommodations with easy access to the Big Apple, but also noteworthy parks, restaurants, bars and other attractions that will make for a fun and memorable trip.

name: Bohemian apartment in trendy DWNTWN Jersey City!!
description:
Hey there!! Come check out our "bohemian" large and efficient studio in trendy Downtown Jersey City!! If you haven't been to Downtown Jersey city it's a destination in of itself. There are tons of bars & restaurants. We're a 5 minute walk to Jersey City's Restaurant Row. A 7 minute walk to the Grove Street PATH Train (which gets you into NYC in less than 10 minutes) and a 15 minute walk to the waterfront facing NYC's Freedom Tower.

The space
Apartment is full of natural light, decorated to feel homey and has been newly renovated. Apartment is a uniquely large studio with a Queen Size Bed, two closets, a living room with a Smart TV and a comfy couch, a separate dining area and a fully stocked kitchen. We also can bring up to two roll away cot's for extra sleeping and guests, just let us know and remind us prior to check in. Comes with clean linens, towels, shampoo, liquid soaps, and everything else you'll need for a comfortable stay. Hairdryer, iron, ironing boa

We're also 2 Light Rail Stops from the famous Liberty Science Center

host_location: Israel
host_about:
The Local Stay, founded in 2008 to make the process of renting furnished short- and long-term apartments absolutely transparent, so renters and property owners alike can rest easy.
At The Local Stay, our goal is to take the guess work out of it, carefully curating apartments so that travelers experience the true pulse of the city. And, since each property owner is personally vetted by The Local Stay team, travelers can rest assured that their stays will be safe and secure. Better vetting means that travelers get the most exclusive apartments in the most central locations, while greater involvement by The Local Stay means that property owners can list it and leave it as we handle communication with renters.
Today, The Local Stay offers hundreds of short-term and long-term rental properties in Amsterdam, Barcelona, Buenos Aires, London, New York, New-Jersey, Paris, Rome, Tel Aviv and more.... Our apartments inventory includes both corporate apartments and privately owned flats, making The Local Stay the perfect option for business travelers, corporate relocation clients and those on sabbatical, as well as foreign students and families on holiday. With options for everyone, The Local Stay provides personalized service so that every traveler can stay like a local.

The kitchen has a nice breakfast area that is very intimate.

host_about:
I am a young entrepreneur, I manage properties and vehicles by day, I go to school at night. I work hard in everything I do, I think im an extremely helpful individual. I was naturally born to provide hospitality/customer service/sales, at least that's how I feel! 

I am currently pursuing a degree in Hospitality, Management, & Entrepreneurship, graduation 2018. It is my life's pursuit to make the everyone's day a little brighter. I love to travel, meet new people, and just live. My favorite thing to do is, learn about the cultures of others where I visit,  and those who visit me.

My long term goal is to acquire international properties and luxury SUVs to manage & rent them. I actually embarked on hosting a condo in the always beautiful, Dominican Republic. 

I am moving one step at a time, one reservation at a time. I have been on this journey since September 2015 .Each guest that stays with me or rents one of my vehicles helps me get closer to my dreams. 

I sincerely appreciate anyone who decides to reserve one of my homes. 

I hope your stay is a dream come true too!

description:
Large & Cozy Downtown Jersey City Studio sleeps 4 in comfortable accommodations close to New York City.

Tourists, business travelers, locals & their families will enjoy this beautifully decorated L-shaped studio. In addition to the spacious layout and full kitchen, there is a quiet private patio.

A plush queen-sized bed with memory foam mattress and two pull out sofa beds make for a great stay.

The space
This apartment features wi-fi, a 50" flat screen smart TV, central heat & cooling, a private bathroom, and a well-equipped kitchen with coffee and tea provided.

Other things to note
We DO NOT allow Parties or Photo Shoots. There are to be NO MORE than SIX (6) Persons in the apartment at any time. QUIET TIME is from 11PM - 7AM! (Inside & Outside). Lost Keys = $250 - No Exceptions. Permanently Stained Bed Linens & Towels from Make-Up, Blood, Food, etc. = $75 - No Exceptions.

description:
Just a quick jaunt over (or under) the Hudson River stands this glittering, super modern high-rise that soars 40 luxurious stories into the Jersey City skyline. Let’s hear some of the highlights:
-Premium furnishings like maple cabinetry, plush carpeting, and unique artwork
-Expansive outdoor pool deck and huge modern gym
-Swanky resident lounge with computer stations and billiards
Easy access to PATH and light rail steps from the front door
Walkable neighborhood a block from the Newport Centre

The space
At Global Luxury Suites, your wellbeing is our top priority, therefore, we are following the CDC guidelines to ensure your safety. All apartments are thoroughly cleaned after each resident has checked out and before another guest checks in. All linens are changed and surfaces are sanitized (handles, windows, appliances, countertops, furniture, etc.). In addition, our teams will be fully sanitizing common areas such as business centers and

name: Rustic Room only 30 Mins to NYC
description:
This is a private bedroom which sleeps 3 in a historic Jersey City row house. Guests have a comfy King Size bed and a single sized futon.

*Note: Guests only have access to the bedroom and the bathroom on the second level. Guests are not allowed in the rest of the house including the kitchen.

* Note: This room is ideal for 2 people, but can sleep up to 3.

* Thirty - forty minutes away from Midtown New York City via bus or train. Come take a break.

The space
The room is designed for maximum guest comfort. Guests may enjoy Keurig, and microwave for quick meal prep. There is a dining table, smart tv, mini Fridge, plates, cups and utensils. Shared bathroom with shower, and of course WIFI! Room sleeps 3 Very comfortably : There is one King bed and one single size futon.

Towels and sheets provided.

Guest access
Guests enter through the front door with coded keyless entry, one flight of stairs leads to y
neighborhood_overview:
Jersey City is the 6th borough of NYC and super convenient to Manhattan. The house is two blocks away from Central Ave. This is a street full of cheap shopping, restaurants, coffee shops all along the sidewalk. You also will catch the bus to Port Authority in NYC here.

There is also Riverview Park park located four blocks away on 498 Palisade Ave. If you want to go for a scenic walk definitely include this! There a farmers market at Riverview Park which is held every Sunday (rain or shine) from the first Sunday in May through the Sunday before Thanksgiving in November, from 10 am to 3 pm.

name: Huge Apt for a Big Group!! 30 Min to Times Square!
description:
Clean, quiet and safe space in the fantastic neighborhood of Jersey City Heights. This apt is a great, affordable option for a bigger group! Enjoy scenic views of Manhattan on the quick 25-minute bus ride to Times Square. The bus stop is direct across the street!!

Also cheap Uber ride to Hoboken and Journal Square, with direct PATH train to the city. The brand new apartment is stylishly decorated for your enjoyment. Bathrooms are very clean, and WIFI is available throughout.

The space
The apartment was recently built, so everything is brand new and fully functional. The kitchen is fully stocked with cookware, bakeware, utensils, tea kettle, and coffee machine. Digital door locks allow each person in your group to come and go as they please without coordinating key exchange. High-Speed WiFi is available. We provide early and late luggage drop off in the luggage closet. There is a washer/dryer in the unit.

description:
Set right in the heart of Hoboken, this beautiful modern apartment puts you just steps away from local hotspots, popular restaurants and bars, and pulsating nightlife. It's a 5 minute walk to the Hoboken Terminal to catch the PATH train to New York City. The modern building complex includes an elevator, train timetable updates, outdoor sitting and BBQ areas, and a 24-hour access, state of the art, fitness center with Peloton bikes.

We would like to remind our guests that we provide a self service check in, so no need for human contact. You can message or text for support. Our housekeepers are taking extra measures to ensure hygiene and disinfection of our apartments and only use cleaning supplies approved by the Center for Disease Control and Prevention.

The fitness center is currently closed due to social distancing.

The space
This private haven boasts stylish furnishings and contemporary touches, encapsulating everything you need for a r
neighborhood_overview:
Nothing is as amazing as waking up in a beautiful apartment in a unique complex situated right in the center of Hoboken.

With so many entertainment hotspots, restaurants, cafes and bars, museums and art galleries as well as recreational parks, the neighborhood is located in a privileged location with something for everyone.

The nearby attractions include as Pier A Park, Sinatra Park, Pier C Park, Newport Green Park, Stevens Park, Hoboken Fire Department Museum, and many others.

name: Luxury 1 bed apt in Jersey City Hudson riverfront
description:
Standing 50 stories high and overlooking Manhattan's skyline, this luxury building is a one of a kind; offering the latest in amenities and services like an outdoor heated pool and spa, a fitness center, a theatre room, a playroom, and a sophisticated clubroom, you will find well-appointed apartments with nine foot ceilings, fully-equipped designer kitchens, and hardwood floors. As if it wasn't enough, all transport connections to NYC are only a few feet away.

The space
Experience luxury like you never have before in these fantastic Hudson riverfront apartments. Do you fancy a heated outdoor pool and spa with Manhattan views? A modern fitness center, a state-of-the-art theatre room, a clubroom with billiards, and a playroom and playground for the kids? You got it in this tower located a few steps away from the Newport Path station and the best restaurants in the area offering fantastic skyline views. These apartments feature the best upscale finishes like 9 foot

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
We have been providing vacation rental apartments for over 10 years across the East Coast. We are known for our distinctively furnished apartments in popular locations, and for our attentive service. You’ll find that our rates are quite reasonable. If you're looking for a safe, comfortable place with fabulous amenities and Wi-Fi (we know you need the Wi-Fi!) in the Boston MA area, Washington DC, Miami FL or very close to NYC in Jersey City or Hoboken, we'd love to host you. Many of the buildings where our apartments are located feature amenities such as beautiful lobbies, 24 hour front desk staff, fitness centers, business centers, recreation rooms, indoor or outdoor pools and whirlpools. If you are traveling with children, some buildings offer playgrounds (many buildings are near public playgrounds as well) or indoor playrooms. Depending on the location, you can stay for just a few days, a week, a month or more. 

We offer an assortment of short-term apartments in sizes ranging from a studio to three bedrooms that are fully furnished with all the comforts of home. Our local staff meticulously prepares your apartment before your arrival, and we offer 24 hour assistance for any emergencies after business hours. When you arrive at your apartment, the beds will be made, towels and bath amenities will be stocked in the bathrooms, and the coffee maker will be set up in the kitchen with some sample coffees, sweetener and creamer (teabags too if that is your preference) to start your morning off properly. If you’d like to cook a meal, the kitchen is stocked with dishes, cutlery, glassware and pots and pans. The living room is set up with a TV and cable channels, and the Wi-Fi router password and instructions will be prominently displayed so you can get connected quickly. You can also make local and toll-free phone calls at no charge. 

Please contact us to confirm the exact availability of the apartment you are interested in. We’d love to host you (and your family) for your vacation or business trip.

name: Only 2 Blocks to Grove PATH Train WIFI new Kitchen
description:
This apartment is located only two short blocks to the Grove PATH. Located on the ground floor on a small green side street. Grove street area is a hip, safe, charming neighborhood two train stops to New York City.

The space
Apartment has everything you need:
Stay - fully Furnished, clean new towels
Sleep - New Fresh Bed sheets. Comfortable Therapeutic mattress. Queen size bed
Private Room - your room has a lock on the door and only you have the key
Cook - Full kitchen with all new GE Appliances, dishes and tableware
Work - Laptop friendly working space, Desk, fast WiFi
Essentials - Hair dryer, Clothes hangers, Iron, toilet paper, paper towels, hand soap ALL are provided for you
Clean Sheets and Towels - all house laundry (sheets, towels) are done weekly by us
Cleaning - Cleaning lady comes on a regular basis (bathroom, kitchen, all rooms are cleaned regularly)
Safety - Your door has a lock with the key. Front do
neighborhood_overview: Jersey city Grove St area is very cool and hip. Its full of restaurants and night life. Its a hidden jam only two stops away by PATH train to NY city.

Standing 50 stories high and overlooking Manhattan's skyline, this luxury building is a one of a kind; offering the latest in amenities and services like an outdoor heated pool and spa, a fitness center, a theatre room, a playroom, and a sophisticated clubroom, you will find well-appointed apartments with nine foot ceilings, fully-equipped designer kitchens, and hardwood floors. As if it wasn't enough, all transport connections to NYC are only a few feet away.

The space
Experience luxury like you never have before in these fantastic Hudson riverfront apartments. Do you fancy a heated outdoor pool and spa with Manhattan views? A modern fitness center, a state-of-the-art theatre room, a clubroom with billiards, and a playroom and playground for the kids? You got it in this tower located a few steps away from the Newport Path station and the best restaurants in the area offering fantastic skyline views. These apartments feature the best upscale finishes like 9 foot
neighborhood_overview: The property is conveniently located about 25 minutes from Newark Liberty International Airport. Public transportation is also easily accessible – shuttle service to PATH/Ferry & just a short walk to the NY Waterway Ferry, Hudson-Bergen light rail, and the PATH.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
We have been providing vacation rental apartments for over 10 years across the East Coast. We are known for our distinctively furnished apartments in popular locations, and for our attentive service. You’ll find that our rates are quite reasonable. If you're looking for a safe, comfortable place with fabulous amenities and Wi-Fi (we know you need the Wi-Fi!) in the Boston MA area, Washington DC, Miami FL or very close to NYC in Jersey City or Hoboken, we'd love to host you. Many of the buildings where our apartments are located feature amenities such as beautiful lobbies, 24 hour front desk staff, fitness centers, business centers, recreation rooms, indoor or outdoor pools and whirlpools. If you are traveling with children, some buildings offer playgrounds (many buildings are near public playgrounds as well) or indoor playrooms. Depending on the location, you can stay for just a few days, a week, a month or more. 

We offer an assortment of short-term apartments in sizes ranging from a studio to three bedrooms that are fully furnished with all the comforts of home. Our local staff meticulously prepares your apartment before your arrival, and we offer 24 hour assistance for any emergencies after business hours. When you arrive at your apartment, the beds will be made, towels and bath amenities will be stocked in the bathrooms, and the coffee maker will be set up in the kitchen with some sample coffees, sweetener and creamer (teabags too if that is your preference) to start your morning off properly. If you’d like to cook a meal, the kitchen is stocked with dishes, cutlery, glassware and pots and pans. The living room is set up with a TV and cable channels, and the Wi-Fi router password and instructions will be prominently displayed so you can get connected quickly. You can also make local and toll-free phone calls at no charge. 

Please contact us to confirm the exact availability of the apartment you are interested in. We’d love to host you (and your family) for your vacation or business trip.
neighbourhood: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States

Overlooking the breathtaking Manhattan skyline & harbor,this luxury 40 story high-rise offers apartments that are the perfect backdrop for the ultimate cosmopolitan lifestyle. Great amenities including a community center equipped with billiards, a gaming area, and a newly renovated fitness center, allow guests to be kept entertained. Each apartment is impeccably crafted with beautiful hardwood floors and fully-equipped kitchens with ceramic tile flooring and Maple kitchen cabinets!

The space
This ultra-modern Jersey City apartment community is the symbol of comfort and sophistication. Synonymous with luxury, this enclave of elegant apartment homes will welcome you with the finest features, fixtures, and finishes. Building amenities include an exclusive sky bar and lounge, yoga studio, conference rooms, and outdoor areas, which include a pool, grilling areas, fireplace, and outdoor billiards. Services include 24-hour concierge, wifi in common areas, and bike stora

neighborhood_overview:
The Van Vorst Park area is located in the heart of Downtown Jersey City. Vibrant, energetic and so many options for getting brunch, lunch, dinner, coffee, going out, working out and more. Porta, South House, Ibby's Falafel, Wonder Bagels, Wurstbar, Micro-Brewery, HIIT, Yoga, Pilates all next door. *Noise Note: You are located in the center of a bustling city, so you can expect city noises.*

Nearby Newark Ave is a dedicated pedestrian area that features many local restaurants, bars, and boutique shops. Pick up fresh Krispy Cream donuts when the light is on! So much to explore & enjoy! Extremely walkable, excellent public transit options including Citi Bikes.

*Parking Note: Metered Street Parking is available, but the street is busy and often full. Check for street sweeping signs to know when to move your vehicle. Paid lots and garages are available in the nearby area.*

The space

Services include 24-hour concierge, wifi in common areas, and bike stor
neighborhood_overview: The property is conveniently located about 25 minutes from Newark Liberty International Airport. Public transportation is also easily accessible – shuttle service to PATH/Ferry & just a short walk to the NY Waterway Ferry, Hudson-Bergen light rail, and the PATH.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
We have been providing vacation rental apartments for over 10 years across the East Coast. We are known for our distinctively furnished apartments in popular locations, and for our attentive service. You’ll find that our rates are quite reasonable. If you're looking for a safe, comfortable place with fabulous amenities and Wi-Fi (we know you need the Wi-Fi!) in the Boston MA area, Washington DC, Miami FL or very close to NYC in Jersey City or Hoboken, we'd love to host you. Many of the buildings where our apartments are located feature amenities such as beautiful lobbies, 24 hour front desk staff, fitness centers, business centers, recreation rooms, indoor or outdoor pools and whirlpools. If you are traveling with children, some buildings offer playgrounds (many buildings are near public playgrounds as well) or indoor playrooms. Depending on the location, you can stay for just a few days, a week, a month or more. 

We offer an assortment of short-term apartments in sizes ranging from a studio to three bedrooms that are fully furnished with all the comforts of home. Our local staff meticulously prepares your apartment before your arrival, and we offer 24 hour assistance for any emergencies after business hours. When you arrive at your apartment, the beds will be made, towels and bath amenities will be stocked in the bathrooms, and the coffee maker will be set up in the kitchen with some sample coffees, sweetener and creamer (teabags too if that is your preference) to start your morning off properly. If you’d like to cook a meal, the kitchen is stocked with dishes, cutlery, glassware and pots and pans. The living room is set up with a TV and cable channels, and the Wi-Fi router password and instructions will be prominently displayed so you can get connected quickly. You can also make local and toll-free phone calls at no charge. 

Please contact us to confirm the exact availability of the apartment you are interested in. We’d love to host you (and your family) for your vacation or business trip.

name: Modern Studio | Full Kitchen | Steps to PATH/NYC
description:
Soaring 50 stories above the Hudson River, this glamorous tower has everything a traveler would need (and more!) for a trip to the NYC metro. Enjoy all the bells and whistles, including:
●Upscale furnishings, tall ceilings, and gourmet kitchens in every unit
●Resort-style building amenities such as an outdoor pool, theater room, gym, and 24/7 concierge
●Light rail steps from the front door and easy access to PATH
●Walkable neighborhood a block from Newport Centre

The space
At Global Luxury Suites, your wellbeing is our top priority, therefore, we are following the CDC guidelines to ensure your safety. All apartments are thoroughly cleaned after each resident has checked out and before another guest checks in. All linens are changed and surfaces are sanitized (handles, windows, appliances, countertops, furniture, etc.). In addition, our teams will be fully sanitizing common areas such as business centers and recreation rooms for guests’ safety.

name: Spacious Luxury Studio Apartment  in Jersey City
description:
Standing 50 stories high and overlooking Manhattan's skyline, this luxury building is a one of a kind; offering the latest in amenities and services like an outdoor heated pool and spa, a fitness center, a theatre room, a playroom, and a sophisticated clubroom, you will find well-appointed apartments with nine foot ceilings, fully-equipped designer kitchens, and hardwood floors. As if it wasn't enough, all transport connections to NYC are only a few feet away.

The space
Experience luxury like you never have before in these fantastic Hudson riverfront apartments. Do you fancy a heated outdoor pool and spa with Manhattan views? A modern fitness center, a state-of-the-art theatre room, a clubroom with billiards, and a playroom and playground for the kids? You got it in this tower located a few steps away from the Newport Path station and the best restaurants in the area offering fantastic skyline views. These apartments feature the best upscale finishes like 9 foot
neighborhood_overview: The property is conveniently located about 25 minutes from Newark Liberty International Airport. Public transportation is also easily accessible – shuttle service to PATH/Ferry & just a short walk to the NY Waterway Ferry, Hudson-Bergen light rail, and the PATH.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
We have been providing vacation rental apartments for over 10 years across the East Coast. We are known for our distinctively furnished apartments in popular locations, and for our attentive service. You’ll find that our rates are quite reasonable. If you're looking for a safe, comfortable place with fabulous amenities and Wi-Fi (we know you need the Wi-Fi!) in the Boston MA area, Washington DC, Miami FL or very close to NYC in Jersey City or Hoboken, we'd love to host you. Many of the buildings where our apartments are located feature amenities such as beautiful lobbies, 24 hour front desk staff, fitness centers, business centers, recreation rooms, indoor or outdoor pools and whirlpools. If you are traveling with children, some buildings offer playgrounds (many buildings are near public playgrounds as well) or indoor playrooms. Depending on the location, you can stay for just a few days, a week, a month or more. 

We offer an assortment of short-term apartments in sizes ranging from a studio to three bedrooms that are fully furnished with all the comforts of home. Our local staff meticulously prepares your apartment before your arrival, and we offer 24 hour assistance for any emergencies after business hours. When you arrive at your apartment, the beds will be made, towels and bath amenities will be stocked in the bathrooms, and the coffee maker will be set up in the kitchen with some sample coffees, sweetener and creamer (teabags too if that is your preference) to start your morning off properly. If you’d like to cook a meal, the kitchen is stocked with dishes, cutlery, glassware and pots and pans. The living room is set up with a TV and cable channels, and the Wi-Fi router password and instructions will be prominently displayed so you can get connected quickly. You can also make local and toll-free phone calls at no charge. 

Please contact us to confirm the exact availability of the apartment you are interested in. We’d love to host you (and your family) for your vacation or business trip.

name: One Bedroom Jersey City Apartment near the Water
description:
Located at the Jersey City waterfront with breathtaking views of the Manhattan skyline, these sleek apartments feature spacious, sun-filled floor plans, fully-equipped, gourmet kitchens, and much more. This full lifestyle building offers amenities including a 7th floor terrace with resort-style pool, spa, lounge areas, BBQ grills, double-sided fireplace, and outdoor billiards, a state-of-the-art fitness center with yoga studio, and a children’s indoor playroom.

The space
Your new home is beautifully designed with luxury features including granite kitchen counter tops, hardwood floors & carpeting, walk-in closets, in unit washer/dryer, individual heat/air conditioning and alarm system.

Your fully appointed apartment is furnished with all the necessities of home, including linens and towels.

Property amenities include:

• Controlled access
• Meeting room
• Clubhouse
• Large fitness center with new equipment
• Su
neighborhood_overview:
This apartment building is located adjacent to Harsimus Cove Light Rail Station, one block from Newport Centre Mall, and steps from the Newport Path. Guests can enjoy local entertainment and delicious eatery from the local shops and restaurants located within walking distance.
This location is one of the most walkable neighborhoods in Jersey City; not only for business but also leisure travelers. Jersey City is a hub of industry with its oil refineries, warehouses, and plants. Although known for its industrial prowess, Jersey City’s gem is Liberty State Park, which offers impeccable views of Manhattan, the Statue of Liberty, and Ellis Island.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
We have been providing vacation rental apartments for over 10 years across the East Coast. We are known for our distinctively furnished apartments in popular locations, and for our attentive service. You’ll find that our rates are quite reasonable. If you're looking for a safe, comfortable place with fabulous amenities and Wi-Fi (we know you need the Wi-Fi!) in the Boston MA area, Washington DC, Miami FL or very close to NYC in Jersey City or Hoboken, we'd love to host you. Many of the buildings where our apartments are located feature amenities such as beautiful lobbies, 24 hour front desk staff, fitness centers, business centers, recreation rooms, indoor or outdoor pools and whirlpools. If you are traveling with children, some buildings offer playgrounds (many buildings are near public playgrounds as well) or indoor playrooms. Depending on the location, you can stay for just a few days, a week, a month or more. 

We offer an assortment of short-term apartments in sizes ranging from a studio to three bedrooms that are fully furnished with all the comforts of home. Our local staff meticulously prepares your apartment before your arrival, and we offer 24 hour assistance for any emergencies after business hours. When you arrive at your apartment, the beds will be made, towels and bath amenities will be stocked in the bathrooms, and the coffee maker will be set up in the kitchen with some sample coffees, sweetener and creamer (teabags too if that is your preference) to start your morning off properly. If you’d like to cook a meal, the kitchen is stocked with dishes, cutlery, glassware and pots and pans. The living room is set up with a TV and cable channels, and the Wi-Fi router password and instructions will be prominently displayed so you can get connected quickly. You can also make local and toll-free phone calls at no charge. 

Please contact us to confirm the exact availability of the apartment you are interested in. We’d love to host you (and your family) for your vacation or business trip.

neighborhood_overview:
This apartment building is located adjacent to Harsimus Cove Light Rail Station, one block from Newport Centre Mall, and steps from the Newport Path. Guests can enjoy local entertainment and delicious eatery from the local shops and restaurants located within walking distance.
This location is one of the most walkable neighborhoods in Jersey City; not only for business but also leisure travelers. Jersey City is a hub of industry with its oil refineries, warehouses, and plants. Although known for its industrial prowess, Jersey City’s gem is Liberty State Park, which offers impeccable views of Manhattan, the Statue of Liberty, and Ellis Island.

name: Comfortable home in Jersey City
description:
The house is two short blocks from the Light Rail (Richard Street Stop) which goes to Hoboken Terminal then a short block's walk to the PATH (Port Authority Trans Hudson) train into the City. About a 30 minute trip if lucky with the timing! The house has a nice view and a comfortable back yard. As an alternate you can walk 15/20 minutes to the Port Liberte ferry to Bowling Green. I have a Steinway grand (in tune) and often cook dinner which you'd be welcome to join if you want.

The space
The place is comfortable and clean. I have Netflix and Amazon.

description:

Close to all transport connections and free from New York’s hustle and bustle, give in to all the stunning onsite amenities like a resort-style pool, a modern fitness-center and guests' club room.

The space
Whether you’re in town for leisure or work, these brand new, extraordinary homes will take your breath away. Expansive windows infuse these homes with natural light and offer exclusive views of Manhattan’s bright skyline. There’s even more: designer kitchens with top of the line appliances and luxurious travertine tiled bathrooms complete these high-end residences. Sit back and enjoy the exceptional variety of superb amenities that this luxury tower offers and forget about the hectic morning commute thanks to its convenient location close to all bus and rail connections. name: Zen-Styled Jersey City Apartment - 15 min to NYC
description:
Enjoy our Jersey City 1 bedroom apartment. Our home is fully furnished with a modern zen feel. We are located in the Journal Square neighborhood and across the street from the beautiful Lincoln Park. We are on a quiet street, and blocks away from the Journal Square PATH train station which takes you right into the city in 10 minutes. WiFi is included!

The space
If you are looking to enjoy NYC, the Journal Square PATH train is located a mile away. from here you can be in Manhattan in 10 minutes. Take a nice walk to the train station, ride the bus from the corner, or Uber there in 5 minutes.

Jersey City also has a lot to offer. The Grove Street neighborhood is full of bars and amazing restaurants, and also just a 5 minute Uber down the street.

We are across the street from Lincoln Park, which is full of walking trails, beautiful lawns, ponds, fountains, and basketball & tennis courts.

We are a quick and easy 10 minute Uber to Newar

name: 205H Private Economy Bedroom 18Min to Time SQ NYC
description:
A private bedroom in a 5 bedroom apartment in a 3 family house. It is located at a quite street in upcoming Jersey Heights area of Jersey city. The NJ Transit bus stop is at the corner. 17~25 minutes express bus ride takes you to midtown/ Time Square. 4 blocks from light rail to shops & PATH train. Sleeps upto 5 people. Free street parking on weekend & holidays, $5/day on Weekday. Supermarket, Grocery, restaurants are nearby. It is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

The space
You are booking a bedroom with Key Pad lock in a 5 bedroom apartment on the 2rd floor of a 3 family house.

In the bedroom:

2 Full size bed for 4 people;
Provide desk, mirror, hair dryer, facial tissue and extra blanket.

This apartment is conveniently located in Jersey City Heights, New Jersey / the other side of Lincoln Tunnel and Holland Tunnel. It only takes you $3.50 and 17 - 25 minutes to be directly in Times Square by a bus
neighborhood_overview: Jersey City Heights is a typical, safe metropolitan NYC area community. Our house is located on a quite street. There are a lot of restaurants, groceries, bakeries and supermarket on Central ave which is only two blocks away. We do recommend the "DULCE DE LECHE" bakery at 376 central ave for breakfast and lunch. For anyone who want fast access to Manhattan and reasonable dwelling price, this is idea place to stay.
host_location: New Jersey
host_about: We , Kevin Song & David Wang,  are close friend who have been lived and worked in NYC metropolitan area for more than twenty years.  Both of us love to travel and own vacation house in FL for many years. We love dealing with short term vacation rental people from airbnb and other website. Right now, we are join together to offer our properties in Union City which is extremely easy access into Times Square. We will have a number of listings and handle the renting our-self. You will definitely be pleased with our services and enjoy staying at any of our properties.

name: 3 Bedroom/2 Bathroom Apartment Near NYC!
description:
This beautiful 2 bedroom apartment is a few blocks away from the bus and train into Manhattan where you will be in the heart of Times Square in 20 minutes. The location couldn't be better with numerous bars, restaurants, coffee shops, and various other stores within a walk-able distance. The night-life in Hoboken on the weekends is a must. This apartment sleeps 5 people comfortably.

The space
The apartment is over 1000 Square Feet! The apartment is kept very clean and the carpet in both bedrooms is brand-new. Linens are brand-new. The kitchen is stocked with pots and pans, cups, plates, and a working refrigerator, oven, microwave, and dishwasher. The apartment has hardwood floors and a tiled bathroom.
neighborhood_overview:
Hoboken is a square mile city across the Hudson river from New York City. Hoboken is rich in night life as is boasts the most bars per square mile anywhere in the United States. Guests may take a bus or a train to Manhattan in 20 minutes. The town is extremely safe and there are tons of great places to view the Manhattan Skyline.

Some of our favorite local places to eat in Hoboken & the Heights:
M&P Biancomano's: 11th and Washington Street
Benny Tudino's - Home of the largest slice: 6th and Washington Street
Renato's Pizza Master: Hutton and Central Ave
Otto Strada: 8th and Park Ave
La Isla: 1st and Washington Street
Amanda's: 9th and Washington Street

name: Big and Cozy Private Room ** Long-term Stay**
description:
Clean, quiet, and safe space in the fantastic neighborhood of Jersey City Heights. This room is a great, affordable option for one or two people! Enjoy scenic views of Manhattan on the quick 25-minute bus ride to Times Square. The bus stop is less than a block of a walk!!

Also, cheap Uber ride to Hoboken and Journal Square, with direct PATH train to the city. The apartment is stylishly decorated for your enjoyment. Bathrooms are clean, and WIFI is available throughout.

The space
The apartment was built less than 3 years ago, so everything is new and fully functional. The kitchen is fully stocked with cookware, bake ware, utensils, tea kettle, and coffee machine. Digital door locks allow each person in your group to come and go as they please without coordinating key exchange. High-Speed WiFi is available.

This is a 5 bedroom apartment with 2 full bathrooms and a huge kitchen/dining room area. Rooms are private with a key of the walk-in cl
neighborhood_overview: Just across the river from Manhattan, Jersey City is considered the sixth borough of New York City. There are frequent buses to Times Square just a short walk away from the apartment. Buses run every 10 minutes. There are plenty of local restaurants nearby with diverse and delicious cuisine.

Private condo studio space in the heart of The Heights neighborhood of Jersey City (less than 30 minutes to downtown Manhattan by car or public transportation). This space is within a newly built (2019) condo.

The space
Space also offers private use of our back yard patio with seating and a fire pit should you wish to sit next to a warm fire on a cool night sipping wine.

The studio space includes a pull out sofa bed, with your own private half bathroom on the same floor, and an exclusive full bathroom on the 2nd floor for showers.

neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood is safe and trendy. It’s a great neighborhood for New York City commuters and travelers as well as for those that want to enjoy a bit more calmness than Manhattan while being minutes away from it.

Aside from the proximity to the underground transportation with Manhattan and other parts of New Jersey, you will have in less than 5 minutes walk a large diversity of exciting cafes, restaurants, bars, shops, yoga studios, gyms and a great supermarket (Keyfood).

In less than 15 minutes walk you will reach a large shopping mall, a multiplex movie theater, several parks, and the riverside with some of the best views in the New York Metropolitan Area. If you want more shopping, next to the Newport Mall, you can find Shoprite, BJ’S Wholesale, Bed Bath & Beyond, The Home Depot and Target.

- 15 minutes from Hoboken
- Access to NYC 24/7 via PATH train/Light Rail in approximately 30 mins

The space
A bustling neighborhood, a safe neighborhood and a neighborhood on the rise. The space is freshly decorated , new kitchen and bathroom.

Other things to note
Check-In - 3:00PM
Check-Out- 11:00AM

name: Bright & Large Room for Monthly Stays
description:
Gorgeous, light filled room with a huge walk-in closet for one person. Big bedroom in a shared apartment with 4 other young, clean, professionals. In the fantastic neighborhood of Jersey City Heights. The bus is half a block away. Also cheap Uber ride to Hoboken, with direct PATH train to the city. The room features a Smart TV. Bathrooms are very clean, and WIFI is available throughout. The apartment is equipped with central heating/cooling system.
LONGTERM stay only (over 28 days)
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about:
Hi, I'm Miz!

I have lived in the NYC area for 8 years, and have been sharing my space (now spaces!) with guests since 2014. I love hosting!

I grew up in Houston, Texas, went to university in Pennsylvania, and spent time living in Italy, Spain, and Australia before moving to NYC. 

I work freelance in tech, and in my spare time I enjoy walking in the park by my apartment, wandering around NYC, all the self-care (massages, facials, yoga), and eating out (plus a good cocktail) with friends. 

I'm an avid traveler and have stayed with friends all over the world. I love to get a local experience when I travel, so I'm happy to provide that for my guests. My boyfriend Mario and I host together, so you may hear or see him as well! 

Any and all questions welcome! I want to make sure you have a great time in NYC.

name: 1br/studio with free shuttle to public transport
description:
The apartment is a studio but with a private alcove for the queen-size bed - there is a curtain (pictured) that keeps privacy, and this alcove has a 50” TV with Netflix/Amazon Prime/Disney+ on it.

The living room has two large sofas, one of which is a queen-size pullout sofa bed. The living room TV is 75” and has Roku, with Netflix, Amazon Prime and Disney+ as well.

The kitchen is spacious, and has a dining table for 3 people, and includes a dishwasher.

There are no parking spaces provided.

Guest access
The entire apartment. There is also a viewing gallery on the 17th floor with city views, accessible with the key card for the apartment.

name: ***Huge & Cozy 3BR 2BA House  15m to Times Square
description:
**Stay with peace of mind - all of our rentals are cleaned before and after each stay by a professional cleaning agency trained in proper disinfection techniques. All our rentals also feature digital locks for easy self check-in**

15-20 minutes by car and bus to NYC, the house is well located in a beautiful neighborhood so that you can relax after a long day exploring Manhattan or Jersey City. The house is fully stocked with complimentary shower liquids, high-speed internet, fresh linens, and towels every single stay. Additionally, there is complimentary Netflix/Hulu :)

- 24/7 guest support via message, email, or phone
- Professionally cleaned
- Self check-in

To abide by all legal requirements and HOA rules, you WILL asked to provide a copy of your official government-issued photo ID, confirm your contact information, pass through our verification portal and, in some instances, complete a criminal background check. Failure to provide these do
neighborhood_overview:
Jersey City, New Jersey, United States.

Known affectionately as the "sixth borough," Jersey City is staking its claim as a destination in its own right within the New York City metropolitan area. Young professionals, artists, and families have flocked to the Jersey side of the Hudson in recent years and have created a city that is both an extension of Manhattan and a place where you can see and feel an authentic Jersey vibe. Visitors to New York City will find that Jersey City not only offers more reasonably-priced accommodations with easy access to the Big Apple but also noteworthy parks, restaurants, bars and other attractions that will make for a fun and memorable trip.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:

I love to share my recommendations of NYC with my guests and hope to be  a great host.

The apartment has beautiful finishes and comes fully outfitted with kitchen, bedroom, & bathroom essentials. This spot is ideal for anyone looking for a place they can truly live temporarily. We take your experience personally and can’t wait to host you in your home away from home.

The space
We take the health and safety of guests seriously. Between each stay, the apartment is thoroughly cleaned and sanitized following guidance from the CDC. Cleaners wear protective garments (e.g., mask, gloves) and wipe surfaces, cabinet handles, door knobs, etc with cleaning solutions that follow CDC guidance. All linens, dishware, glassware and silverware are also washed between stays. Cleaning products and tools are provided so you can clean and sanitize as well.

name: Innovator's Hub
description:
This 3 bedroom apartment welcomes the like minded innovator to share a safe, inspiring and clean space. Share the space with two brothers (age 27 and 29) who connect tech with social impact to help build communities.

Amazing location- minutes from downtown Jersey City and less than 25 minutes to WTC or other parts of Manhattan. Quick trip to NYU and The New School. Very close to Liberty State Park and Lincoln Park. Ample street parking.

The space
Very carefully designed with West African inspiration. Freshly renovated with all that you'd need from an apartment.

THIS APARTMENT IS THOROUGHLY CLEANED INSIDE AND OUT AND DISINFECTED THREE TIMES. THERE ARE ZERO REPORTED CASES OF COVID-19 IN THE BUILDING.

name: Charming 2BR 1.5BA with easy NYC access
description:
Great space to quarantine or work remote!

The two bedrooms are on opposite ends of the apartment for maximum privacy and comfort with extra sofa bed outside.

HUGE living area with an open floor layout with a newly renovated large kitchen.

Relax inside and watch some TV or head out to explore Hoboken or NYC.

12 minute walk to the Hoboken Path station, which will take you directly downtown to World Trade Center or uptown to 33rd Street with immediate access to the NYC subways along the way.

The space
One of the larger 2 bedroom 1.5 bath apartments in a walk-up building in Hoboken. The space is uniquely designed to maximize the living areas with open floor plan access, tons of light and space to relax.

The bedrooms are simple and meant for sleeping or relaxing, with the master bedroom getting it's own shower/tub and toilet.

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire apartment as well
neighborhood_overview:
Quiet tree-lined street in the back half of Hoboken a quick away from the hustle and bustle of Washington St and NYC trains.

name: 205J Private Economy Bedroom 17mins to Time SQ NYC
description:
A private bedroom in a 4 bedroom apartment in a 3 family house. It is located at a quite street in upcoming Jersey Heights area of Jersey city. The NJ Transit bus stop is at the corner. A 17~25 minutes express bus ride takes you to midtown / Time Square. 4 blocks from light rail to shops & PATH train. Sleeps upto 6 people. Free street parking on weekend & holidays, $5/day on Weekday. Supermarket, grocery, restaurants are nearby. It is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

The space
You are booking a bedroom with Key Pad lock in a 4 bedroom apartment on the 1st floor of a 3 family house.

In the bedroom:

3 Full size bed for up to 6 people ( 3 adults + 3 kids);
Provide desk, mirror, hair dryer, facial tissue and extra blanket;

This apartment is conveniently located in Jersey City Heights, New Jersey / the other side of Lincoln Tunnel and Holland Tunnel. It only takes you $3.50 and 17 - 25 minutes to be dire
neighborhood_overview: Jersey City Heights is a typical, safe metropolitan NYC area community. Our house is located on a quite street. There are a lot of restaurants, groceries, bakeries and supermarket on Central ave which is only two blocks away. We do recommend the "DULCE DE LECHE" bakery at 376 central ave for breakfast and lunch. For anyone who want fast access to Manhattan and reasonable dwelling price, this is idea place to stay.

Strategic location
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood is very quiet and safe. A melting pot of different ethnicities and cultural backgrounds. Beautifully diverse but mainly professionals and full-time workers living in a family community. The courthouse building is across the street with full security 24/7

host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about:
I am a 33 year old man. I am self-employed, working in building my own business online as I do part time in hospitality and go to school in NYC. I go to my house, two or three times a week sometimes more to clean or get creative in the basement as I enjoy painting and gardening.
I  make sure the house is clean and always looks presentable. I have great neighborhood and my house is super comfy and quiet. I would love to host you and make sure you have an enjoyable comfortable and most importantly clean stay. Ask me any question you may have in mind. I love helping by providing the best recommendations around the city, best restaurants and things to do in the area.
I am pretty laid back, I enjoy running (and cooking), gardening, socializing, traveling. I also like to keep a very clean house and respect the environment.

NB: Price discount 10% OFF for staying weekly, 14night or monthly. Looking forward welcoming you :)

name: Rustic Garden home
description:
Beautiful rustic apartment on 1st floor (NO STAIRS) located in the heart of North Bergen. One block away from bus stop that leads you straight to Times Square NY, also nearby are Coach House Diner, Dunkin Donuts and various authentic Latin America restaurants. This apartment has a homelike feel to make you fit right in.

The space
This apartment has two private spacious rooms, one that has a queen sized bed and the other with a trundle bed and twin. Our living room also provides extra sleeping accommodations with two sofa beds a 55' Smart TV equipped with NETFLIX, HULU. The kitchen has an eat in bar, with plenty of counter space for cooking. This includes a coffee maker, microwave, toaster machine, and kettle.

Guest access
There is a shared backyard with tenants upstairs equipped with BBQ Grill and supplies. Please be advised to not smoke in the yard due to our upstairs tenants health condition.

host_about: Happy traveling and visiting new places at the same time treat homes the way I treat my own.

As if it wasn’t enough, all transport connections to NYC are only a few feet away.
